product_name: Abercrombie & Fitch Authentic Woman Gift Set 50ml EDP + 200ml Body Lotion
description:
Abercrombie & Fitch Authentic Woman Gift Set 50ml EDP + 200ml Body Lotion
Authentic Woman by Abercrombie & Fitch is a floral fragrance for women.



This elegant scent is introduced by enticing notes of pear, mandarin orange and red currant before they dry up to reveal a stunning heart of magnolia, lily-of-the-valley and a sweet hint of nectarine. As the floral notes dry they reveal a precious base of musk-mallow, cedar and sandalwood.



These layers make Authentic a warm and feminine blend that is perfect for women who dare to stand out and are ready to show the world who they really are.



Authentic Woman by Abercrombie & Fitch was released in 2019 together with a version for men.

product_name: Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo Fico di Amalfi Eau de Toilette
description:
Acqua di Parma, Fico di Amalfi is a Floral, Fruity fragrance for women and men. Launched in 2006. A beautiful refreshing, revitalising scent. This fragrance is characterised by its fruity notes of bergamot, lemon, grapefruit and cedar wood. At its heart, notes of fig come together with pink pepper scents and jasmine petals accords while the base of this Eau de Toilette is rounded off with harmonious accents of fig, cedar wood and benzoin.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note:: Italian Lemon, Italian Bergamot, Grapefruit Heart note:: Fig Nectar, Pink Pepper, Jasmine Petals Base note:: Fig Wood, Cedarwood, Benzoin

product_name: Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo Mandorlo di Sicilia Eau de Toilette
description:
Mandorlo di Sicilia by Acqua di Parma is an Amber, Floral fragrance for women and men. A delicately sweet fragrance characterised by top notes of star anise, bergamot, and orange. At the heart citrus accents intertwine with soft and enveloping notes of the islands iconic Mediterranean green almonds and ylang-ylang, while its base is rounded off by cedar wood, vanilla and white musk notes.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note:: Star Anise, Italian Bergamot, Italian Orange Heart note:: Green Almonds, Ylang-Ylang, White Peach Base note:: Madagascar Vanilla , Lebanese Cedarwood, Tolu Balsam, Musk

product_name: Adidas Pure Game Eau de Toilette
description:
Adidas Pure Game Eau de Toilette 100ml Spray
Pure Game is a spicy and woody fragrance for men.



Whether you are hitting the gym or just going about your day, you can rely on this great scent to stay fresh and smell delicious!



The aroma opens up with crisp notes of grapefruit, mandarin orange and basil, as well as masculine hints of pepper. The heart is built on hints of sweet lavender, guaiac wood and notes of cypress that give Pure Game a fresh lease of life, before mellowing into the woody base of sandalwood, patchouli, incense and tonka bean.



Launched in 2010, Pure Game is an absolutely bargain from Adidas – don’t miss out on an even greater longevity with the scented shower gel and deodorant bought in conjunction with the scent.

product_name: Adidas Victory League Deodorant
description:
Adidas Victory League Deodorant

Experience freshness with Adidas Victory League Deodorant, offering 48-hour protection. Ideal for active men, this vibrant and spicy fragrance keeps you feeling confident and invigorated all day.

product_name: Adidas Victory League Eau de Toilette
description:
Adidas Victory League Eau de Toilette 100ml Spray
Adidas Victory League by Adidas is an oriental woody fragrance for men.



This is a light fragrance, perfect for those days when you don’t want anything cloying or heavy. Victory League is sweet, spicy, fruity and very versatile.



With notes such as cinnamon and pear you know you are getting a nice warm, sweet scent, but it is not just these two notes you'll notice while wearing the Adidas fragrance, you’ll get freshness from the basil notes, hints of tobacco and also creamy vanilla. Victory League is a great treat with an affordable price tag.



Adidas Victory League was launched in 2006.

product_name: Agent Provocateur Compact Mirror in Pouch
description:
Agent Provocateur Compact Mirror in Pouch
Agent Provocateur by Agent Provocateur is a floral fragrance for women.



This signature fragrance by the popular lingerie brand comes bottled in an innocent egg-shaped, powder pink bottle decorated with a black rosette. However, the fragrance is far from pure with its stunning blend of white flowers, saffron, rose and Haitian vetiver. The contrasting musky base with hints of wood, amber and musk makes for a truly shameless fragrance for the provocative modern woman.



Agent Provocateur was launched in 2000.

product_name: Agent Provocateur Eau de Parfum
description:
Agent Provocateur  by Agent Provocateur Eau de Parfum is an exotic floral chypre fragrance for women. Acknowledged as a modern classic. The fragrance combines pure saffron oil from India, coriander from Russia, Moroccan rose oil, Egyptian jasmine, vetiver from Haiti, French magnolia oil, amber and musk. This scent has become synonymous with seduction, pleasure and provocation of the senses. Delightfully feminine, this irresistible fragrance is a sexy blend of fresh, floral notes and sensual musk. The light scent is perfect for casual evenings and everyday wear. Its delicate and sensual scent makes it an irresistible choice for any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Saffron and Coriander

product_name: Alterna Caviar Clinical Professional Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 12 x
description:
Alterna Caviar Clinical Professional Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 12 x 15ml
Caviar by Alterna Haircare is a range of Anti-Ageing Hair Care products modelled by Katie Holmes.



If you are starting to lose hair or if it is thinning, Alterna's anti-ageing hair care products can help to restore your strands from top to bottom. The brand have created a full range of hair care products that revitalises dry and dehydrated hair to ensure that it stays healthy and strong.



The products are infused with Abyssinian Oil and caviar that smoothes the hair to leave it strong and frizz free. All of the products are free from parabens, sulphates, phthalates and synthetic colours. This collection is perfect for nourishing and repairing your hair whilst ensuring that you are not using any harmful ingredients in your routine.



Caviar by Alterna includes a series of shampoos, conditioners, treatments and styling products.

Green Tea Essence by Alyssa Ashley is a fresh fragrance for women.



It contains bergamot, neroli, jasmine, tuberose, lemon, green leaf, bois de rose, geranium, cinnamon bark oil and ylang-ylang, vetiver, sandalwood, oakmoss, patchouli, clove and cassis.



Green Tea Essence was launched in 2002.

product_name: Alyssa Ashley Musk Bath and Shower Gel
description:
Alyssa Ashley Musk Bath and Shower Gel 250ml
Musk by Alyssa Ashley is a floral woody musk scent for both men and women.



This legendary unisex musk scent it is not overpowering but a rather simple, soft and clean perfume that mingles perfectly with your body’s natural scent. Natural notes of bergamot, jasmine, geranium, ylang-ylang, rose, iris and oak moss are combined with the finest musk oil to create this amazing fragrance which has been a his and hers favourite for decades.



Musk by Alyssa Ashley was first launched in 1969.

White Musk by Alyssa Ashley is a floral and woody musk fragrance for women.



Rich creamy notes of tarragon, jasmine, rose, ylang ylang, musk, patchouli and wood result in a unique scent that’s not dominant but subtle and feminine. It is a lighter take on the original Alyssa Ashley Musk Oil from 1969. White Musk is elegant, mysterious and understated with excellent longevity. It is also cruelty-free and uses all-natural musk oil.



White Musk by Alyssa Ashley was launched in 2000.

product_name: Anna Sui Forbidden Affair Eau de Toilette
description:
Forbidden Affair by Anna Sui is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2010. Forbidden Affair was inspired by fantasy, land of dreams and fairy tails. This beautiful scent composition is a perfect way to add a touch of sophistication to your personal style. The invigorating blend of flowery scents will give you a sense of freshness and sophistication with every wear. The sexy and sensual scent will keep you feeling confident and energized while you are dressed to impress.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Black Currant, Red Currant and Amalfi Lemon
Middle note: Raspberry, Rose and Pomegranate
Base note: Violet, Virginia Cedar and Musk

product_name: Anna Sui La Vie de Boheme Eau de Toilette
description:
La Vie de Boheme by Anna Sui is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2012. Created by Philippe Romano. Light, fresh, and beautiful, this floral fragrance makes a perfect everyday choice. It is refreshing, playful, romantic, a perfect choice for any occasion. The stunning bottle is a beautiful addition to any dressing table. The delicate floral notes of this fragrance are complemented by the irresistible sensuality of its female scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Berries, Pear, Pitahaya and Turkish Rose
Middle note: Peony, Freesia and Magnolia
Base note: Raspberry, Musk, Black Vanilla Husk, Sandalwood and Woody note:

product_name: Anna Sui La Vie de Boheme Eau de Toilette
description:
La Vie de Boheme by Anna Sui is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2012. Created by Philippe Romano. Light, fresh, and beautiful, this floral fragrance makes a perfect everyday choice. It is refreshing, playful, romantic, a perfect choice for any occasion. The stunning bottle is a beautiful addition to any dressing table. product_name: Anna Sui Rock Me Summer of Love Eau de Toilette
description:
Rock Me Summer of Love by Anna Sui is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2010. This inviting summer scent from Anna Sui is an ideal way to keep summer's gentle breeze at bay. A delicately sweet and elegant fragrance that combines Geranium, Water Lily, Freesia, and Amber notes are wrapped in a sensual floral bouquet. Wear this fragrance to express your inner mood and personality. This fragrance is recommended for summer or the romantic holiday season. Anna Sui's motto for Rock Me Summer of Love "be sweet, be sexy, be free."

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bergamot, Hyssop and Geranium
Middle note: Water Lily, Peach and Freesia
Base note: Tincture of rose, Sandalwood and Amber

product_name: Anna Sui Romantica Eau de Toilette
description:
Romantica by Anna Sui is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2015. What makes this women's signature fragrance so special? What makes it so unique? The answer is simple, it's the sensual and mysterious notes of the heart of a woman, in a bottle that was inspired by a woman's love. Inspired by a woman's love for the sensual and mysterious world of a man, the notes of romanticism and warmth are combined with a unique blend of floral notes. An irresistibly seductive collection of aromas that conjures up moments of pure romance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pomegranate, Grapefruit, Calabrian bergamot and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Pink Peony, May Rose, Jasmine, Osmanthus, Hortensia, Orange Blossom and Lily
Base note: Amber, Sandalwood, Musk and White Cedar

product_name: Antonio Banderas King Of Seduction Eau de Toilette
description:
King of Seduction by Antonio Banderas is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2014. King of Seduction by Antonio Banderas is an irresistible blend of sensual and masculine aromas. This enticing fragrance is inspired by passion and romance, and has a heart-thumping blend of fruity, aromatic sea notes and woody accords for a unique and unforgettable scent. It is recommended for casual events and all day wear.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pineapple, Melon, Bergamot, Grapefruit and Green Apple
Middle note: Sea note:, Jasmine, Cardamom and Neroli
Base note: Vetiver, White Musk, Cedar, Suede and Amber

product_name: Antonio Banderas Power of Seduction Eau de Toilette
description:
Power of Seduction by Antonio Banderas is a Aromatic Green fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Launched in 2018. Antonio Banderas is known for his stunning looks and charismatic persona. This men's fragrance is a symbol of his success and seduction. This popular seller will leave him with a powerful feeling of success and a charismatic presence. A dreamy, refreshing scent, a men's cologne is perfect for night outs and after-work gatherings. The adventurous fragrance can be used as a signature scent to stand out from the crowd.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Apple and Bergamot
Middle note: Lavender, Artemisia and Clary Sage
Base note: Woody note:, Moss, Tonka Bean, Amber and Patchouli

product_name: Antonio Banderas Seduction In Black Eau de Toilette
description:
Seduction In Black by  Antonio Banderas is a Spicy, Amber fragrance for men. Hit the shelves in 2009, a year after its precursor in blue. Laced with the different effects of spices at various notes, this has been energized with the fresh and woody notes. As the aroma mixes with your body oils at different stages, it manifests your various characters of fresh, genteel and intense. Antonio Banderas Seduction In Black Eau de Toilette is a subtle, charming, masculine scent that will be enjoyed by any man, whether he is in his 20s, 30s, 40s or 50s. A fresh and masculine scent that captures the spirit of luxury.

Fragrance Notes:

Top note: Black Currant and Bergamot

product_name: Antonio Banderas The Secret Eau de Toilette
description:
The Secret by Antonio Banderas is a Amber Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2010. Created by Elisabeth Vidal. The notes of the composition are: mint, grapefruit, cinnamon, pepper, apple liqueur accord, tonka bean, woods, musk and leather. The Secret is a sensual fragrance, that is masculine yet subtle. The Secret is a blend of notes that is perfectly balanced, with a soft heart and a modern twist. This fragrance is a creation of Antonio Banderas and his creative team and is a must-have addition to any well-styled man's wardrobe.

Fragrance Notes:
Tope note: Mint, White Grapefruit
Middle note: Pepper, Cinnamon, Apple
Base note: Leather, Musk, Woods, Tonka bean

A rich blend of amber and woody notes, this masculine scent is the perfect way to pamper yourself in a luxurious way. product_name: Aquolina Pink Sugar Eau de Toilette
description:
Aquolina Pink Sugar Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Pink Sugar by Aquolina is a sweet gourmet fragrance for women and is the first perfume ever created by the Italian company.



It opens with top notes of green fig leaves, juicy Sicilian orange and vibrant bergamot that reveal a playful heart of lily of the valley, red fruits and liquorice blossom; once these notes dry down you find a gourmand base of creamy vanilla, indulging caramel, musk and woodsy accents.



This deliciously sweet and unique scent has become really popular since its debut and the distinguishing pink and white striped packaging with a swirl at the top will instantly take you into a lively world of refreshing ice cream, sweet fruit cream and mouthwatering candy floss.



Pink Sugar was launched in 2004 by Aquolina.

product_name: Aramis Eau de Toilette
description:
Aramis by Aramis Eau de Toilette spray for men is a woody and aromatic perfume. This fragrance was launched in 1964 and was the first fragrance for men to appear in a department store. A bold, modern, sophisticated and mature aroma that is instantly recognisable. The composition is woody with sharp notes, it is powerful and masculine.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Aldehydes, Artemsia, Gardenia and Bergamot
Middle note: Patchouli, Sage, Orris root and Cardamom
Base note: Leather, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk

product_name: Ariana Grande Ari Body Mist
description:
Ariana Grande Ari Body Mist 236ml Spray
Ari by Ariana Grande is a sweet, floral fragrance for women.



The scent opens with zesty grapefruit, fresh raspberry and pear which mellows into a bouquet of soft flowers, including vanilla orchid and lily-of-the-valley. The base consists of creamy musk, wood and an unusual note of marshmallow for a unique finish.



Ari's scent is housed in a clear bottle with a rose gold top and white pom-pom for a girly touch. The perfume was created in partnership with Luxe Brands and was first released in 2015.

product_name: Ariana Grande Moonlight Body Mist
description:
Ariana Grande Moonlight Body Mist 236ml Spray
Moonlight by Ariana Grande is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



The opening of Moonlight is a fruity plum with hints of red currant. Later, it softens into Grande's signature note, marshmallow, before being wrapped in the sandalwood base. This is a sweet, yet mature scent.



Moonlight won Superdrugs retailer award in 2018, and it’s no surprise due to the beautifully designed packaging, the cute signature faceted bottle and the extra soft and fluffy lavender coloured pompom on the stopper, not to mention the sensuous, feminine scent inside the bottle.



Moonlight was launched by Ariana Grande in 2017.

product_name: Ariana Grande Sweet Like Candy Body Mist
description:
Ariana Grande Sweet Like Candy Body Mist 236ml Spray
Sweet Like Candy by Ariana Grande is a floral, fruity fragrance for women.



Notes of sugar-frosted blackberries and bergamot open the fruity fragrance, before blending into the sweet heart with notes of jasmine, marshmallow and Crème de Cassis. The delightful scent is rounded off with a base of vanilla and precious woods.



This sweet treat from the pop star is flirtatious and sweet with hints of freshness, all bottled up in a cute baby pink bottle with a fluffy pom-pom attached.



Sweet Like Candy is the third fragrance by Ariana Grande and was launched in 2016.

product_name: Ariana Grande Sweet Like Candy Eau de Parfum

product_name: Ariana Grande Thank U, Next Body Mist
description:
Ariana Grande Thank U, Next Body Mist 236ml Spray
Thank U, Next by Ariana Grande is a floral fragrance for women.



A delicious mix of juicy white pear and ripe raspberry greets you in the opening before it mellows into the heart of warm coconut, musk and hints of rose petals. The base is sweet and filled with macaroon sugar notes.



The pastel pink bottle is housed inside a broken heart – a representation of her hit song “Thank U, Next”. Now, Ariana Grande’s perfume may not mend your broken heart, but the fragrance is sure to lift your spirit and help you move on.



Thank U, Next by Ariana Grande was launched in 2019.

description:
Armaf Club De Nuit Intense Deodorant Spray 200ml
Armaf Club De Nuit Intense for men is a woody, spicy fragrance.



Club De Nuit Intense has a citrusy opening with a burst of fresh lemon, black currant, apple, bergamot and pineapple. At the heart, the Armaf aftershave are floral accords with notes of rose, jasmine and birch, which settles into a wonderfully smoky and woody scent with vanilla, ambergris, musk and patchouli notes at the base.



Armaf launched this unique fragrance in 2015.

product_name: Azzaro Chrome Eau de Toilette
description:
Chrome by Azzaro is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1996. The nose behind this fragrance is Gerard Haury. A classic and clean men's scent that combines citruses, floral notes and woods for a transparent and fresh aroma. Azzaro Chrome offers an exhilarating freshness combined with an addictive sensuality. This is a result of a unique blend of ingredients that are inspired by the world of luxury and high fashion. The result is a unique fragrance that is sophisticated and elegant.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rosemary, Lemon, Bergamot, Neroli and Pineapple
Middle note: Oakmoss, Jasmine, Cyclamen and Coriander
Base note: Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Cardamom, Tonka Bean and Brazilian Rosewood

product_name: Azzaro Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
description:
Azzaro Pour Homme by Azzaro is an Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Azzaro Pour Homme was launched in 1978. Azzaro Pour Homme was created by Gerard Anthony and Richard Wirtz. Pour Homme is a stylish scent that is perfect for the man who likes to be at the top of his game. Pour Homme is a masculine, fresh, invigorating fragrance that is a perfect choice for daily wear as it is intense without being overwhelming.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Basil, Lavender, Anise, Lemon, Caraway, Bergamot, Clary Sage and Iris
Middle note: Cedar, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Juniper Berries and Cardamom
Base note: Oakmoss, Leather, Amber, Musk and Tonka Bean

product_name: Azzaro Pour Homme L'Eau Eau de Toilette
description:
Azzaro Pour Homme L'Eau by Azzaro is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2011. Add some zing to your day by wearing Pour Homme L'Eau a refreshingly invigorating fragrance from the design house of Azzaro. It is an amazing blend of notes that will leave you feeling refreshed rejuvenated and ready for anything the day brings.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Grapefruit, Lime, Lemon, Yuzu
Heart note: Geranium, Lavender
Base note: Musk, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver

product_name: Azzaro Wanted Girl Eau de Parfum
description:
Azzaro Wanted Girl Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Wanted Girl by Azzaro is a floral and gourmand fragrance for women.



The feminine version of Wanted opens with orange blossom, ginger blossom and pomegranate. Pink pepper puts some zing in the sweet opening before a unique blend of datura and dulce de leche take over in the heart before the fragrance finally unfolds to reveal its ethereal base of vetiver, patchouli essence and tonka.



The bottle is as deadly and pretty as the datura flower in the heart, the lid is a grenade, embraced by the petals of a beautiful flower of glass.



Wanted Girl by Azzaro was launched 2019.

product_name: Baldessarini Ambré Eau de Toilette
description:
Baldessarini Ambré Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Ambre by Baldessarini is a fresh fragrance for men. It contains notes of mandarin, red apple, leather, violet, amber, vanilla, oak moss and labdanum.



Mäurer & Wirtz, owner of 4711 and Tabac, have acquired the fragrance business of Baldessarini from Procter and Gamble. The brand was originally part of Hugo Boss, and launched its first fragrance in 2001.



Baldessarini Ambre was launched in 2007.

description:

product_name: Baldessarini Ambré Eau Fraîche Eau de Toilette
description:
Baldessarini Ambré Eau Fraîche Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Ambré Eau Fraîche by Baldessarini is a woody and aromatic fragrance for men.



It opens up with notes of watermelon, aromatic spices and bergamot, followed by a heart of nutmeg, apple, sage, cypress and violet leaf before drying down on a base of sandalwood, oak, amber and leather.



Ambré Eau Fraîche by Baldessarini was launched in 2020.

Bella by Baldessarini is a floral fragrance for women.

product_name: Baldessarini Black Eau de Toilette
description:
Baldessarini Black Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Black by Baldessarini is an oriental and woody fragrance for men.



Black is a masculine, refined and hypnotic scent with spicy hints, rich herbal notes and aromatic accords that will delight your senses.



Chilling ice, sharp basil and pink pepper greet you in the bold opening before the scent heads into the exotic heart of patchouli, geranium and myrrh. The base, a seductive blend of labdanum, tonka bean and leather, adds a smooth finish which will linger and surround your body for hours. A beautifully blended fragrance that’s bold, seductive and alluring.



Black was launched by Baldessarini in 2019.

M by Banana Republic is an aromatic fragrance for men.

M was launched by Banana Republic in 1996.

A seductive and playful blend that takes the freshness and versatility of the original Bentley scent and updates it with a fresh and modern interpretation. product_name: Bentley Majestic Cashmere Eau de Parfum
description:
Bentley Majestic Cashmere Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Majestic Cashmere by Bentley is a woody fragrance for men and women.



A fragrance for those who appreciate the finer things in life, Majestic Cashmere takes us on a voyage to Goa. Heady incense, coriander and patchouli are supported by woody notes and a soft lingering musk in the base. A scent as classic and understated as a neutral coloured Bentley Continental, it is not loud, it is very easy to wear and makes you feel classy and sophisticated.



Majestic Cashmere is part of a three part fragrance line called the “Bentley Beyond - The Collection” an exclusive unisex fragrance that takes us on a trip to three unforgettable destinations. The flacon is a beautiful faceted bottle inspired by the classic glass headlights of the Continental GT. A masterpiece for your fragrance shelf.



Majestic Cashmere was launched by Bentley in 2019.

product_name: Bentley Momentum Eau de Toilette
description:
Bentley Momentum by Bentley is an Aromatic fragrance for men. It was introduced in 2017. Aquatic notes and violet leaf ground the blend at its open while notes of bergamot and nutmeg add liveliness to the fragrance. At the heart of the cologne the floral note of jasmine is accompanied with soft notes of cashmere wood and ambergris. Momentum is an oriental fragrance. This masculine, fresh scent pays tribute to the sense of purpose that drives you. It is a scent that will connect you to your mind, your body, and your soul in a way that will bring your life into focus.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Violet, Clary sage, Aquatic note: and Bergamot
Middle note: Cashmere woods, Ambergris and Jasmine
Base note: Sandalwood, Moss, Tonka bean, Musk

product_name: Boucheron Eau de Toilette
description:
Boucheron Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Boucheron by Boucheron is an oriental fragrance for women.



This fragrance is for women who love a traditional and timeless fragrance. It strongly embodies elegance with its oriental blend of fruits, white flowers, cedar, amber, sandalwood, musk, benzoin and tonka bean. The sweet and floral notes are edged off by bitter and spicy flavours, creating a wonderful and contradictory scent.



The noses behind this fragrance are Francis Deleamont and Jean-Pierre Bethouart who bottled their creation in a ring shaped, glass bottle. The pair were highly inspired by the art of the Parisian goldsmiths to fit the elegance of their masterpiece.



Boucheron was launched in 1989.

description:
Jaipur Homme by Boucheron is a Amber Spicy fragrance for men. Jaipur Homme was launched in 1998. Created by Annick Menardo. A dazzling blend of fruits, flowers, woods and spices, Boucheron Jaipur is the most sensual and mysterious of all Boucheron's signature scents. The fragrance is composed of a harmonious combination of tropical fruits and spices. Intense, tempting, and seductive. Boucheron Jaipur is a unique and modern fragrance. Boucheron is a French luxury perfumery known for their high quality of fragrances and accessories. Boucheron products are made in France.

description:
Place Vendôme by Boucheron is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2013. Place Vendôme was created by Olivier Cresp and Nathalie Lorson. Boucheron Place Vendome is a feminine floral fragrance for women, inspired by the Place Vendome in Paris, with a soft and sensual feel, combining the energy of a bouquet of flowers with the sensuality of benzoin. You'll be swept off your feet by the sensual bouquet of this floral scent.

product_name: Boucheron Pour Homme Eau de Parfum
description:
Boucheron Pour Homme by Boucheron is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1991. Boucheron Pour Homme was created by Francis Deleamont, Jean-Pierre Bethouart and Raymond Chaillan. A crisp opening brings out the refreshing aroma of orange, lime, and bergamot. The base features a masculine blend of musk, vetiver, and patchouli. It is a unique blend of citrus, floral and woody notes. A masculine fragrance that's as crisp and refreshing as a fine spring day. Pour Homme is the perfect choice for any man looking to add a little elegance and sophistication to any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon, Lemon Verbena, Bergamot, Lavender, Orange, Basil and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Rose, Jasmine, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Lily-of-the-Valley and Orris Root
Base note: Oakmoss, Vetiver, Incense, Sandalwood, Musk, Benzoin, Amber and Tonka Bean

description:
Britney Spears Curious Fine Fragrance Mist 236ml Spray
Curious by Britney Spears is a fresh, floral and woody fragrance for women.



Curious was the first fragrance created by pop star Britney Spears. The scent contains bright top notes of Louisiana magnolia, pear and lotus, followed by a flower heart of tuberose, jasmine and pink cyclamen, while the base is an effervescent mix of musk, vanilla and precious woods. Curious won the Best Women's Fragrance award at the Fragrance Foundation in 2005.



Curious by Britney Spears was launched in 2004.

product_name: Britney Spears Midnight Fantasy Fragrance Mist
description:
Britney Spears Midnight Fantasy Fragrance Mist 236ml
Midnight Fantasy is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



Singer and actress Britney Spears released Midnight Fantasy as part of her popular Fantasy collection. The mysteriously seductive scent combines sultry accords of framboise, plum and black cherry with a floral heart of freesia, orchid and iris. It dries down into a warm base of vanilla, amber and musk. The perfume is presented in a purple version of the signature Fantasy bottle adorned with Swarovski crystals symbolizing the night sky.



Britney Spears first introduced Midnight Fantasy in 2006.

description:
Britney Spears Prerogative Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Prerogative by Britney Spears is an oriental vanilla fragrance for women and men.



It contains notes of coffee, apricot, goji berries, sandalwood, amberwood, saffron, pink pepper and red lily.



Prerogative was launched by Britney Spears in 2018.

description:
Prerogative Rave by Britney Spears is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2019. The provocative and alluring scent has a smooth and sexy vibe that is sure to get noticed. The aroma presents a soft, smooth and sensual mixture of delicately sweet, musky and woody notes that are intertwined with a warm and soft combination of fruity and floral tones that will bring a new and sensual sensation to the wearer.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Raspberry, Pear and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Red Lily, Freesia and Jasmine
Base note: Cashmere, Sandalwood, Musk and Cedar

product_name: Britney Spears Private Show Body Mist
description:
Britney Spears Private Show Body Mist 235ml Spray
Private Show by Britney Spears is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



Britney Spears has had huge success with her perfumes since the launch of Curious in 2004. Private Show is no exception with its delicate balance of creamy, fruity and floral components.



The top notes consist of coffee, whipped cream, nectarine and clementine which settles into a heart of delicious and rich dulce de leche topped with orange blossom and jasmine. The musk and amber in the base gives the fragrance a sensual character.



Private Show was launched in 2016 and is inspired by the pop singer’s love of dancing.

product_name: Bruno Banani Woman Eau de Toilette
description:
Bruno Banani Woman Eau de Toilette 20ml Spray
Woman by Bruno Banani is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



Woman is intoxicating and all its character is expressed by the top notes of fruity-sweet orange, intense water lily and energising ivy that mix together in an harmonized floral bouquet of freesia and lily-of-the-valley with a splash of vibrant and juicy peach.

Its gourmand base of creamy white musk and indulgent vanilla just gives a sensual twist to the fragrance.



This unconventional and fanciful scent was the first ladies fragrance launched by the lingerie brand and it plays with contrasts, expressing the full joy of life.



The intriguing pink bottle in the shape of an angled cone is the perfect expression of this fresh and cheeky fragrance.



Woman by Bruno Banani was launched in 2001.

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette
description:
Burberry Brit for Men by Burberry is an Amber Woody fragrance for men. Launched in 2004. Burberry Brit for Men was created by Antoine Maisondieu. This perfume is the winner of 2 awards: FiFi Award Best National Advertising Campaign / Print 2005 and FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe 2005. The classic scent is subtle and understated to accentuate the gentlemanly look. Reliable and high quality, this Eau de Toilette is perfect for any occasion or day. It is surely going to be the perfect gift for your close ones.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Ginger, Cardamom, Green Mandarin and Bergamot
Middle note: Wild Rose, Nutmeg, Cedar and Spicy note:
Base note: Tonka Bean, Cedar, Gray Musk, Oriental Woodsy note: and Patchouli

Delicately scented with a fusion of bergamot, jasmine, and lavender, London is ideal choice for any special occasion that demands a touch of refinement and style.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Honeysuckle, Tangerine and Rose
Middle note: Jasmine, Tiare Flower, Peony and Clementine
Base note: Musk, Sandalwood and Patchouli

product_name: Burberry London Eau de Toilette
description:
London for Men by Burberry is a Amber Spicy fragrance. Launched in 2006. London for Men was created by Antoine Maisondieu. The warm, sensual scent of English oak wood is inspired by the rich history and culture of London. A dose of spicy notes from the cinnamon adds freshness and vitality. Smell like the brightest, most stylish men around when you wear this captivating Burberry fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Cinnamon, Lavender and Bergamot
Middle note: Leather and Mimosa
Base note: Tobacco Leaf, Opoponax, Guaiac Wood and Oakmoss

product_name: Burberry Mr Burberry Face Moisturiser
description:
Burberry Mr Burberry Face Moisturiser 75ml
Mr. Burberry by Burberry is an aromatic fragrance for men.



The Eau De Toilette version has a sharp bitter opening with spicy, fresh mint, herbs and plenty of grapefruit that can take some getting used to, but once you do, it’s addictive. As the scent evolves into the heart the grapefruit burns off and you get a woody, powdery and masculine fragrance that’s very well blended.



Please note that Mr. Burberry EDT is not the same scent as Mr. Burberry EDP as there is a difference in the notes used.



Mr. Burberry was released in 2016.

product_name: Burberry Mr. Burberry Eau de Toilette
description:
Mr. Burberry by Burberry is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2016. Created by Francis Kurkdjian. A sophisticated masculine scent that brings out the best in you, it is as modern and timeless as the man himself. This men's fragrance captures the essence of Burberry's classic fashion sensibility and modern, urban cool in a raw, woody and masculine scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Grapefruit, Cardamom, Tarragon and Mint
Middle note: Cedar, Birch Leaf, Nutmeg and Lavender
Base note: Vetiver, Guaiac Wood, Sandalwood, Benzoin, Amberwood and Oakmoss

product_name: Burberry My Burberry Black Eau de Parfum
description:
Burberry My Burberry Black Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
My Burberry Black by Burberry is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



A stunning, heavy flacon with a dark tint and a black ribbon tied around the neck containing a soft, sexy and a slightly dark liquor. My Burberry Black is a must-have for your fragrance collection.



You’ll find delicious peach in the opening that soon softens with hints of amber and fruits. Accords of rose also sit warm on your skin and harmonise perfectly with exquisite patchouli.



My Burberry Black was launched in 2016.

product_name: Burberry Touch Eau de Parfum
description:
Touch for Women by Burberry is a Floral fragrance for women. Was launched in 1998. Touch was created by Michel Girard. The floral base is complemented with a fruity blend of berries for a surprising twist. The fragrance is soft and casual with a hint of freshness.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Pepper, Cassia, Blackberry, Cranberry, Black Currant, Rose Oil and Orange
Middle note: Peach, Peony, Lily, Tuberose, Lily-of-the-Valley, Jasmine and Raspberry
Base note: Cedar, Oakmoss, Vanilla, Green Almond and Tonka Bean

product_name: Burberry Touch Eau de Toilette
description:
Touch for Men by Burberry is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for men. Launched in 2000. Touch was created by Jean-Pierre Bethouart. The blend of floral, fruity notes and spices create a seductive and exotic scent for him. This sophisticated fragrance will have him smelling great throughout the day. It is an exotic and sensual scent that is ideal for any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Violet Leaf, Artemisia and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: White Pepper, Cedar and Nutmeg
Base note: White Musk, Tonka Bean and Vetiver

product_name: Burberry Weekend Eau de Parfum
description:
Weekend for Women by Burberry is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1997. Weekend was created by Nathalie Lorson. The weekend is here. Burberry Weekend is a feminine fragrance for the woman who appreciates balance and peace of mind. A perfectly balanced composition with notes of Cashmere musk, sandalwood to create a comforting, relaxing weekend. Designed to enhance the senses with a touch of subtle sophistication, she can enjoy a weekend in style.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mignonette, Mandarin Orange and Sage
Middle note: Nectarine, Blue Hyacinth, Peach Blossom, Rose Hip, Iris, Red Cyclamen and Violet Root
Base note: Musk, Sandalwood and Cedar

Weekend for Men by Burberry is a Citrus fragrance for men. Launched in 1997. Weekend was created by Michel Almairac. Burberry Weekend is a fragrance for men that has a fresh and smooth masculine scent that will add a touch of sophistication to any occasion. It is ideal for the weekend, will help you feel more relaxed, comforted and confident.

Base note: Honey, Musk and Amber

product_name: By Terry Tool-Expert Kabuki Brush
description:
By Terry Tool-Expert Kabuki Brush
After leaving her career in medicine behind for the creative arts, Terry de Gunzburg quickly made a name for herself as a professional make-up artist in Paris. Her signature look is simple but effective, natural foundation, immaculate lips and bold lashes.



For years, Terry designed Make-Up for Yves Saint Laurent, most famously their iconic Touché Eclat product in 1992. It was not until 1998 that she decided to create her own collection.



By Terry was born with an evident history of couture and runway experience. The brand pride themselves in classic, luxurious and timeless cosmetics with the modern woman in mind. If you are looking for beauty on the go, they offer a range of multi-functional products and tools that allows you to keep a radiant glow, even on your busiest days.

description:
Noa by Cacharel is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 1998. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Inspired by the inner peace and wisdom of women, Noa is a women’s perfume that embodies happiness and serenity. Rare woods and delicate flowers are infused for the perfect signature perfume.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: White Musk, Peony, Freesia, Green note:, Peach and Plum
Mid note: Lily, Lily-of-the-Valley, Green Grass, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang and Rose
Base note: Coffee, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Coriander, Incense, Tonka Bean and Cedar

product_name: Cacharel Pour L'Homme Eau de Toilette
description:
Cacharel pour L'Homme by Cacharel is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 1981. A fragrance by Gerard Goupy. If you're looking for a signature scent that you're sure to love, Cacharel has the answer. This masculine fragrance is inspired by the spicy and invigorating notes of the South of France. Perfect for any occasion. A relaxing, refreshing, elegant Eau de Toilette.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Nutmeg, Bergamot, Lavender and Clary Sage
Middle note: Geranium, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Lily-of-the-Valley, Cyclamen and Jasmine
Base note: Fir, Vetiver, Cedar, Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk

product_name: Calvin Klein CK All Eau de Toilette
description:
Calvin Klein CK All Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
CK All by Calvin Klein is a citrus fragrance for both women and men.



If you are a fan of the original CK One from 1994, you will love this new version. It is a very similar scent, but with an added twist of rhubarb and hints of amber. It’s a soothing, fresh floral scent with a slight spicy character that's perfect for any season.



The opening is fresh with citrus and mandarin before entering the heart of jasmine, lily, freesia and rhubarb. The warm base consists of amber, must and vetiver.



CK All was launched in 2017.

product_name: Calvin Klein CK One Body Moisturiser
description:
Calvin Klein CK One Body Moisturiser 250ml
CK One by Calvin Klein is a fresh and aromatic citrus scent for both men and women.



It contains notes of pineapple, green notes, mandarin orange, papaya, bergamot, lemon, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, rose,amber, musk and oakmoss on a woody base. The fragrance is inspired by classic citrus colognes but with a floral twist. CK One was one of the first unisex fragrances to be released. It remains just as popular today and also has an annual limited edition summer version.



CK One by Clavin Klein was launched in 1994.

product_name: Calvin Klein Euphoria Eau de Parfum
description:
Euphoria by Calvin Klein is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2005. Euphoria was created by Dominique Ropion, Carlos Benaim and Loc Dong. This perfume is the winner of award FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Woman's Luxe 2006. Calvin Klein Euphoria Eau de Parfum has a soft floral scent, with a hint of summer fruits and is an ideal choice to wear when you want to smell irresistible. This scent is sure to help you feel amazing.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pomegranate, Raspberry, Passionfruit, Persimmon, Peach and Green note:
Middle note: Orchid, Lotus and Champaca
Base note: Mahogany, Amber, Musk, Violet, Patchouli and Vanilla

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession Eau de Toilette
description:
Obsession for Men by Calvin Klein is a Amber Woody fragrance for men. Launched in 1986. The nose behind this fragrance is Robert Slattery.  The juice provides an extraordinary blend of masculine and fresh scents that is sure to become a favourite. This seductive fragrance is sure to turn heads. The intense and bold scent of this fragrance is sure to make her want to keep the attention focused on you. It is a captivating scent that leaves a lasting impression.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Cinnamon, Lavender, Coriander, Mandarin Orange, Lime, Bergamot and Grapefruit
Middle note: Myrhh, Nutmeg, Carnation, Brazilian Rosewood, Pine Tree, Sage, Jasmine and Red Berries
Base note: Amber, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Musk, Patchouli and Vetiver

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession Gift Set 125ml EDT + 75ml Aftershave Balm + 75g Deodorant Stick
description:
Calvin Klein Obsession Gift Set 125ml EDT + 75ml Aftershave Balm + 75g Deodorant Stick
Calvin Klein Obsession is an aromatic and woody fragrance for men.



Obsession for men opens with an eruption of citrusy notes infused with spicy wafts of coriander and cinnamon and a calming sense of lavender. It then develops with a combination of sweet, spicy and woody notes, including nutmeg, rosewood, carnation, red berries and myrrh, before drying down with amber, vanilla, sandalwood, patchouli and musk in the base.



Obsession by Calvin Klein was a huge hit when it was first released in 1986 and remains one of CK’s most popular scents for men. If you are looking for a captivating, seductive and masculine aroma with an excellent sillage and longevity, this is the one for you.

product_name: Calvin Klein Reveal Men Eau de Toilette
description:
Reveal Men by Calvin Klein is a Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2015. Created by Ann Gottlieb, Marypierre Julien, Olivier Gillotin and Rodrigo Flores-Roux. This men's scent blend is a unique and masculine scent that's sure to be a hit for the man who is looking for a new fragrance. It is sure to be a head turner. It's a fresh and stylish scent that will have you feeling bold and confident. The masculine and fresh scent keeps your senses and body alert. A new scent for a new man.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Melon, Brandy, Pear, Mastic or Lentisque and Ginger
Middle note: Agave, Salt, Suede and Clary Sage
Base note: Tonka Bean, Amber and Vetiver

product_name: Calvin Klein Sheer Beauty Eau de Toilette
description:
Calvin Klein Sheer Beauty Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Sheer Beauty by Calvin Klein is a fruity floral fragrance for women.



This charming new edition of the beloved CK fragrance Beauty (2010) is designed to reflect natural beauty and self confidence for younger women. It contains an innocent and light composition of floral and fruity notes along with musk and woody notes.



Calvin Klein needed someone passionate about the concept of the fragrance and therefore selected Daphne Groeneveld. The Dutch model is known for frequently promoting minimalistic, natural beauty and self love.



Sheer Beauty by Calvin Klein was launched in 2012.

product_name: Calvin Klein Truth Eau de Parfum
description:
Truth by Calvin Klein is a Amber Woody fragrance for women. Launched in 2000. Created by Alberto Morillas, Jacques Cavallier and Thierry Wasser. The calming, feminine, and fresh scent of this perfume is sure to appeal to any woman. It is a sexy and mysterious scent that is sure to get noticed. Meant to be enjoyed alone or with a special someone, this fragrance offers a seductive scent that is sure to get you wanted.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bamboo, Clover, Vetiver, Bergamot, Lemon and Patchouli
Middle note: Lily, Peony, Sandalwood, Mimosa, Silkwood Blossom and Blackberry
Base note: Musk, Vanilla and Amber

product_name: Calvin Klein Women Miniature Gift Set 15ml Eternity EDP + 15ml CK One EDT + 2 x 15ml Obsession EDP
description:
Calvin Klein Women Miniature Gift Set 15ml Eternity EDP + 15ml CK One EDT + 2 x 15ml Obsession EDP
Eternity by Calvin Klein is a fresh and aromatic fragrance for women.



Eternity is a gesture of love as it's said to be inspired by the well known fashion designer’s own marriage.

The romantic yet sophisticated scent is a composition of citrus, green notes, perfectly blended with vivid flowers such as violet, lily of the valley, heliotrope and marigold. Carnation gives the scent a spicy edge which is balanced with subtle woody notes and musk.



Since its launch in 1988 several editions of the fragrance have been released; Eternity Intense, Eternity Moment and Eternity Night only to mention a few.

product_name: Carolina Herrera 212 Men Deodorant Spray
description:
Carolina Herrera 212 Men Deodorant Spray 150ml
212 Men by Carolina Herrera is a woody, fresh and aromatic fragrance for men.



212 is a unique and original scent. The fragrance is predominantly spicy with woody accords. Notes of grass and citrus give it a unique freshness that makes it stand out from the rest. The scent has excellent longevity and develops throughout today. The bottle is heavy and masculine with a stylish finish in matted silver.



212 Men by Carolina Herrera was first launched in 1999.

product_name: Carolina Herrera Bad Boy Gift Set 100ml EDT + 100ml Shower Gel
description:
Carolina Herrera Bad Boy Gift Set 100ml EDT + 100ml Shower Gel
Bad Boy by Carolina Herrera is a gourmand and oriental fragrance for men.



It’s good to be bad - this bold fragrance has a zesty opening of bergamot, black pepper and white pepper. The spiced freshness carries on in the heart of sage and cedar before mellowing down on notes of cacao, tonka bean and amberwood in the base.



Carolina Herrera brought this fragrance on the market for modern and sophisticated men - it is a strong, but comfortable and complex fragrance that displays a beautiful interaction of contrasting ingredients.



Bad Boy by Carolina Herrera was launched in 2019.

product_name: Carolina Herrera Carolina Herrera Eau de Toilette
description:
Carolina Herrera by Carolina Herrera by Carolina Herrera is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1988. Created by Carlos Benaim, Clement Gavarry and Rosendo Mateu. Carolina Herrera will make any woman feel more beautiful and confident. This scent blends a fresh fruity top notes with a sophisticated middle note of wildflowers and a base of sensual woods. This scent gives off a scent that is both fresh and elegant. A perfect pick for those who love to wear fragrances that are a little more refined.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Apricot, Orange Blossom, Green note:, Brazilian Rosewood and Bergamot
Middle note: Indian Tuberose, Jasmine, Spanish Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Honeysuckle, Narcissus, Hiacynth and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Civet, Musk, Oakmoss, Amber, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Cedar

product_name: Carven Paris Séville Eau de Parfum
description:
Carven Paris Séville Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Paris Séville by Carven is a fresh citrusy fragrance for women.



Séville resembles a beautiful dance - feisty yet delicate with fresh notes of bergamot and sweet mandarin orange in the opening, a heart of green tea, light neroli and green leafy vine notes wrapped in a cloud of warm sensual woody notes and alluring musk.



Madam Carven loves to travel - this was the inspiration behind the Paris line. This variation of Paris takes us to Séville, a city famous for its love of flamenco dancing.



Paris Séville by Carven was launched in 2017.

product_name: Cerruti 1881 Deodorant Stick
description:
Cerruti 1881 Deodorant Stick 75ml
1881 by Cerruti is an aromatic fougere fragrance for men.



1881 by Cerruti is an Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men that is now known as a classical male scent due to its popularity since its conception over 30 years ago.



Cerruti 1881 pour homme is composed of woody, herbal, earthy and spicy notes that are perfect for getting you noticed.



In contrast to Cerruti 1881 pour femme, the opening notes of this male version are dry and fresh with green and citrusy accords. Then the middle notes of sweet ylang-ylang and black currant are balanced perfectly by herbal notes of juniper and cypress. While the base wraps it up a classy floral undercurrent.



This masculine gem comes in a heavy flacon with a rugged finish and “1881” etched on - the perfect vessel for this crisp, clean, slightly powdery, blue-green aromatic fragrance.

.

product_name: Cerruti 1881 Eau de Toilette
description:
1881 Men by Cerruti is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 1990. The nose behind this fragrance is Martin Gras. A rich and elegant fragrance for men, 1881 by Cerruti is a wonderful way to create an impression. A masculine scent that is sure to become a staple in any man's wardrobe.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Juniper, Cypress, Lavender, Bergamot, Carnation, Elemi resin and Galbanum
Middle note: Vetiver, Ylang-Ylang, Rose, Lily-of-the-Valley and Cassia
Base note: Oakmoss, Pine Tree, Cedar, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Musk and Pepper

Chloé Eau de Parfum Naturelle by Chloé is a floral fragrance for women.

product_name: Chloé Love Story Eau de Parfum
description:
Chloé Love Story Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Love Story by Chloe is a white floral fragrance for women.



At the first spray you’ll get hints of neroli, grapefruit, citruses and orange blossom, before the fragrance develops into a rich floral scent with notes of rose and white flowers. The musky base is soft and subtle, making Love Story a sophisticated yet simple gorgeous perfume.



The beautiful bottle is shaped like a padlock with feminine gold and pink details. The design was inspired by the romantic bridge of the Pont des Arts in Paris, where lovers place a padlock to symbolise their eternal love.



Love Story Eau de Parfum was launched by Chloe in 2014, followed by the Eau de Toilette in 2016. This kept the original floral formula, with added hints of plum blossom and nasturcia.

product_name: Chloé Love Story Eau de Parfum
description:

At the first spray you’ll get hints of neroli, grapefruit, citruses and orange blossom, before the fragrance develops into a rich floral scent with notes of rose and white flowers. The musky base is soft and subtle, making Love Story a sophisticated yet simple gorgeous perfume.



The beautiful bottle is shaped like a padlock with feminine gold and pink details. The design was inspired by the romantic bridge of the Pont des Arts in Paris, where lovers place a padlock to symbolise their eternal love.



Love Story Eau de Parfum was launched by Chloe in 2014, followed by the Eau de Toilette in 2016. This kept the original floral formula, with added hints of plum blossom and nasturcia.

product_name: Chloé Nomade Eau de Parfum
description:
Chloé Nomade Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Nomade by Chloé is a chypre and floral fragrance for women.



A constantly evolving fragrance; at first you get fruity, citrusy, creamy notes, then it transforms into an extravagantly clean freesia and rose before, hours later, you are left with an earthy dry scent.



Nomade is for the cool chick traveller, it is laid back, adventurous and complex – a great all year round fragrance.



Nomade was launched by Chloé in 2018.

product_name: Chloé Signature Eau de Parfum
description:
Chloé Signature Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Chloé Signature by Chloé is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



The top notes of fresh litchi, peony and freesia add an air of sophistication while the floral heart of rose, magnolia and lily-of-the-valley expertly plays against the seductive base consisting of warm amber and dark Virginia cedar.



Chloe Signature, or simply Chloé, is a new take on the vintage masterpiece of the same name. It is a light and fresh scent that still manages to be seductively strong and self-possessed.



Chloé Signature by Chloé was launched in 2008.

description:
Chloé Signature Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Chloé Signature by Chloé is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



The top notes of fresh litchi, peony and freesia add an air of sophistication while the floral heart of rose, magnolia and lily-of-the-valley expertly plays against the seductive base consisting of warm amber and dark Virginia cedar.



Chloe Signature, or simply Chloé, is a new take on the vintage masterpiece of the same name. It is a light and fresh scent that still manages to be seductively strong and self-possessed.



Chloé Signature by Chloé was launched in 2008.

Chopard Casmir Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Casmir by Chopard is an oriental, vanilla fragrance for women.



This soft and sensual scent opens with creamy notes of peach, apricot and raspberries which quickly blend into a spicy oriental heart before wrapping you in a smooth base of vanilla, sandalwood, musk and amber.



Casmir by Chopard was launched in 1992 and comes in a decadent glass bottle with a decorated metal cap.

product_name: Chopard Wish Eau de Parfum
description:
Chopard Wish Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Wish by Chopard is an oriental vanilla fragrance for women.



The scent is elegant yet playful blend crafted from indulgent sweet notes of caramel, vanilla, honey, toffee balanced with milk, patchouli, incense and coconut. Notes of yuzu, pear, gooseberry and wild strawberry give freshness and in combination with distinctive floral notes, it is a scent with more layers and pleasant surprises than you could ever wish for.



Wish was launched by Chopard in 1999 and comes in a striking blue glass bottle in the shape of a diamond.

product_name: Christian Clive 1872 Men Eau de Parfum
description:
Christian Clive 1872 Men Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
1872 Men by Clive Christian is a citrus aromatic fragrance for men, build on old perfume tradition.



It contains notes of lime, grapefruit, petitgrain, rosemary, bergamot, galbanum, mandarin orange, pineapple, peach, lavender, pepper, nutmeg, cyclamne, clary sage, freesia, cedar, patchouli, tagetes, jasmine, French labdanum, obiladum, amber and musk.



1872 Men was sold for the first time in 1872,

product_name: Christina Aguilera By Night Eau de Parfum
description:
Christina Aguilera By Night Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
By Night by Christina Aguilera is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



The scent mixes sweet and flowery notes of pineapple, tangerine, rhubarb, freesia, red apple, lily-of-the-valley, peach blossom and heliotrope on a warming base of vanilla and woods. This is a more sensual and passionate version of the original Christina Aguilera perfume from 2007.



By Night by Christina Aguilera was launched in 2009.

product_name: Christina Aguilera Eau de Parfum
description:
Christina Aguilera by Christina Aguilera is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2007. This subtle and captivating scent is a perfect way to start off any day, or to end it. It is the perfect blend of feminine and sensual, with a hint of floral notes. It is a fragrance for the woman who's love is unforgettable.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Black Currant, Exotic Fruits, Tangerine and Pineapple
Middle note: Plum, Peony and Jasmine
Base note: Vanilla, White Musk and Amber

product_name: Christina Aguilera Glam X Body Lotion
description:
Christina Aguilera Glam X Body Lotion 150ml
GLAM X is a floral gourmand delight that marries extravagant ingredients to create complex layers of textures while showcasing Christina's multi-faceted personality and unleashing your inner glam. ''I want GLAM X to allow women to embrace and explore what makes them feel the most sexy and confident, both inside and out. When creating this scent, I drew inspiration from my own passions and experiences not only as a performer but also as a woman. This vibrant, seductive scent will leave those around you intrigued and wanting more'' - Christina Aguilera.

Secret Potion by Christina Aguilera was launched 2011.

product_name: Clarins Anti-Ageing Face Double Serum
description:
Clarins Anti-Ageing Face Double Serum 75ml
Double Serum by Clarins. The most recent advances from Clarins Research. The ultimate age-control, anti-wrinkle, extra-firming skin care treatment.



2 age-defying formulas in 1 groundbreaking serum. Thanks to its dual-phase formula which provides the most effective concentration of plant extracts.



Reactivates skin's 5 vital functions: hydration, nutrition, oxygenation, protection and revitalization.



Day after day, skin is firmer, replenished, more youthful-looking and the complexion appears more radiant.



The best of nature and science.

The Clarins skincare system provides some of the best beauty and salon skincare treatments on the market. They have been a leading skincare brand for over forty years and it is this experience that makes it one of the most popular designer, male and female skincare, cosmetics and fragrance brands. product_name: Clarins Eau des Jardins Eau de Soins
description:
Clarins Eau des Jardins Eau de Soins 100ml Spray
Eau des Jardins from Clarins is an aromatic fragrance for women.



A fragrance with skincare benefits – what’s not to like?!? This is the third treatment fragrance launched by the House of Clarins. The first being Eau Dynamisante from 1987 and the second, Eau Ressourçante, from 2003, followed by Eau des Jardins from 2010. All saturated in generous helpings of natural ingredients which serve to moisturise, stimulate, tone, soften and soothe the skin.



With Eau des Jardins you get moisturizing oils combined with fresh citrus fruits on an earthy base that will linger on your skin for hours. Throughout the day you’ll get woody whispers from your perfume, not overpowering but pleasant and barely there hints, just enough to keep you intrigued.



Clarins launched Eau des Jardins in 2010.

product_name: Clinique Aromatics Elixir Body Smoother
description:
Clinique Aromatics Elixir Body Smoother 200ml
Aromatics Elixir by Clinique is a chypre floral fragrance for women.



A classic scent from the House of Clinique, Aromatics Elixir is seductive, powerful, serene and confident. It has an opening of bitter green herbs, which blends into the sweet floral heart with of notes of geranium, rose and white flowers. Chamomile acts as a link that holds the scent together while the base of oakmoss and patchouli ensure you have a truly magnificent scent.



The Clinique Aromatics Elixir perfume was launched in 1971 and is one of the very first scents the brand launched. It has been described as being the fragrance for the women who don’t follow trends, for the ones who don’t mind leaving an imprint, the woman who knows her own worth.

product_name: Clinique Aromatics Elixir Eau de Parfum
description:
Aromatics Elixir by Clinique is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1971. The nose behind this fragrance is Bernard Chant. This delightful perfume for women is perfect for every day wear. The soft scent is light and refreshing and is sure to become a favorite among women. The pleasant scent is perfect for situations when you want to smell clean and crisp. It's gentle enough for everyday wear, but also perfect for special occasions.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Chamomile, Aldehydes, Clary Sage, Coriander, Geranium, Lemon Verbena, Brazilian Rosewood and Bergamot
Middle note: Carnation, Rose, Ylang-Ylang, Orris Root, Jasmine, Tuberose and Orange Blossom
Base note: Oakmoss, Patchouli, Incense, Vetiver, Sandalwood and Musk

description:
Clinique Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator 50ml
New and improved formula that offers longer hydration, for up to 12 hours.

With new micor-molecules, Moisture Surge Extended Thirst Relief allows quicker and more efficient moisturisation. It gives an immediate moisture boost and plumps up the skin`s resistance to fine, dry lines. The crème moisturises and soothes dry skin. It intensifies benefits of moisturising, instantly refreshes skin, and calms the skin, leaving it feeling smoother and softer.

A comfortable and versatile creme for all skin types; lightweight; absorbs quickly.

product_name: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Eau de Toilette
description:
CR7 by Cristiano Ronaldo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2017. It is a unique fragrance from the world's most famous footballer, Cristiano Ronaldo, that has captured the world's attention. Inspired by his enthusiasm for fashion, his love of travel and his passion for the game. This fragrance expresses his unique personality. It is a powerful and masculine scent that captures the essence of Cristiano Ronaldo.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lavender, Cardamom, Artemisia and Bergamot
Middle note: Tobacco, Cedar, Cinnamon and Iris
Base note: Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Amber

Rapport Sport by Dana is a fresh fragrance for men.



This sporty fragrance is masculine and light. It contains a zesty blend of lemon, bergamot and spearmint. The slightly sweeter heart is made up on jasmine, vanilla and ripe plums and is contrasted with an aromatic blend of cumin and nutmeg. product_name: David & Victoria Beckham Intimately Men Deodorant Spray
description:
David & Victoria Beckham Intimately Men Deodorant Spray 150ml
Intimately Beckham Men is an aromatic fougere fragrance for men.



The Eau de Toilette opens with notes of bergamot, grapefruit zest and cardamom followed by accords of aromatic nutmeg, violet and star anise on a base of sandalwood, amber and patchouli.



The seductive aftershave won several prices at the FIFI awards 2008, including the prestigious award for “Fragrance of the Year Men’s Popular Appeal”. Face of the campaign is football legend and style icon David Beckham, who also provided the inspiration behind this elegant and playful composition.



Intimately Beckham Men was introduced in 2008.

product_name: David & Victoria Beckham Intimately Men Eau de Toilette
description:
Intimately Beckham Men by David Beckham is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2006. This perfume is the winner of 2 awards: FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men's Popular Appeal 2008 and FiFi Award Best Packaging Men's Popular Appeal 2008. The scent of the perfume was created by perfumers Calice Becker and Sophia Grojsman. For the composition of this perfume, the perfect combination of masculine and feminine notes, the fragrances of amber, patchouli and musk, were selected. The result is a unique, masculine scent which is pleasantly elegant, sophisticated and contemporary.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Cardamom, Bergamot and Grapefruit
Middle note: Nutmeg, Violet and Star Anise
Base note: Sandalwood, Amber and Patchouli

product_name: David Beckham Beyond Eau de Toilette
description:
Beyond by David Beckham is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2015. A fragrance by Nelly Hachem-Ruiz. Beyond is a classic blend of clean, fresh and woody notes. The balance of citrus, herbs and spices creates a fragrance that is as masculine and fresh as it is seductive and sensual. The opening is immediately refreshing and calming. The heart and base of spices, woody notes makes this a scent that is both warm and very sensual.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mojito, Cardamom and Grapefruit
Middle note: Black Pepper, Cedar and Geranium
Base note: Vanilla, Leather and Patchouli

product_name: David Beckham Beyond Forever Eau de Toilette
description:
Beyond Forever by David Beckham is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. This masculine fragrance has a clean, fresh scent that will be captivating and memorable to those who experience it.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note:  Nutmeg, Bergamot and Elemi resin
Middle note: Violet, Immortelle and Fern
Base note: Vetiver, Leather and Patchouli

product_name: David Beckham Classic Blue Eau de Toilette
description:
David Beckham Classic Blue Eau de Toilette 60ml Spray
David Beckham’s Classic Blue is a woody chypre fragrance for men.



The scent mixes classic aftershave notes with exotic pineapple, zesty grapefruit and violet, clary sage, geranium and apple on a base of patchouli, moss and cashmere wood. Classic Blue Eau de Toilette can be seen as the more playful and rebellious brother to the original Classic cologne, introduced by the football legend the previous year.



Classic Blue was added to the David Beckham perfume collection in 2014.

description:

product_name: David Beckham Classic Body Spray
description:
David Beckham Classic Body Spray 150ml
Classic is a woody-aromatic David Beckham fragrance for men.



The Eau de Toilette is the first scent from the collection of the same name and combines elegant notes of wood and spices with exciting accords of gin tonic, lime, mint and ambermax. Beckham himself has described the perfume as a modern classic. David Beckham is the face of the campaign. Designed as an ode to the football superstar’s celebrated style and personality, the aftershave embodies confidence and playfulness.



David Beckham Classic was introduced in 2013.

product_name: David Beckham Classic Eau de Toilette
description:
Classic by David Beckham is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Aurelien Guichard. Choose this sporty fragrance from David Beckham to match your style. This classic fragrance is designed to help you stand out from the crowd. The masculine scent is designed to fit any occasion. A scent that will make you feel confident and sexy.

Fragrance Notes:

Middle note: Mint, Cypress and Nutmeg

David Beckham Homme is a woody spicy fragrance for men.



The exciting composition opens with fragrant notes of citruses, Sichuan pepper and ginger on a heart of aromatic leather, cashmere wood and rosemary and a base of elegant mahogany, musk and patchouli.



The aftershave was designed as the ultimate signature scent for the modern man. Football and style icon Beckham describes the Eau de Toilette as epitomising his style on and off the pitch – elegant, contemporary and exciting. The perfume was created in collaboration with Coty.



David Beckham Homme was launched in 2011.

product_name: David Beckham Follow Your Instinct Eau de Toilette
description:
David Beckham Follow Your Instinct Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Follow Your Instinct by David Beckham is a woody aromatic fragrance for men.



Trust your gut and Follow Your Instinct with this fragrance, its playful, light and slightly fruity. The fragrance performs at its best in warmer weather so it’s a great scent for spring/summertime.



You’ll get burst of orange and mandarin orange in the opening before the heart joins in. Star anise is mixed with allspice and cardamom before heading into the base of haitian vetiver, patchouli and white amber.



Follow Your Instinct was launched in 2019.

product_name: Davidoff Cool Water All-Over Body Spray
description:
Davidoff Cool Water All-Over Body Spray 150ml
Cool Water by Davidoff is a fresh, aquatic and woody fragrance for men.



Back in the day, most fragrances for men were intense powerhouse scents; that is until Davidoff broke the mold and launched Cool Water. The first of its kind, a unique fresh and uplifting masculine fragrance with a confident opening of sea water, lavender and mint. These soon mix with the heart of geranium, neroli, jasmine, and sandalwood. The base doesn’t disappoint with notes of cedar wood, musk, amber, and tobacco.



Davidoff’s Cool Water scent for men doesn’t just come in the original Eau de Toilette. Try the deodorant spray which keeps the classic aroma with a slightly less intense composition, or the Cool Water aftershave balm – perfect to minimise razor burn while hydrating the skin.



Cool Water by Davidoff was launched in 1988.

product_name: Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette
description:
Cool Water by Davidoff is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1988. A fragrance by Pierre Bourdon. It is a crisp clean, refreshing and masculine fragrance with the freshness of the sea water. It is the essence of manhood with its masculine character and sensual elegance. It has a refreshing uplifting fragrance that is perfect for any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Sea water, Lavender, Mint, Green note:, Calone, Rosemary and Coriander
Middle note: Sandalwood, Neroli, Geranium and Jasmine
Base note: Musk, Tobacco, Oakmoss, Cedar and Amber

product_name: Davidoff Cool Water Woman Eau de Toilette
description:
Cool Water Woman is a floral perfume for woman by Davidoff. Launched in 1996 and the fragrance was created by perfumer Pierre Bourdon. It is a fragrance that speaks to the woman who loves to be in touch with her femininity. Boost your confidence with this crisp clean, refreshing, uplifting juice. The soft floral notes of jasmine, lily, and rose add a sensual note that is irresistibly inviting.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Ozonic note:, Citrus, Pinapple, Blackcurrent, Honeydew Melon, Lotus Blossom, Water Lily
Middle note: May Rose, Jasmine, Muguet
Base note: Orris, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Peach, Mulberry

product_name: Davidoff Hot Water Eau de Toilette
description:
Davidoff Hot Water Eau de Toilette 60ml Spray
Hot Water by Davidoff is an oriental fragrance for men.



The opening is quite fresh thanks to the basil and absynthe, while the pimento adds spice to the heart. The base is an alluring mix of styrax and benzoin. All in all, this is a subtle spicy fragrance; it is aromatic, balsamic and fresh, ideal if you want a scent that is warm and inviting.



Hot Water by Davidoff was launched in 2009.

product_name: Davidoff The Game Eau de Toilette
description:
The Game by Davidoff is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. The Game was launched in 2012. The Game was created by Bernard Ellena, Lucas Sieuzac and Nathalie Feisthauer. This fragrance is meant to invigorate and arouses a man's natural senses. Perfect for a night out on the town or a long day at the office, this invigorating fragrance is a must-have for the man who can't get enough of life.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Juniper Berries and Gin
Middle note: Iris and Precious Woods
Base note: Ebony Wood

product_name: Davidoff Zino Eau de Toilette
description:
Zino Davidoff by Davidoff is a Amber Woody fragrance for men. Launched in 1986. The nose behind this fragrance is Michel Almairac. This masculine and sophisticated scent is a wonderful way to enhance the way you smell. Formulated with a blend of spices and woodsy notes, it's an enticing scent that will become a favorite. This is a great option for men who want to bring out the best in their looks and smell.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Brazilian Rosewood, Lavender, Clary Sage and Bergamot
Middle note: Rose, Geranium, Jasmine and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla and Cedar

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious Eau de Toilette
description:
DKNY Be Delicious Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Be Delicious by DKNY is a fresh fragrance for women.



The original Be Delicious is a perfect mix of fresh and sweet with notes of green apple, cucumber and grapefruit mixed with lily of the valley, magnolia, tuberose, rose and tuberose on a base of amber, woods and sandalwood.



The highly recognisable apple-shaped bottle is now one the world's top-selling scents and even with the many special editions that have been released the original Be Delicious remains the most popular.



Be Delicious was launched in 2004.

DKNY Be Tempted Eau So Blush Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Be Tempted Eau So Blush by DKNY is a fresh and floral fragrance for women.



This lovely fruity addition to the Be Tempted collection combines slightly bolder and modern notes with the original blend of the 2004 launch.



The scent conveys confident and sexy women with the playful blend of pink grapefruit, peony, blood orange, red currant, magnolia, jasmine, woody notes, musk and apricot.



DKNY Be Tempted Eau So Blush was launched in 2016.

product_name: DKNY Golden Delicious Eau de Parfum
description:
DKNY Golden Delicious by Donna Karan is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 2010. Inspired by luxury and splendor. It's a popular choice for women who are looking for a fresh and feminine fragrance. A soft scent that is not overpowering, this perfume helps to perk up your everyday look. The perfect way to create an alluring and enticing fragrance experience, use with confidence and feel the difference.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Apple, African Orange Flower and Plum
Middle note: Lily-of-the-Valley, Lily, Orchid and Rose
Base note: Sandalwood, Musk and Teak Wood

description:

A provocative and captivating fragrance, this one is a must-have for any woman who wants to be noticed. Wear with a signature look to make a lasting impression.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Dolce Garden Eau de Parfum
description:
Dolce Garden by Dolce&Gabbana is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Violaine Collas. A sensual and elegant fragrance, this is a top choice for those seeking a light and feminine scent. The sweet and fresh scent is the perfect choice for any special occasion. Middle note: Coconut, Frangipani and Ylang-Ylang

Dolce & Gabbana Dolce Shine Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
Dolce Shine by Dolce & Gabbana is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



The fragrance opens up with notes of mango, grapefruit and quince, followed by a heart of jasmine, orange blossom and tuberose, before drying down on a base of white musk, Australian sandalwood and white woods.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana K Eau de Parfum
description:
K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum by Dolce&Gabbana is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. K was launched in 2020. This is a best seller with an invigorating, masculine, bold scent that is sure to catch the attention of everyone around you. It's a fragrance that is sure to impress and inspire confidence. Dolce & Gabbana has produced a scent that is both modern and classic.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Orange, Juniper Berries, Pimento, Lemon, Sicilian Lemon and Cardamom
Middle note: Fig Nectar, Geranium, Lavender and Clary Sage
Base note: Patchouli, Cedar, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Vetiver

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana K Gift Set 100ml EDT + 10ml EDT + 50ml Aftershave Balm
description:
Dolce & Gabbana K Gift Set 100ml EDT + 10ml EDT + 50ml Aftershave Balm
K by Dolce & Gabbana is an aromatic and woody fragrance for men.



The modern fragrance opens with fresh citruses, including blood orange, Sicilian lemon and juniper berries. The aromatic heart warms the scent with notes of pimento, clary sage, geranium and lavender, while the base rests on woody notes of cedar, vetiver and patchouli.



The charming aftershave has been described as a fragrance that captures the essence of man.



K was launched by Dolce & Gabbana in 2019.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense Eau de Parfum
description:
Light Blue Eau Intense by Dolce&Gabbana is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Light Blue Intense was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Inspired by the Italian countryside, this fresh and light fragrance is a perfect choice for spring and summer. The scent is soft and light, enveloping your body with a captivating and inviting scent. Its aroma is characterized by a blend of sweet lemon and the essential oil of vetiver, a woody, earthy scent. The scent is very subtle and warm, perfect for any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon and Granny Smith apple
Middle note: Jasmine and Marigold
Base note: Musk and Amberwood

Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Forever Eau de Parfum 25ml Spray
Light Blue Forever by Dolce & Gabbana is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



The fragrance contains notes of lemon, green apple, blood orange, white flowers, orange blossom, white musk, cedar and cashmeran.



Light Blue Forever was launched by Dolce & Gabbana in 2021.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme Body Spray
description:
Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme Body Spray 125ml
Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme is an aromatic citrus scent for men.



Combining fresh notes of juicy Italian citrus fruits like bergamot, lemon and mandarin with aromatic juniper the fragrance opens with a top note reminiscent of a fresh sea breeze on the Amalfi coast with a heart of rosemary, pepper and rosewood on a strong base of musk, oak moss and incense.



Light Blue Pour Homme is a classic summer fragrance with the unmistakable Dolce & Gabbana character at the heart of the composition. Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue was released in 2007.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Parfum
description:
The One Eau de Toilette by Dolce&Gabbana is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. The One was launched in 2017. A fragrance by Michel Girard. The One Eau de Parfum is a beautiful, sensual and refined fragrance for women. The sensual notes will make you feel seductive and beautiful. This stunning fragrance is sure to make a lasting impression, day after day. One of the best sellers.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: White Peach, Litchi, Mandarin Orange and Bergamot Blossom
Middle note: Lily, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Lily-of-the-Valley and Broom
Base note: Vanilla, Amber, Musk, Vetiver and Moss

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Toilette
description:
Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Toilette 150ml Spray
The One by Dolce & Gabbana is fresh and spicy oriental fragrance for men.



The One is a warm and masculine fragrance with notes of bergamot, coriander, basil, cardamom, ginger, neroli, cedar, ambergris and tobacco. The scent has a fresh citrus opening which is followed by a spicy heart on a warm and woody base. Actor Matthew McConaughey is the face of the fragrance.



The One by Dolce & Gabbana was launched in 2008.
