product_name: Dolce & Gabbana The Only One Eau de Parfum
description:
Dolce & Gabbana The Only One Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
The Only One by Dolce & Gabbana is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



A unique powdery aroma that captures the heart of mesmerizing femininity with unexpected contrasting notes that prove opposites attract. The scent opens with natural accords of violet and bergamot which blend into the surprising heart of iris and coffee. The sweet and feminine base consists of patchouli enriched with vanilla.



This Eau de Parfum is a new variation of The One, which was originally released in 2006. This new version is even more sophisticated, which makes this fragrance “The Only One” for you.



British actress and Game of Thrones star Emilia Clarke is the face of the campaign; she was featured in a one minute short film in which she sang a cover of the classical Italian song “Quando, quando, quando”.



The Only One was launched by Dolce & Gabbana in 2018.

product_name: DSquared2 Wood For Him Eau de Toilette
description:
DSquared2 Wood For Him Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Wood For Him by DSquared² is a woody and aromatic fragrance for men.



A fresh-out-of-shower scent; it is a pleasant woody fragrance with a hint of citrus and violet leaves for added freshness.



Top notes of Calabrian bergamot, mandarin orange and Sicilian lemon is enhanced by a sensual mix of gentle ginger notes, cardamom and violet leaf in the heart. The base is a modern blend of vetiver, white woods and ambroxan.



The bottle is sturdy and heavy with a unique handmade magnetic cap made of wood.



Wood For Him was launched by DSquared² in 2018.

product_name: Dunhill Desire Blue Eau de Toilette
description:
Dunhill Desire Blue Eau de Toilette 100ml Spray
Desire Blue by Dunhill is an aromatic fragrance for men.



The green scent opens with fruity and floral accords, including litchi, mandarin, lotus and bergamot before melting into a fresh heart with notes of orange, Brazilian rosewood and sea notes. The aftershave dries on a base of tonka bean, amber, musk and benzoin for a mature finish to a beautifully fresh scent.



Desire Blue by Dunhill was launched in 2002.

product_name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Gift Set 50ml EDP + 75ml Body Lotion
description:
Elie Saab Le Parfum Gift Set 50ml EDP + 75ml Body Lotion
Le Parfum by Elie Saab is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



Elie Saab comes from a Mediterranean city, a place bathed in heat and light and surrounded by vibrant delicious scents from the nature. One of Elie’s most prominent memories from home is the smell of orange blossom; when the wind blew through the orange trees close to his childhood home, Elie would be surrounded by the earthy scent of orange blossom and so his first fragrance is an ode to this lovely note.



Le Parfum is a very feminine, soft, pretty and bright perfume with dominating notes of jasmine and orange blossom. The honey is there to give the florals a subtle sweetness while the patchouli, roses, and woody notes ensure you get a rounded, well blended fragrance.



Le Parfum EDP was launched in 2011 followed by the Eau de Toiette in 2012. The EDT is a lighter version, with less honey. It is softer and more floral.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules Daily Youth Restoring Eye Serum 60 capsules
description:
Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules Daily Youth Restoring Eye Serum 60 capsules
Advanced Ceramide by Elizabeth Arden is a collection of anti-ageing skincare products.



If you are looking for powerful anti-ageing products, the Advanced Ceramide series promise visible results in just two weeks. Ceramides are natural lipids that decrease over time as we age. This causes wrinkles, lines and dryness.



This collection has been clinically proved to restore the skin from its core for a younger and firmer looking appearance. The most famous products from this collection are the easy-to-use Youth Capsules that leave you with a long lasting youthful glow.

Ceramides are natural lipids that decrease over time as we age. This causes wrinkles, lines and dryness. product_name: Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Hand Cream
description:
Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Hand Cream 75ml
The Eight Hour Cream collection by Elizabeth Arden is an award-winning series of skincare products.



It all started with one multi-purpose balm that quickly became world famous for its benefits. It soothes anything from chapped lips to bruises. Elizabeth Arden created the balm herself in 1930 and named it the Eight Hour Cream after a loyal client discovered its healing benefits in such a short amount of time.



What made it so effective was the combination of vaseline and beta-hydroxy combined with vitamin E. After all of these years, the brand still uses the exact same formula that Elizabeth herself created as the basis for their line. Since that very first creation they have launched an entire skincare range including moisturisers, lip balms and more.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Fifth Avenue After Five Eau de Parfum
description:
Elizabeth Arden Fifth Avenue After Five Eau de Parfum 125ml Spray
Fifth Avenue After Five by Elizabeth Arden is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



The scent is part of the popular collection 5th Avenue. This special edition is inspired by the romanticism of New York City in the evening hours, which Elizabeth Arden translated in a soft, clean and powdery aroma.



Honeysuckle, coriander and plum introduce a floral heart of jasmine, lily of the valley, lotus and saffron, which dry with notes of birch, sandalwood, musk and tonka.



After 5 is the best time to enjoy the exciting nature of the big apple, and this fragrance will make sure you’ll feel just as delighted, regardless of where you are!



5th Avenue After Five was launched by Elizabeth Arden in 2005.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Fifth Avenue Eau de Parfum
description:
Elizabeth Arden Fifth Avenue Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
Fifth Avenue is a floral fragrance for women.



The scent is a great blend of floral notes such as linden blossom, lily of the valley, lilac and magnolia on a woody base of sandalwood, cloves and musk. The fragrance, sometimes referred to as 5th Avenue, is inspired by the women you'll see on the titular New York street, which is one the most famous shopping streets in the world.



Elizabeth Arden Fifth Avenue was launched in 1996 in collaboration with the legendary perfumer Ann Gottlieb.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Body Lotion
description:
Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Body Lotion 100ml
Green Tea by Elizabeth Arden is a fresh and aromatic fragrance for women.



A classic green refreshing scent that never goes out of style! Green Tea is your everyday fragrance, clean, light-hearted and feminine.



The aroma is built on top notes of citruses, mint and rhubarb, with a fresh spicy heart of jasmine, oakmoss, musk, fennel and carnation, which rest on powdery accords of amber, caraway and green tea.



This Elizabeth Arden bestseller was released in several editions incorporating new exciting ingredients like bamboo, yuzu, and fig. The original Green Tea formula has also been used in body products, including refreshing body lotion and hand cream.



Green Tea was launched by Elizabeth Arden in 1999.

Elizabeth Arden Holiday Fragrance Gift Set 10ml Red Door EDT + 10ml White Tea EDT + 15ml Green Tea Scent Spray
Red Door by Elizabeth Arden is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



The scent is a mix of no less than 23 floral and woody notes, with honey, rose, carnation, tuberose and sandalwood being the most prominent. Red Door has become the signature perfume of the brand and has been a best-seller ever since it first launched. The scent gets its name from the Elizabeth Arden's Red Door Spa Centres.



Red Door was launched in 1989 and has since been launched in many different editions as well as gift sets.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Pretty Eau de Parfum
description:
Elizabeth Arden Pretty Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Pretty by Elizabeth Arden is a white floral fragrance for women.



True to its name, Pretty is just that, a pretty fragrance. It’s inoffensive with a subtle charm that makes you smile. It won’t scream from the rooftops, rather wrap you in a fine misty cloud that’s light and delicate.



The pretty flacon was inspired by a flower vase, so it’s no wonder that the content of Pretty is a lovely floral scent. The opening is clean and fresh with accords of orange blossom and peach, while the heart is a gentle bouquet of peony, jasmine ad lily. At the base you find serene woody notes.



Pretty was launched by Elizabeth Arden in 2009.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Provocative Woman Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Provocative Woman by Elizabeth Arden is a sweet and floral fragrance for women.



The top notes introduce the scent with juicy peach, raspberries, ginger, lotus and quince, followed by middle notes of exotic papaya, apricot, orchid and pink freesia. The sweet, floral heart melt on a base of red amber, white tea, cedar, hinoki and sandalwood.



This beautiful Elizabeth Arden perfume was inspired by the face of the campaign, Catherine Zeta-Jones and her seductive beauty and iconic look; perfect for any women who want that extra boost of confidence.



Provocative Woman was launched by Elizabeth Arden in 2004.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Red Door Aura Eau de Toilette
description:
Elizabeth Arden Red Door Aura Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Red Door Aura by Elizabeth Arden is a fresh and floral fragrance for women.



Make no mistake, this is not just another spin-off from the original Red Door. You will find some original Red Door DNA in Aura, but you’ll notice it is truly its own scent with a softer, sweeter mixture and underlying fruity notes.



The opening is fresh, fruity and flirty. It then develops into a warmer, spicy and musky fragrance where you’ll still note slight hints of raspberry. A truly amazing concoction that’s sure to delight your nose day after day.



Red Door Aura by Elizabeth Arden was launched in 2012.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Sunflowers Body Mist
description:
Elizabeth Arden Sunflowers Body Mist 235ml Spray
Elizabeth Arden Sunflowers is a fresh, floral and woody fragrance for women.





The opening of the Sunflowers perfume is a winning combination of fruity peach and melon, fresh citrusy lemon, bergamot, mandarin orange and orange blossom and smooth Brazilian rosewood. As you move into the heart, you are met with floral notes of rose, jasmine, orris root, osmanthus and cyclamen, which blends into a delightful mix of woody notes at the base, including musk, sandalwood, amber, cedar and oakmoss.





Sunflowers by Elizabeth Arden was launched in 1993 and is available as an Eau de Toilette, sun drops body cream and affordable gift sets. The fragrance is sweet, crisp and refreshing; perfect to capture the scent of summer.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Refining Moisture Cream
description:
Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Refining Moisture Cream 75ml
Visible Difference is a skincare collection by Elizabeth Arden.



Using their over 100 years of research, the brand created a skin balancing range that includes creams and serums that help to clearly improve the appearance of the skin.



The collection gained its name due to scientific testing that shows a significant improvement in moisture and ageing line reduction. The products soothe, comfort and leave your skin smooth, supple and radiant.



The award winning Visible Difference series quickly became a favourite among skincare fans and continues to gain converts thanks to its dependable results and excellent value for money.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden Vitamin C Ceramide Capsules Radiance Renewal Serum - 60 Capsules
description:
Elizabeth Arden Vitamin C Ceramide Capsules Radiance Renewal Serum - 60 Capsules
Ceramide by Elizabeth Arden is a collection of anti-ageing skincare products.



Elizabeth Arden has created an innovative range of products that targets anti-ageing to diminish lines and wrinkles and boost a more youthful, glowing complexion.



Ceramides are natural lipids that decrease over time as we age. This causes wrinkles, lines and dryness. This collection has been clinically proved to restore the skin from its core for a younger and firmer looking appearance by minimising the appearance of pores, improve radiance and moisturise the skin.



The range includes a variety of products, including creams, firming gels, overnight masks, serums and so much more.

product_name: Elizabeth Arden White Tea Pure Indulgence Body Cream
description:
Elizabeth Arden White Tea Pure Indulgence Body Cream 400ml
White Tea by Elizabeth Arden is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



This exquisite fragrance is inspired by the simple pleasure experienced at the first sip of tea. It captures the elegance and intricate flavours of white tea with crispy top notes of juicy Italian mandarin orange, fern, clary sage and vibrant sea breeze accords. Its peaceful heart is made of aromatic white tea, mate and delicate white iris that lead to a feminine and harmonious base of amber, ambrette, tonka bean and sensual exotic woods.



White Tea is a fabulous and blissful addition to the Elizabeth Arden fragrance collection and it is the perfect scent for the modern woman who has the desire to indulge in warm memories and loves the delicate and refreshing aroma of white tea.



White Tea was launched by Elizabeth Arden in 2017.

product_name: Estee Lauder Beautiful Eau de Parfum
description:
Beautiful by Estée Lauder is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1985. Beautiful was created by Sophia Grojsman, Bernard Chant and Max Gavarry. This feminine fragrance will instantly awaken your senses. You will feel relaxed and beautiful when you wear this perfume. The fresh and elegant scent is sure to please any woman. The bright and radiant scent will complement your everyday wear by adding a hint of sophistication to any outfit. For a refined and elegant scent that will stand out, Beautiful Eau de Parfum is the perfect choice.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rose, Galbanum, Lily, Black Currant, Fruity note:, Mandarin Orange, Cassia, Bergamot and Lemon
Middle note: Carnation, Tuberose, Marigold, Mimosa, Jasmine, Narcissus, Chamomile, Ylang-Ylang, Geranium, Lily-of-the-Valley, Orange Blossom, Lilac, Magnolia, Freesia, Pink Violet, Sage and Neroli

product_name: Estee Lauder Knowing Eau de Parfum
description:
Knowing by Estée Lauder is a Floral, woody fragrance for women. Launched in 1988. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean Kerleo. An earthy warm aroma. A captivating fragrance that combines the essence of amber and musk to create a rich scent that is both sensual and addictive. Ideal for all occasions and perfect for a night out on the town, this fragrance is sure to create an unforgettable experience.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Aldehydes, Mimosa, Rose, Coriander, Green note:, Plum, Tuberose and Melon
Middle note: Patchouli, Cardamom, Cedar, Bay Leaf, Orris Root, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Lily-of-the-Valley and Pitosporum
Base note: Oakmoss, Patchouli, Civet, Spices, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Amber, Orris Root and Musk

product_name: Estee Lauder Modern Muse Eau de Parfum
description:
Modern Muse by Estée Lauder is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Harry Fremont. Modern Muse is for an independent, confident woman. It is divine, sensual, uplifting, comforting. A blend of seductive florals and sensual woods leaves you feeling bold and fresh. Discover a refreshing floral scent with a woody base that is a modern classic. This perfume is perfect to accentuate her unique and stylish scent. Perfect for spring. It is recommended for day wear.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Jasmine Sambac, Chinese Jasmine, Lily, Honeysuckle, Flower Petals and Tuberose
Base note: Musk, Woody note:, Patchouli, Patchouli Leaf, Amber and Madagascar Vanilla

product_name: Estee Lauder Pleasures Eau de Parfum
description:
Pleasures by Estée Lauder is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1995. Pleasures was created by Annie Buzantian and Alberto Morillas. Pleasures reflects a modern woman's desire to experience life's every little pleasures. It is for every woman in every season and at every moment. A sophisticated and sensual fragrance, this feminine scent is designed to satisfy. The composition creates a provocative scent that is warm, elegant and seductive.

Fragrance Notes:

product_name: Estee Lauder Pleasures Eau de Parfum
description:
Pleasures by Estée Lauder is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1995. Pleasures was created by Annie Buzantian and Alberto Morillas. Pleasures reflects a modern woman's desire to experience life's every little pleasures. It is for every woman in every season and at every moment. A sophisticated and sensual fragrance, this feminine scent is designed to satisfy. The composition creates a provocative scent that is warm, elegant and seductive.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Green note:, Freesia, Pink Pepper, Violet, Violet Leaf, Tuberose and Red Berries
Middle note: Lily-of-the-Valley, Peony, Lilac, Lily, Rose, Jasmine, Geranium and Karo Karounde
Base note: Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood and Patchouli

product_name: Estée Lauder Pleasures Gift Set 100ml EDP + 30ml EDP + 30ml EDP
description:
Estée Lauder Pleasures Gift Set 100ml EDP + 30ml EDP + 30ml EDP
Pleasures by Estee Lauder is a fresh floral fragrance for women.



This delicate scent is introduced by a bouquet of while lily, violet leaves and green accords, followed by peony, roses, lilac, geranium and karo-karounde on a base of patchouli and sandalwood.



A best-seller for over 20 years, Pleasures is a sheer and uplifting scent that has remained timeless. It was created by Estee’s own daughter-in-law, Evelyn, who described it as a fragrance that “unfolds like a flower in the warmth in the sun”.



Enjoy everyday pleasures with this beloved fragrance, available as an Eau de Parfum or as part of many gorgeous gift sets.



Pleasures was launched by Estee Lauder in 1995.

product_name: Estee Lauder White Linen Eau de Parfum
description:
White Linen by Estée Lauder is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. Launched in 1978. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophia Grojsman. For many women, the distinctively elegant scent of White Linen is a symbol of elegance. A blend that is refreshing, exotic, captivating and bright. It is the perfect way to begin the day with a smile.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Aldehydes, Lemon and Peach
Middle note: Hyacinth, Carnation, Lily-of-the-Valley, Rose, Lilac, Jasmine, Iris, Orris, Violet, Ylang-Ylang and Orchid
Base note: Oakmoss, Vetiver, Cedar, Sandalwood, Benzoin, Honey, Amber and Tonka Bean

Base note: Incense, Tolu Balsam, Peru Balsam, Patchouli, Oakmoss, Amber, Vetiver, Vanilla and Musk

Furla Irresistibile Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Irresistibile by Furla is a floral fragrance for women.



The scent opens up with notes of orange blossom, lily and freesia, followed by a heart of tuberose, white camelia and violet before drying down on a base of white wood, ambroxan and cypress.



Irresistibile was launched by Furla in 2020.

product_name: Geoffrey Beene Grey Flannel Eau de Toilette
description:
Geoffrey Beene Grey Flannel Eau de Toilette 120ml Spray
Grey Flannel by Geoffrey Beene is an oriental woody fragrance for men.



Get that nostalgic feeling of an old southern European barbershop treatment. A shave by the skillful hands of a real barber using only the finest and cleanest natural soap, before moistening your face and rounding things up with a spray of Grey Flannel.



That’s what you get with this classic scent from Geoffrey Beene. No more and no less. How does it smell like? Galbanum, neroli, petittgrain and citruses in the top, violet, iris, geranium and sage in the floral heart, with oakmoss, vetiver, cedar, tonka bean and almond in the oriental base.



Grey Flannel was launched by Geoffrey Beene in 1975.

product_name: Ghost Ghost Daydream Eau de Parfum
description:
Ghost Ghost Daydream Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Ghost Daydream by Ghost is an floral fragrance for women.



A bottle as beautiful as the scent inside – the opening is a mix of violet leaf, mandarin, salty accord and crisp apple, which are met by the warm floral heart of sensuous cinnamon, jasmine, tuberose, heliotrope and violet flower. Let the scent develop and warm on your skin for the balmy and alluring base of sweet patchouli, cedarwood and amber to do its magic.



The icy hue of the bottle has taken its inspiration from the wonderful colour spectrum of the Northern Lights – it is a piece of beautiful art which catches the light and transports you to an ethereal daydream, a moment’s escape from the daily humdrum.



Ghost Daydream by Ghost was launched in 2018.

product_name: Ghost Orb Of Night Eau de Parfum
description:
Ghost Orb Of Night Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
Orb Of Night by Ghost is a floral, fruity and gourmand fragrance for women.



It contains notes of cherry, mandarin orange, almond, bergamot, orange blossom, ylang-ylang, freesia, jasmine, caramel, ambergris, sandalwood and white musk.



Orb Of Night was launched by Ghost in 2021.

product_name: Ghost Original Eau de Toilette
description:
Ghost by Ghost is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2000. A fragrance by Michel Almairac. A comforting, beautifully soft, refreshing aroma with a hint of sweetness. Ghost will help you feel sexy and confident. A great all rounder perfume.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rose and Jasmine
Middle note: Vanilla, Peach and Amber
Base note: Sandalwood and Musk

product_name: Ghost Original Gift Set 5ml EDT + 10ml Ghost Metallic Blue Nail Polish
description:
Ghost Original Gift Set 5ml EDT + 10ml Ghost Metallic Blue Nail Polish
Ghost by Ghost is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



A beautiful soft rose mixed with sweet jasmine notes opens up to a sensual heart of amber, alluring vanilla and soft peach before an earthy blend of warm sandalwood and musk envelops you.



Ghost is a gentle fragrance with added depth from the sandalwood and is the first fragrance which Ghost launched.



Ghost Original by Ghost was launched in 2000.

product_name: Ghost Purity Gift Set 5ml EDT + 10ml Nail Polish
description:
Ghost Purity Gift Set 5ml EDT + 10ml Nail Polish
Purity by Ghost is a floral oriental fragrance for women.



Sweet and fruity notes of mandarin orange and pineapple form a playful opening before this scent takes you for a stroll through the English countryside in the summer; the fresh morning dew clings to newly bloomed fragrant freesia, rose petals, violet and Casablanca lily’s before entering a hazy and hilly countryside with darker and earthier notes of sandalwood, musk and sweet hints of meringue.



Purity captures the magic of sparkling hazy days, and dewy summer mornings in Ghost’s iconic hourglass shape bottle with ethereal frosted glass. Purity is a delight for your senses.



Purity was launched by Ghost in 2019.

product_name: Ghost Sweetheart Eau de Toilette
description:
Sweetheart by Ghost is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2008. A great composition of innocent, sweet and gentle aromas. The fragrance opens with refreshing, energizing top notes, adding a charming, soft, floral heart. White flowers, which are smooth and gentle, giving an optimistic impression. The base includes sandalwood, oakmoss, amber and sweet creamy vanilla, which make the finish characteristic, warm and passionate.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon, Pineapple, Spearmint, Green note:
Middle note: Rose, Heliotrope, Jasmine, Lily of The Valley
Base note: Vetiver, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Caramel, Oakmoss, Amber

product_name: Ghost Whisper Eau de Toilette
description:
Ghost Whisper Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Whisper by Ghost is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



This is a pleasant, slightly sweet perfume with fruity hints that’s very feminine.



The opening is sparkling with notes of mandarin, star fruit and almond. The almond gives the scent a soft sweet touch that goes well with the floral heart of jasmine, honeysuckle and orange blossom while white cedar, creamy musk and heliotrope creates the perfect base for this subtle lovely fragrance.



Whisper by Ghost was launched 2012.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Christmas Gift Set 50ml EDT + 15ml EDT
description:
Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Christmas Gift Set 50ml EDT + 15ml EDT
Acqua di Gio Homme by Giorgio Armani is a fresh and floral fragrance for men.



The fragrance contains bergamot, neroli, green tangerine, jasmine petal, crisp rock rose, rosemary, fruity persimmon and patchouli. The scent and its ingredients are inspired by the Mediterranean and is one of the most popular Armani fragrances.



Acqua di Gio Homme by Giorgio Armani was launched in 1996.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Deodorant Stick
description: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Deodorant Stick

product_name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Eau De Toilette
description:
Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1996. A timeless classic. Acqua di Gio was created by Alberto Morillas and Annick Menardo. Giorgio Armani is one of the most known and popular brands in the world. The lightweight formula brings the wearer closer to the spirit of the sea and helps to restore balance to the mind and body, leaving the wearer feeling refreshed. It is a scent of freeedom. The perfect refresher for busy men, this fragrance has a spicy top note that is accented by a fresh, clean, crisp aquatic base. The scent is a perfect companion for the day, evening or any special occasion. This is a scent for men who have a sophisticated style and enjoy casual elegance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lime, Lemon, Bergamot, Jasmine, Orange, Mandarin Orange and Neroli
Middle note: Sea note:, Jasmine, Calone, Peach, Freesia, Cyclamen, Hiacynth, Rosemary, Violet, Coriander, Nutmeg, Rose and Mignonette
Base note: White Musk, Cedar, Oakmoss, Patchouli and Amber

product_name: Giorgio Armani Acqua di Gioia Eau de Parfum
description:
Giorgio Armani Acqua di Gioia Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Acqua di Gioia by Giorgio Armani is a fresh, aromatic and citrusy fragrance for women.



The aquatic aroma opens up with crisp and refreshing top notes of mint leaves, lemon and green apple, unfolding into a floral heart of jasmine, peony and labdanum. It elegantly finishes on a base of pink pepper, cedar and brown sugar. Acqua di Gioia reminds you of a day on the beach with fresh sea air, sunshine and mojito cocktails. It is the female version of Acqua Di Gio, one of the most popular Armani fragrances for men.



Acqua di Gioia, meaning ‘Happiness Water’ in Italian, was launched in 2010 and it precedes Armani's successful fragrances Sì and Code.

description:

description:

Armani Code Parfum by Giorgio Armani is a woody, aromatic fragrance for men.



The fragrance contain notes of bergamot, bergamot leaf, iris, orris, clary sage, aldehydes. tonka bean and cedar.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Code Eau de Parfum
description:
Giorgio Armani Code Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
Armani Code by Giorgio Armani is a fresh and floral fragrance for women.



The central note of this scent is orange blossom, an elegant feminine flower. Armani chose this note for his signature fragrance for women because he saw it as the epitome of femininity.



The scent opens with juicy citrusy notes of African and Italian oranges, an intriguing play between bitter and sweet, which transition into Tunisian orange blossom, complemented with notes of ginger and jasmine in the heart, which dry down on a base of sandalwood, honey and vanilla.



Code is one of the most popular Armani perfumes; its success has led to the release of multiple variations of this fragrance.



Armani Code was launched in 2006.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Code Eau de Toilette
description:
Armani Code by Giorgio Armani is a Amber Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2004. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Lie. This perfume is the winner of award FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe 2006. Armani Code is an aroma highlighted by a bouquet of fragrant aromatic, bitter and sour scented tones that will bring a light, natural and attractive perfumed sensation. When applied you will notice a lingering quality of softer fragranced citrus, fruity and pungent hints that hide an essence of elegant, bright and cheerful feelings. Armani Code is an ultimate luxury. It is a sophisticated, elegant men's fragrance for those who are looking for sophistication, elegance, and quality. This classy, masculine scent will leave you feeling fresh and ready for anything.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon and Bergamot
Middle note: Star Anise, Olive Blossom and Guaiac Wood
Base note: Leather, Tonka Bean and Tobacco

product_name: Giorgio Armani Code Gift Set 15ml Code EDT + 15ml Code EDP + 15ml Code Parfum
description:
Giorgio Armani Code Gift Set 15ml Code EDT + 15ml Code EDP + 15ml Code Parfum
Armani Code Eau de Parfum by Giorgio Armani is a amber, fougere fragrance for men.



It contains notes of lavender, lemon, bergamot, tonka bean, vanilla, cedar, suede and musk.



Armani Code Eau de Parfum was launched by Giorgio Armani in 2021.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Code Gift Set 50ml EDT + 15ml EDT
description:
Giorgio Armani Code Gift Set 50ml EDT + 15ml EDT
Armani Code by Giorgio Armani is an oriental spicy fragrance for men.



Giorgio Armani not only dresses a man to perfection, he also creates unique, classic timeless scents to go with it. Armani code is such a scent, so good that it won the acclaimed FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe in 2006.



Armani Code, code of seduction? With a citrusy opening, dominant leather notes and soft tonka beans we would agree. Code will make you feel strong and seductive, like you are wearing a black tuxedo looking your very best. Code is not just a scent, it is an expression of masculinity with a touch of exotic seduction.



Armani Code was launched in 2004.

product_name: Giorgio Armani Emporio Diamonds Eau de Parfum
description:
Giorgio Armani Emporio Diamonds Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Diamonds by Emporio Armani is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



A youthful burst of fruity notes in the opening soon settles into the sophisticated floral heart of rose, freesia and lily of the valley. The bold and ohhhh so sexy base consists of heavy amber and vetiver – a perfect blend for a signature scent.



The intoxicating liquid from Diamonds comes in a multi-faceted diamond bottle, your next favourite jewel on the perfume shelf. Diamonds are a girl’s best friend, right? And who better to front the advertising campaign for this scent than Queen B herself?! Sensual, sultry and one to note, just like this fragrance.



Emporio Armani launched Diamonds in 2007.

description:
Giorgio Beverly Hills Giorgio Yellow Body Mist 235ml Spray
Giorgio Yellow by Giorgio Beverly Hills is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



The scent contains opening notes of orange blossom and bergamot, followed by a floral heart of ylang-ylang, tuberose, gardenia and jasmine and a warm base of sandalwood, patchouli, vanilla, amber, cedar, oakmoss and musk. This 80's classic is still very popular today. It has excellent longevity and is perfect to wear both in the day and in the evening.



Giorgio Yellow was launched in 1981 by Giorgio Beverly Hills.

product_name: Giorgio Beverly Hills Red Eau de Toilette
description:
Giorgio Beverly Hills Red Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Red by Giorgio Beverly Hills is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



This true classic opens up with contrasting floral and fruity top notes of cherry, ylang-ylang, orange blossom, and hyacinth blending into a blossom heart of carnation, rose, jasmine, rosemary and tuberose. The complex base combines sweet elements with an exotic touch of patchouli, oakmoss, amber, cedar, sandalwood, tonka bean, vanilla and myrrh.



Since its launch this exclusive and elegant scent has conquered the heart of many women, becoming a symbol of ostentation. Red is the colour of love and energy and this perfume encompasses its intense aura of passion. It comes in a lovely rectangular bottle with a golden cap. Try the Eau de Toilette or enjoy its rich experience of seduction with the body moisturiser and shower gel.



Red by Giorgio Beverly Hills was launched in 1989.

product_name: Givenchy Amarige Eau de Toilette
description:
Amarige by Givenchy is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1991. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. The name of the perfume 'Amarige' is an anagram of the French word 'Mariage.' That is why this fragrance is as intensive as a strong feeling, merry, juicy and unforgettable as a moment of happy mariage. It is so opulent and floral that it seems like its composition includes all the beautiful flowers that exist in the world. The Amarige woman is graceful, playful and charming, a real French woman in love. A timeless classic that's always in style, this fragrance is a top choice for women.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Orange Blossom, Peach, Plum, Neroli, Brazilian Rosewood, Mandarin Orange and Violet
Middle note: Tuberose, Mimosa, Gardenia, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Black locust, Carnation, Red Berries, Black Currant, Cassia, Rose and Orchid
Base note: Sandalwood, Woody note:, Vanilla, Amber, Tonka Bean, Musk and Cedar

product_name: Givenchy Insense Ultramarine Eau de Toilette
description:
Insense Ultramarine by Givenchy is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for men. Launched in 1994. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Mathieu. This subtle and masculine scent is a refreshing reminder of summer's warm breezes. With a unique twist, this scent is bright, bold and fresh that is sure to keep you cool all day. Insense Ultramarine is elegant and classy, designed to impress. Ideal for any man who likes to be noticed.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Black Currant, Watermelon, Bergamot and Galbanum
Middle note: Iris, Magnolia, Mint, Carnation, Cardamom, Lily-of-the-Valley and Sage
Base note: Tobacco, Vetiver and Cedar

product_name: Givenchy L'Interdit Eau de Parfum
description: Givenchy L'Interdit Eau de Parfum is a daring and elegant fragrance that invites you to break the rules and embrace your uniqueness. This iconic scent opens with radiant notes of orange blossom, jasmine, and tuberose, evolving into a warm, sensual base of patchouli, vetiver, and vanilla. Perfect for both day and evening wear, L'Interdit offers a sophisticated and long-lasting aroma that makes a bold statement. Encased in a timeless 50ml bottle, this luxurious fragrance is a must-have for your collection or a perfect gift for someone special. Redefine elegance with Givenchy L'Interdit.

product_name: Givenchy Organza Eau de Parfum
description:
Organza by Givenchy is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1996. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbe. Organza is a magical mix of classical sensuality, delicacy and warmth, a hymn to eternal beauty possessed by every woman. It combines the softness of floral notes giving this perfume a seductive and elegant character, notes of jasmine, iris and peony create an alluring bouquet with a base of woody notes which gives the perfume a fresh, subtly sweet and sensual aroma.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Nutmeg, Gardenia, African Orange flower, Bergamot and Green note:
Middle note: Tuberose, Walnut, Jasmine, Honeysuckle, Iris and Peony
Base note: Vanilla, Amber, Woodsy note:, Guaiac Wood and Virginia Cedar

product_name: Gucci Bamboo Eau de Parfum
description:
Gucci Bamboo by Gucci is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2015. For a woman of style and refinement, discover the natural sensuality of bamboo with this sensual and feminine scent. A delicate floral blend of ylang-ylang, lily and amber creates a subtle and mysterious scent that will capture your heart. The pure sensuality of this scent will create a mysterious aura of sensuality and romance. The fresh scent of bamboo will leave you feeling clean, fresh and uplifting.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bergamot
Middle note: Casablanca Lily, Orange Blossom and Ylang-Ylang
Base note: Sandalwood, Tahitian Vanilla and Amber

product_name: Gucci Bamboo Eau de Toilette
description:
Gucci Bamboo Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Bamboo by Gucci is a floral fragrance for women.



Bamboo comes in an Eau de Parfum and an Eau de Toilette edition.



Opening with citrusy notes of bergamot the Eau de Parfum version gives an amazing burst of freshness, before moving onto the floral middle notes of orange flower, Casablanca lily and the fruity floral sweetness of ylang-ylang. Lastly, the warmth of amber, sandalwood and vanilla finishes the perfume off.



The Bamboo EDT aroma starts off by introducing orange blossom along with fruity notes of mandarin orange, pear and Sicilian bergamot. In the heart of the scent you will find Casablanca lily, jasmine and ylang-ylang, whilst the base consists of musk, vanilla, sandalwood and ambergris.



The Bamboo scents are named after Gucci’s accessory collection by the same name and the uplifting liquid is presented in an art deco inspired glass bottle with a silver bamboo like cap.



Gucci Bamboo was launched by Gucci as an EDP version in 2015 and in the EDT edition in 2016.

product_name: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum
description:
Gucci Bloom by Gucci is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2017. Blended by Alberto Morillas. A scent designed to celebrate the authenticity, vitality and diversity of women, flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way. Gucci Bloom is created to unfold like its name, capturing the rich scent of a thriving garden filled with an abundance of flowers. Tuberose and jasmine combined with Rangoon Creeper a unique flower discovered in South India that is being used for the first time in perfumery to create a rich fragrance that transports the wearer to an imaginary garden. Gucci Bloom is perfect for women who wants to feel in Bloom. This floral fragrance is the perfect way to add a touch of elegance to your day. Wear it day or night, and feel the difference in your mood.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Jasmine
Middle note: Tuberose
Base note: Rangoon creeper

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Eau de Parfum
description:
Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme by Gucci is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2018. A fragrance by Alberto Morillas. A soft, sensual blend of pink pepper, blackberry and bergamot laces the air with sophistication, while a warm, woody base of Indian patchouli and amber adds a hint of mystery.  A sexy, mysterious scent. A feminine fragrance that is made in a modern and elegant style.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blackberry, Pink Pepper, Bergamot
Middle note: Cypress, Bulgarian Rose, Woody note:, Vetiver
Base note: Indian Patchouli, Amber

product_name: Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
description:
Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Guilty pour Homme by Gucci is an aromatic, woody fragrance for men.



Luckily, the beautiful scent of Guilty will make you feel anything but guilt. Gucci gave us something positive, in the form of a clean fragrance built on a refreshing blend of lemon and lavender, followed by precious notes of African orange flower before the scent dries down on a comfortable base of cedar and patchouli.



Gucci Guilty comes in a luxurious masculine grey bottle, with a robust base of metal and glass on the top. The bottle reflects the scent; it is a strong aroma that is perfect for evening wear but at the same time inoffensive enough to be worn in the office. The fragrance was brought out as an Eau de Toilette, aftershave, shower gel and deodorant.



Guilty pour Homme by Gucci was launched in 2011.

product_name: Guerlain La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Toilette
description:
Guerlain La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
La Petite Robe Noire by Guerlain is a fruity fragrance for women.



Delicious accords of cherry, berries and almond precede an exclusive heart of rose and sandalwood. Smoky hints of tonka bean, anise and vanilla finish up the aroma with a warm aura and impressive longevity.



The scent was inspired by the glamorous little black dress, “petite robe noire” in French, with the idea to create an elegant, timeless and extremely feminine fragrance. The bottle is just as beautiful as the smell, with a pretty picture of the little dress.



The Eau de Parfum was released in 2012 together with the lighter Eau de Toilette. While the packaging is very similar, the EDT features brighter and fresher notes of green apple. Fancy a new petite robe noire? Explore the flankers Intense, Ma Robe Petales, Couture, Black or treat yourself to a fun gift set!

product_name: Guerlain Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum
description:
Guerlain Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Mon Guerlain by Guerlain is an oriental and woody fragrance for women.



It embodies modern women by combining notes of lavender, jasmine, sandalwood and vanilla.



The sensual fragrance was created by Thierry Wasser and Delphine Jelk as a tribute to femininity and strong women. Guerlain wanted a powerful female to represent the beliefs behind the fragrance and appropriately selected Angelina Jolie for the task.



Mon Guerlain was launched in 2017.

product_name: Guess 1981 Los Angeles Men Eau de Toilette
description:
Guess 1981 Los Angeles Men by Guess is a Amber Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Hassan. Elegant and sophisticated, this scent for men announces your presence and captures your imagination. The rich oriental notes with a hint of fruits, woody notes make this the perfect signature fragrance for any occasion. This signature scent will instantly transport you back to Los Angeles lifestyle.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Plum, Black Pepper and Bergamot
Middle note: Mint, Ginger and Geranium
Base note: Amber, Tobacco, Sandalwood and Vetiver

product_name: Guess Guess Seductive Eau de Toilette
description:
Guess Guess Seductive Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Guess Seductive by Guess is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



Soft top notes of bergamot, black currant and pear blend with a heart of jasmine, African orange flower and orris root on a charming base of vanilla, olibanum and cashmere wood.



Guess Seductive is one of the most successful women’s fragrances released by the American fashion brand. As suggested by the name, this is a sensual and cozy scent. The accords of white florals and vanilla make this an enticing and stimulating choice for both romantic nights out and everyday wear.



It has been followed by the masculine counterpart “Guess Seductive Homme” in 2011 and special editions like “Seductive Sunkissed” in 2012.



Guess Seductive was launched in 2010.

product_name: Guess Guess Seductive Homme Blue Eau de Toilette
description:
Guess Seductive Homme Blue by Guess is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Guillaume Flavigny. This seductive scent is sure to have you in the spotlight with its delightful fresh, aquatic aroma. Guess Seductive Homme Blue Eau de Toilette will help you feel legendary, irresistible, bold and sexy. The fragrance is refreshing with a lovely blend of sea notes and airy, soft and creamy with a perfectly balanced Cashmere woody accords.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Cardamom, Black Pepper, Caviar and Citruses
Middle note: Sea note: and Geranium
Base note: Cashmere wood, Sand and Moss

product_name: Guy Laroche Drakkar Noir Eau de Toilette
description:
Drakkar Noir by Guy Laroche is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 1982. Blended by Pierre Wargnye. A carefully selected and beautifully blended citrus top notes, woody base notes and light floral accords represents a refreshing, energizing, comforting scent sensation. This masculine scent instantly captivates with the refreshing fruits, warm and mysterious notes of cedar and pine tree. This beautifully masculine fragrance is ideal for any event or even for formal dress occasions. Very popular among younger generations.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lavender, Lemon, Mint, Bergamot, Rosemary, Lemon Verbena, Basil and Artemisia
Middle note: Juniper, Coriander, Cinnamon, Wormwood, Carnation, Angelica and Jasmine
Base note: Oakmoss, Leather, Fir, Pine Tree Needles, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli, Cedar, Amber and Resins

product_name: Guy Laroche Fidji Eau De Toilette
description:
Fidji Eau de Toilette by Guy Laroche is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1966. The nose behind this fragrance is Josephine Catapano. The scent of a bucket of fresh flowers is what makes this wonderful fragrance such a charming and memorable experience. This attractive scent will captivate your senses and will help you feel even more beautiful, confident and sexy.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Hiacynth, Galbanum, Iris, Bergamot, Lemon and Tuberose
Middle note: Aldehydes, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Cloves, Orris Root, Violet, Spicy note: and Rose
Base note: Oakmoss, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Resins, Musk, Amber and Patchouli

product_name: Halston Z Eau de Toilette
description:
Halston Z Eau de Toilette 7ml Splash
Z by Halston. This is a aromatic, fresh and woody fragrance for men. It contains of cypress, gardenia, basil, bergamot, lemon, coriander, patchouli, cinnamon, jasmine, vetiver, cedar, geranium, leather, tonka bean, amber, musk, benzoin and oakmoss.

description:
Hermès Un Jardin Sur La Lagune Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Un Jardin Sur La Lagune by Hermès is an oriental and floral fragrance for women and men.



It contains notes of magnolia, sea notes, woody notes, lily and pitosporum.



Un Jardin Sur La Lagune was launched by Hermès in 2019.

product_name: Hermès Un Jardin Sur Le Nil Gift Set 100ml EDT + 7.5ml EDT + 50g Soap
description:
Hermès Un Jardin Sur Le Nil Gift Set 100ml EDT + 7.5ml EDT + 50g Soap
Un Jardin Sur Le Nil by Hermes is a fresh and floral fragrance for women and men.



The scent contains notes of grapefruit, green mango, lotus, tomato, carrot, bulrush, orange, incense, musk, iris, hyacinth, peony, labdanum and cinnamon. The title translates to "a garden by the Nile" and aims to capture the scents of the famous Egyptian river's garden islands with vivid florals, fruit and earthy plant notes.



Un Jardin Sur Le Nil by Hermes was launched in 2005.

product_name: Hermès Un Jardin Sur Le Toit Eau de Toilette
description:
Hermès Un Jardin Sur Le Toit Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Un Jardin Sur Le Toit refers to the especially luxurious garden located on the Hermes’ headquarters building roof at 24 Rue Faubourg Saint-Honore in Paris.



The garden is full of aromatic herbs, flowers and fruits whose flavours vary as they pass through the metamorphosis induced by the seasons. Its fresh and sweet-smelling atmosphere is captured by apple, pear, rose, green grass, basil, magnolia and compost notes.



Un Jardin Sur Le Toit by Hermes was launched in 2011.

product_name: Hermès Un Jardin Sur Le Toit Eau de Toilette

product_name: Hollister Wave for Him Eau de Toilette
description:
Hollister Wave for Him Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Wave for Him by Hollister is a woody aromatic fragrance for men.



The opening is a zesty blend of fresh grapefruit, yuzu and creamy bamboo leaf. The light heart consist of Cyprus wood, lavender and neroli while the base is an effortless mix of Tonka bean, musk and salty driftwood. Wave For Him is a laid-back, salty and sexy trip to the beach and a perfect scent for warmer weather.



Wave for Him was launched in 2016.

product_name: Hugo Boss Alive Eau de Parfum
description:
Boss Alive Eau de Parfum by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women. Launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Annick Menardo. Alive is a sumptuous and bold fragrance that elicits a passionate energy for women all over the world. It is a scent that is all about stimulating the state of mind, driven by a zesty, fruity and glamorous opening. The full-bodied scent is finished with a refreshing and uplifting sensation. This new aroma is inspired by the beautiful and bold women who make bold moves in their lives. "ALIVE" is an unexpected fragrance that will make you feel alive, playful, vibrant and energetic.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Madagascar Vanilla, Plum, Apple, Cinnamon and Black Currant
Middle note: Jasmine Sambac and Thyme
Base note: Woodsy note:, Cedar, Sandalwood and Olive Tree

product_name: Hugo Boss Alive Gift Set 50ml EDP + 75ml Body Lotion
description:
Hugo Boss Alive Gift Set 50ml EDP + 75ml Body Lotion
Alive by Hugo Boss is a woody aromatic fragrance for women.



The fragrance opens up with notes of vanilla, cinnamon, plum, black currant and apple, followed by a heart of jasmine sambac and thyme, before drying down on a base of cedar, sandalwood, olive tree and woody notes.



Alive by Hugo Boss wasl launched in 2020.

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss Bottled Deodorant Spray
description:
Hugo Boss Boss Bottled Deodorant Spray 150ml
Boss Bottled by Hugo Boss is a fresh and woody fragrance for men. It’s one of the top-sellers from the popular brand. Since its release we have seen several successful editions of the fragrance like; Boss Bottled Night and Boss Bottled Sport only to mention a few, although the original remains the most popular.



The masculine scent is a blend of fresh and warm woody accords. At first you get notes of crisp apple, citrus and oakmosss which transitions into the spicy heart with notes of cinnamon, mahogany, cloves and geranium. The base is strong and woody with sandalwood olive tree, cedar, vetiver and vanilla.



Since the launch of Boss Bottled in 1998, the fragrance has benefitted from many great reviews and earned its status as a modern classic.

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss Bottled Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Bottled by Hugo Boss is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 1998. The nose behind this fragrance is Annick Menardo. A fresh, sharp and very masculine fragrance. Very popular among men.It is an iconic scent that has a sophisticated and powerful aroma. It is ideal for a man who is ready to take on the world. Boss Bottled is sure to make an impression. The masculine and rich scent is a perfect choice for any man on a quest for masculine confidence. It is a spicy and bold scent that will stand out in a crowd. The cool and sophisticated scent can be worn by any men of all ages and tastes.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Apple, Plum, Bergamot, Lemon, Oakmoss and Geranium
Middle note: Cinnamon, Mahogany and Carnation
Base note: Vanilla, Sandalwood, Cedar, Vetiver and Olive Tree

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss Bottled Tonic Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Bottled Tonic by Hugo Boss is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2017. Created by Annick Menardo. Boss Bottled Tonic is a fresh, day time edition designed for modern men who aspire success. Refreshing, masculine but not too intense, lighter than other Bottled editions from the Bottled family. It is ideal for work or everyday occasions. This scent is a great addition to any man's fragrance collection, and is a refreshing way to add a touch of class and sophistication to your day.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Apple, Bitter Orange, Grapefruit and Lemon
Middle note: Ginger, Cinnamon, Geranium and Cloves
Base note: Vetiver and Woodsy note:

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss Bottled United Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Bottled United by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2018. Blended by Annick Menardo. Bottled United for men by Hugo Boss is an enticing and elegant fragrance. A perfect choice for nightlife or when you're meeting friends for dinner, it's a scent that sets you apart. This scent has a blend of rich woody notes, letting you know you're in the presence of a true leader and confident man. A sensual, refreshing, masculine scent will be a perfect addition to your perfume collection.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Orange, Buchu or Agathosma and Ozonic note:
Middle note: Mint, Spicy Mint, Apple, Melon, Orris and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Vetiver, Patchouli, Cashmeran, Amberwood, White Musk and Coumarin

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss Bottled Unlimited Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Bottled Unlimited by Hugo Boss is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2014. Designed by Annick Menardo. Boss Bottled Unlimited is the scent of invigorating freshness, enduring energy and aromatic masculinity. It provides a motivating energy boost with a mixture of invigorating freshness. The scent is cool, energizing, refreshing, masculine. It is an ideal choice for a man who wants to feel more confident and knows that the possibilities are Unlimited. The bold and mysterious scent is perfect for a night out, but can also be worn for any casual occasion. The perfect choice for any man who wants to stand out. Boss Bottled Unlimited will not disappoint.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mint, Grapefruit and Violet Leaf
Middle note: Pineapple, Cinnamon and Rose
Base note: Labdanum, White Musk and Sandalwood

Boss Ma Vie Eau de Parfum by Hugo Boss is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2014. The Boss Ma Vie Eau de Parfum is a scent that was inspired by the woman who embraces life in all her splendor, feels the sun on her skin, the touch of a flower, the moments in life that truly make them the most captivating. A composition that reflects confidence, feminity and modernity. Boss Ma Vie Pour Femme is a fragrance that is indulging, fresh and unique.

Fragrance Notes:

Base note: Woody note: and Cedar

description:
Hugo Boss Boss the Scent Deodorant 150ml Spray
Boss the Scent by Hugo Boss is an aromatic and spicy fragrance for men.



The Boss aftershave is a beautiful mix of ginger in the top, Maninka and lavender in the heart and leather accords in the base. Boss The Scent is a classic masculine fragrance that emanates masculinity and seduction, making it the perfect evening scent.



The Scent by Hugo Boss was launched in 2015 and the adverts for the fragrance featured actor Theo James.

product_name: Hugo Boss Boss The Scent For Her Gift Set 30ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion
description:
Hugo Boss Boss The Scent For Her Gift Set 30ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion
Boss The Scent For Her by Hugo Boss is a floral fruity fragrance for women released in both Eau de Parfum and Eau de Toilette.



The EDP was launched in 2016 and comes in an elegant black opaque bottle. The sweet alluring opening of peach soon melts into the deeper sensual heart of osmanthus, while citrus enhances the roasted cocoa. A truly addictive fragrance that’s a pleasure to wear all year around!



Boss The Scent For Her EDT was launched two years later in 2018. The packaging is similar to the EDP, this time coloured in a light pink romantic shade. Hugo Boss wanted a lighter interpretation of the fragrance, one that was true to the original EDP scent, but with a springtime twist. The EDT version has an energising opening of pink pepper and green mandarin, which lead you into the floral heart of sweet freesia and orange blossom. Just like the EDP version, the EDT contains roasted cocoa bean, which leaves you with a warm, addictive ending that caresses you long after your first spray.

product_name: Hugo Boss Deep Red Eau de Parfum
description:
Deep Red by Hugo Boss is an Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Launched in 2001. Created by Alain Astori and Beatrice Piquet. Deep Red is a delicately sweet and seductive blend. Opening notes of crispy oranges reveal first, delicate taste of feminine passions, adding a charming, soft, floral heart. Flowers, which are smooth and gentle, are mixed with ginger flower, giving an optimistic impression. A base includes sandalwood, musk and sweet creamy vanilla, which make the finish characteristic, warm and passionate. Deep red will be an excellent addition to your perfume collection if you need that extra mood and confidence boost.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Orange, Black Currant, Clementine, Pear and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Ginger, Ginger flower, Tuberose, Freesia and Hibiscus Seed
Base note: Vanilla, Sandalwood, Musk and California Cedar

product_name: Hugo Boss Energise Eau de Toilette
description:
Hugo Energise by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2005. Created by Claude Dir. A masculine scent that's sure to appeal to the senses. Experience the fresh and clean aroma of Hugo Boss' Energise. This masculine scent will help you feeling energized, uplifted and elegant with its fresh and clean, masculine aroma.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pink Pepper, Lemon, Kumquat, Pineapple Leaf, Mint, Mandarin Orange and Cardamom
Middle note: Jasmine, Nutmeg, Juniper, Freesia, Coriander and Clary Sage
Base note: Vanilla, Leather and Teak Wood

product_name: Hugo Boss Femme Eau de Parfum
description:
Femme by Hugo Boss is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2006. Hugo Boss Femme inspired by the woman, who is cheerful, playful, sexy and above all romantic. She is the reflection of true feminism, a dreamer, just like imagined by men. Opening notes of tangerine and blackcurrant reveal first with a hint of freesia, delicate taste of feminine passions, adding a charming, soft, floral heart of a harmonious blend of rose and white flowers, which are smooth and gentle, are mixed with long lasting citrus wood, apricot in harmony with delicate amber giving a romantic impression. Wear it for a date night or if you need that extra boost to help you feel romantic, refreshed and more confident.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Freesia, Tangerine and Black Currant
Middle note: Bulgarian Rose, Lily and Jasmine
Base note: Lemon Tree, Apricot and Amber

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo Deodorant Spray
description:
Hugo Boss Hugo Deodorant Spray 150ml
Hugo by Hugo Boss is a fresh and aromatic fragrance for men.



Hugo features green opening accords of lavender, green apple, mint, grapefruit and basil are followed by a floral middle notes of carnation, sage, geranium and jasmine on a woody base of patchouli, fir and cedar.



This is one of Hugo Boss’s most successful fragrances for men, a timeless fresh scent with an excellent longevity that works really well in warmer weather. It comes in the iconic flask-shaped bottle, which has been used again in later Boss scents including hits like “Hugo Extreme” and “Hugo Red”.



Hugo was launched by Hugo Boss in 1995.

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo Reversed Eau de Toilette
description:
Hugo Reversed by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Launched in 2018. Hugo Boss has the perfect fragrance for the man who relishes a bit of adventure. Crafted with a base of woody notes and a top of bright citrus, Hugo Boss Hugo Reversed has an invigorating scent that will get him noticed. The subtle but sophisticated woody scent is a great choice for a man who likes to explore.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Grapefruit and Calabrian bergamot
Middle note: Rosemary
Base note: Haitian Vetiver

product_name: Hugo Boss Orange Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Orange by Hugo Boss is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2009. Inspired by the strong, enthusiastic, energetic woman. This fresh and energizing fragrance is sure to make an impression. It's a top seller for a reason. It's an enticing scent that will make you feel confident, elegant and attractive. Opening notes of crispy apple reveal first, delicate taste of feminine passions, adding a charming, soft, floral heart. White flowers, which are smooth and gentle, are mixed with orange blossom, giving an optimistic impression. A base includes sandalwood, olive wood and sweet creamy vanilla, which make the finish characteristic, warm and passionate.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Apple
Middle note: African Orange flower and White Flowers
Base note: Vanilla, Sandalwood and Olive Tree

product_name: Hugo Boss Selection Eau de Toilette
description:
Boss Selection by Hugo Boss is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2006. Boss Selection was inspired by man of accomplishment, power and success. Created for a man who is proud of his achievements. A refreshing, masculine, spicy and woody fragrance which will help you feel like the boss in all aspects of your life. Selection will help you feel confident, elegant, strong and powerful. A must have if you are in higher position. Perfect day wear for work or formal occasions.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pink Pepper, Grapefruit, Mandarin Orange and Bergamot
Middle note: Star Anise, Cedar Needles and Geranium
Base note: Musk, Vetiver and Patchouli

product_name: Issey Miyake L'Eau d'Issey Eau de Toilette
description:
L'eau d'Issey by Issey Miyake is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women. Launched in 1992. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier. Ispired by the scent of a waterfall, "as clear as spring water". L'Eau d'Issey is warm and inviting, yet light and airy, creating a fragrance that is both alluring and sensual. The floral notes are balanced with the aquatic notes to create an enticing combination of freshness and softness. The relaxing scent is a great way to get ready for a relaxing day or night. This feminine fragrance will ensure you are the center of attention wherever you go.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lotus, Melon, Freesia, Rose Water, Rose, Calone and Cyclamen
Middle note: Lily-of-the-Valley, Lily, Water Peony and Carnation
Base note: Musk, Tuberose, Exotic Woods, Osmanthus, Cedar, Sandalwood and Amber

product_name: Issey Miyake L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Intense Eau de Toilette
description:
L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Intense by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1994. The composition was created by Jacques Cavallier. Issey Miyake uses very unique and rare materials to create perfumes that evoke the sense of timeless freedom and serenity. A masculine fragrance that is an instant classic. L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Intense is a mix of sharp citrus notes, but with a rich woodiness that combines to create a soft and sensuous fragrance. A masculine yet soft fragrance that is a true reflection of the man who wears it. Magnificent and masculine with a woody base that is tempered with fresh notes of aquatic and floral notes. The scent is inspired by the vibrant city of Issey, Japan. The scent is universal and perfect for any occasion. A more intense, longer lasting version of Pour Homme family.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Yuzu, Lemon, Bergamot, Lemon Verbena, Mandarin Orange, Cypress, Calone, Coriander, Tarragon and Sage
Middle note: Blue Lotus, Nutmeg, Lily-of-the-Valley, Saffron, Ceylon Cinnamon, Bourbon Geranium and Mignonette
Base note: Tahitian Vetiver, Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Tobacco and Amber

product_name: Issey Miyake L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Intense Eau de Toilette

product_name: Issey Miyake L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Sport Eau De Toilette
description:
L’Eau d’Issey Pour Homme Sport by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2012. Blended by Jacques Cavallier. This masculine scent has an air of the woods. It is a clean, refreshing, energizing composition that is perfect for a man who loves refreshing scents and wants to stand out in his own way. It has a woody, aromatic scent that is perfect for the man who loves the outdoors, likes to be active and needs an elegant scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Grapefruit and Bergamot
Middle note: Nutmeg and Leather
Base note: Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Ambergris

product_name: Jaguar Classic Red Eau de Toilette
description:
Jaguar Classic Red by Jaguar is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2013. Blended by Karine Dubreuil. Designed for modern men, who lives for excitement. A fruity, elegant and classy scent, not at Jaguar price. Opens with delicately sweet berries and soft spices, at dry down provides a pleasant masculine amber, woody scent. This signature scent will make you feel confident and will be a great addition to your collection.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Raspberry, Blueberry and Bergamot
Middle note: Black Pepper, Jasmine and Ozonic note:
Base note: Tonka Bean, Amber, Vanilla, Cedar and Patchouli

product_name: Jaguar Jaguar Eau de Toilette
description:
Jaguar by Jaguar is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2002. A refreshing, masculine fragrance for the man who is modern, confident, and stylish.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Star Anise, Juniper Berries, Orange, Lavender, Mandarin Orange, Bergamot and Basil
Middle note: Ginger, Lotus and Orange Blossom

product_name: Jaguar Men's Ultimate Power Eau de Toilette
description:
For Men Ultimate Power by Jaguar is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Launched in 2019. Created by Sidonie Lancesseur.  As this powerful fragrance opens up, you're immediately enveloped in the freshness of its top notes of crispy lemon and mint. At the heart you can feel the delicately sweet apple, followed by the masculine woody notes at the base. A refreshing aromatic breeze that pushes you forward and revives your ambitions.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mint, Lemon and Bergamot
Middle note: Ginger, Green Leaves and Apple
Base note: Patchouli, White Woods and Oakmoss

product_name: Jaguar Pace Eau de Toilette
description:
Pace by Jaguar is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2016. Pace was created by Alexandra Monet and Philippe Romano. The spicy, warm scent is a captivating experience that is sure to put you in the mood to take on the world. A unique and captivating blend, that is refreshing, energizing will help to transform  your mood.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Black Pepper, Rosemary and Green Apple
Middle note: Lavender, Iris Flower and Cashmere Wood
Base note: Patchouli, Amberwood and Moss

product_name: Jean Patou Joy Gift Set 30ml EDP + 200ml Body Cream
description:
Jean Patou Joy Gift Set 30ml EDP + 200ml Body Cream
Joy by Jean Patou is a floral fragrance for women.



French fashion designer Jean Patou aspired to bring joy to the people by producing an exclusive perfume that was worth its weight in gold. To achieve this goal he made an extraordinary concentration of nearly 3,000 roses and over 10,000 jasmine flowers, which became one of the most best-selling perfumes ever released.



The aroma opens with a rich bouquet of ylang-ylang, rose and tuberose with a hint of peach and some fresh green notes. The floral arrangement melts into a mix of iris and jasmine and finishes with a base of sandalwood and musk.



Architect Louis Süe originally designed the elegant no-nonsense bottle with a golden thread wrapped around the neck for this classic fragrance. The current packaging strongly resembles the original flacon with its unique golden neck and decadent look.



Joy was launched by Jean Patou in 1930.

product_name: Jean Paul Gaultier Classique Bath & Shower Gel
description:
Jean Paul Gaultier Classique Bath & Shower Gel 200ml
Classique is a floral fragrance for women by Jean Paul Gaultier.



The scent opens with a combination of blooming rose and anise on a heart of ginger and orange blossom with a lingering base of vanilla and amber.



Housed in a iconic bottle that celebrates the female figure, this classic Jean Paul Gaultier perfume is often released in beautiful gift sets with pampering products such as body lotions and shower gels. Classique was first released in 1993.

product_name: Jean Paul Gaultier La Belle Eau de Parfum
description:
La Belle Le Parfum by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. This new fragrance was launched in 2021. La Belle Le Parfum was created by Quentin Bisch and Sonia Constant. Experience the power of the Gaultier house with the new Jean Paul Gaultier La Belle Eau de Toilette. This feminine scent connects to your own personal style with its energetic and youthful aroma that is sure to elicit a positive response from others. A seductive and sexy fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pear
Middle note: Tonka Bean
Base note: Vanilla

product_name: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Eau de Toilette
description:
Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Eau de Toilette 125ml Spray
Le Beau by Jean Paul Gaultier is an aromatic fragrance for men.



This fragrance has a minimalistic composition of three notes that are anything but boring as the scent opens with a juicy and fresh blast of bergamot develops with an exotic heart of creamy coconut wood before it mellows down on a base of tonka bean.



The warm notes make this a comforting fragrance that performs best on colder days or evenings. This masculine fragrance is housed in the iconic blue torso-shaped bottle ‘dressed’ in nothing but a golden leaf, revealing the sensual nature of the scent held within.



Le Beau by Jean Paul Gaultier was launched together with La Belle for women in 2019.

product_name: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male All Over Shower Gel
description:
Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male All Over Shower Gel 200ml
Le Male by Jean Paul Gaultier is a fresh and aromatic fragrance for men.



It contains notes of mint, lavender, vanilla, bergamot, cinnamon, cumin, orange blossom, tonka bean, sandalwood and cedarwood. Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male was first launched in 1995. The scent is known for the unique bottle in the shape of a torso and the tin cans that often serve as the perfume's packaging.



The scent has a female counterpart in the Gaultier perfume Classique which comes in similar bottle. The cologne was developed by famous perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. The scent has been released in many new versions and is also available as a gift set.

product_name: Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Eau de Parfum
description:
Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Scandal by Jean Paul Gaultier is a sweet floral fragrance for women.



The scent opens up with fresh notes of blood orange and mandarin orange, followed by a delicious heart of honey, gardenia, orange blossom, jasmine and peach, on a base of patchouli, beeswax, caramel and cinnamon.



Unlike the iconic busts used for much of Gaultier's perfume packaging throughout the last 20 years, this fragrance uses a new design with a fun metal sculpture on the bottle cap. The TV advert for the fragrance tells the story of the character Madame La Ministre, a government minister who enjoys the French night-life while wearing this scandalous scent. The video was shot in Paris and features the Hungarian model Vanessa Axente.



Scandal was launched by Jean Paul Gaultier in 2017.

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Glow Eau de Toilette
description:
Glow by Jennifer Lopez is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2012. Glow was inspired by spring flowers, which spread an aura of delicate freshness, refinement and sophistication. The sexy fragrance has a soft, sensual appeal that is playful and irresistibly feminine.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: African Orange Flower and Grapefruit
Middle note: Jasmine, Rose, Iris and Vanilla
Base note: Musk, Sandalwood and Amber

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Glow Gift Set 100ml EDT +  75ml Body Lotion + 75ml Shower Gel
description:
Jennifer Lopez Glow Gift Set 100ml EDT + 75ml Body Lotion + 75ml Shower Gel
Glow by Jennifer Lopez is a fresh and floral fragrance for women.



Clean, citrusy and energetic – Glow is introduced by orange blossom, neroli and grapefruit, which melt in a rose and jasmine bouquet and dry down on a base of soft musk.



Glow was the very first fragrance released by singer and actress Jennifer Lopez and has remained a worldwide bestseller. Over 15 special editions have been released since, like the tropical Miami Glow and fruity Rio Glow, just to name a few!



The Eau de Toilette comes with a detachable J.LO necklace and makes a gorgeous present as a gift set with the perfumed body lotion.



Glow was launched by Jennifer Lopez in 2002.

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Live Eau de Parfum
description:
Live by Jennifer Lopez is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2005. Blended by Dominique Ropion. Live is a bold, daring and fun fragrance captures the personality of the woman, who is full of life, happy, adventurous and ready for anything. The blend opens with refreshing, uplifting citrus notes while peony and violet gives a bold, provocative feel at the heart. Dries down to a delicately sweet, intoxicating fragrance with a hint of woody notes.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pineapple, Sicilian Lemon and Italian Orange
Middle note: Red Currant Blossom, Peony and Violet
Base note: Caramel, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Vanilla

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Live Luxe Eau de Parfum
description:
Live Luxe by Jennifer Lopez is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2006. Created by Claudette Belnavis. Live Luxe was inspired by Jennifer Lopez's passion for dance and anything luxurious. The composition is temperamental and dynamic. The top notes of Melon, Peach and Pear create a fresh and exhilarating opening. The middle notes of Pink Freesia, Honeysuckle and Lily-of-the-Valley sweeten the fragrance up with a sensual and captivating scent. The base notes of Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood and Amber create a long-lasting and comforting fragrance sensation.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Melon, Peach and Pear
Middle note: Pink Freesia, Honeysuckle and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood and Amber

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Love At First Glow Eau de Toilette
description:
Love at First Glow by Jennifer Lopez is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2005. Created by Steve DeMercado. A delicately sweet and fresh fragrance, evokes the magic moment of a young girl's first love. The romantic scent is sure to help you feel beautiful and desired.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Peach, Neroli and Bergamot
Middle note: Rose, Freesia and Jasmine
Base note: Musk, Woodsy note: and Vanilla

product_name: Jennifer Lopez Still Eau de Parfum
description:
Still by Jennifer Lopez is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2003. Created by Michel Girard. Still is a sensual, clean, vivacious and very feminine fragrance. Top notes of white pepper and tea with a hint of crisp apple for a tantalizing burst of freshness. A sensual heart of floral bucket round out this irresistibly feminine scent. A fragrance that is ideal for a night out with friends and family.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Earl Grey Tea, White Pepper, Mandarin Orange, Apple and Rice
Middle note: Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Freesia, Honeysuckle, Rose and Orange Blossom
Base note: Pepper, Musk, Iris, Sandalwood and Amber

description:
Jil Sander Sun Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Sun was introduced in 1989 by Jill Sander. Sun is a sunny fragrance with citrusy fresh top notes composed of sweet orange blossom. The floral heart is an unusual bouquet of iris, ylang-ylang, heliotrope and carnation. The base is warm and sweet due to vanilla, while Tonka, cedar and benzoin also lend their warm character to the composition. Sun is a perfect feminine fragrance for evening wear.

Middle note: Sweet Pea and Rose
Base note: White Musk and Sandalwood

product_name: Jimmy Choo Fever Eau de Parfum
description:
Jimmy Choo Fever by Jimmy Choo is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Launched in 2018. Jimmy Choo Fever was created by Nathalie Lorson and Honorine Blanc. Fever is a powerful composition that possesses sex appeal and glamor. The sweet and sensual vanilla aroma is a versatile choice for all occasions. A perfect accessory for any woman, who is looking for confident elegance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Plum, Litchi and Grapefruit
Middle note: Heliotrope, Vanilla Orchid, Jasmine and Orange Blossom
Base note: Tonka Bean, Benzoin, Vanilla, Coffee, Hazelnut and Sandalwood

product_name: Jimmy Choo Flash Eau de Parfum
description:
Flash by Jimmy Choo is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2013. Flash was created by Christine Nagel. Flash is a white floral bouquet with a hint of spices and fruits which gives the scent a refreshing, uplifting, unique and romantic feel. It's a perfect way to start the day and to give you a boost of confidence.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pink Pepper, Big Strawberry and Tangerine
Middle note: Tuberose, White Lily and Jasmine
Base note: Heliotrope and White Wood

product_name: Jimmy Choo Floral Eau de Toilette
description:
Jimmy Choo Floral Eau de Toilette 60ml Spray
Jimmy Choo Floral by Jimmy Choo is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



The "fresh and refined" scent opens with a fruity mix of nectarine, tangerine and bergamot notes which gradually melts into a floral heart with sweet pea, magnolia and apricot blossom notes. The base that lingers on your skin is a mature mix of musk, ambroxan and woody notes.



Jimmy Choo Floral was launched by Jimmy Choo in 2019 and represents energy, beauty and confidence in all women.

product_name: Jimmy Choo Illicit Flower Eau de Toilette
description:
Jimmy Choo Illicit Flower Eau de Toilette 40ml Spray
Illicit Flower by Jimmy Choo is a floral, fruity and woody fragrance for women.



Soft, subtle and clean, this is a fresher interpretation of Choo's best-seller Illicit. A juicy opening of mandarin orange and apricot is followed by a floral heart of rose, jasmine, freesia and pear, melting on a woody base of sandalwood, cashmere, musk, vanilla and benzoin.



Illicit Flower is the perfect choice for a light, everyday fragrance to wear to work as well as on nights out. Fall in love with this delicate Eau de Toilette or indulge in the luxurious gift set with a perfumed body lotion and shower gel.



Illicit Flower was launched by Jimmy Choo in 2016.

product_name: Jimmy Choo L'Eau Eau de Toilette
description:
Jimmy Choo L'Eau by Jimmy Choo is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2017. Created by Juliette Karagueuzoglou. L'Eau creates a radiant feminine sensuality. This sensual and seductive fragrance is ideal for a night out in the town. A sensual, refreshing and romantic fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Hibiscus and Bergamot
Middle note: Peony and Nectarine
Base note: Musk and Cedar

description:
Jimmy Choo Man Aqua Eau de Toilette 200ml Spray
Jimmy Choo Man Aqua by Jimmy Choo is an aromatic aquatic fragrance for men.



The fragrance contains notes of cardamom, grapefruit, sea water, clary sage, patchouli and moss.

product_name: Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau de Toilette
description:
Jimmy Choo Man Blue by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2018. Created by Nathalie Lorson. Man Blue was designed for the confident yet casual man of today. Exudes a relaxed confidence and magnetic attraction. An aromatically refreshing yet resolutely masculine scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lavender, Black Pepper, Clary Sage and Bergamot
Middle note: Ambergris, Leather, Apple, Cypress and Pineapple
Base note: Vanilla, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Patchouli

product_name: Jimmy Choo Man Ice Eau de Toilette
description:
Jimmy Choo Man Ice by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2017. Created by Michel Almairac. Jimmy Choo Man Ice is the perfect fragrance for the man who demands modern elegance. The harmonically balanced fresh citrus top notes, spicy and woody notes is blended with a floral heart and finished with a musky base. A cool, refreshing, masculine, elegant scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Citron, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Apple, Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli
Base note: Musk, Ambroxan and Moss
