product_name: Jimmy Choo Urban Hero Eau de Parfum
description:
Urban Hero by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2019. If you're looking for something bold and innovative, then you'll love this fragrance. It's a sensual and mysterious blend of oriental notes, citrus and leather that will make you smell instantly manly. Urban Hero will help you feel confident, sexy and seductive.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Black Pepper and Finger Lime
Middle note: Vetiver and Palisander Rosewood
Base note: Leather and Ambergris

product_name: Joop! Femme Eau de Toilette
description:
Joop! Femme Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Femme by Joop! is an oriental woody fragrance for women.



The top notes in Femme by Joop! merge notes of aldehydes and the fresh fruity notes, including bergamot and lemon with the oriental herb of coriander. The heart is full of exotic floral notes including orange blossom, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and rose before it dries down into a sweet and woody base with notes of sandalwood, tonka bean, amber, patchouli, musk, civet, oakmoss, vanilla and cedar.



Femme by Joop! was launched in 1987.

product_name: Joop! Go Eau de Toilette
description:
Joop! Go by Joop! is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2006. Created by Sophie Labbe. Joop! Go offers a refreshing, uplifting, masculine and seductive scent, a delicate blend of delicately sweet and woodsy notes. A seductive scent with notes of fresh citrus that make this Eau de Toilette the perfect choice for the man on the go. The masculine scent can be worn daily for an energizing boost to make you feel alive.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rhubarb, Bitter Orange and Pimento
Middle note: Violet, Cypress and Bourbon Geranium
Base note: Balsam Fir and Musk

description: Joop! Homme Aftershave

product_name: Joop! Homme Deodorant Spray
description:
Joop! Homme Deodorant Spray 75ml
Joop! Homme by Joop! is an oriental fragrance for men.



This long-lasting scent contains a spicy composition with top notes of fresh citruses, middle notes of cinnamon, jasmine, lily of the valley and heliotrope and a base with vanilla, patchouli, sandalwood and tonka bean notes.



Joop! Homme is one of the most popular fragrances for men over the last 20 years. It comes in the iconic pink bottle and can be enjoyed as an aftershave, Eau de Toilette, or even luxurious bath products.



Can’t get enough of Joop! Homme? Why not try the latest editions? They include Homme Extreme, Sport and the limited Black & Red King, a must-have for every Joop! lover.



Joop! Homme was launched by Joop! in 1989.

description: Joop! Homme Deodorant Stick

product_name: Joop! Homme Eau de Toilette
description:
Joop! Homme by Joop! is a Amber Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 1989. Another composition by Michel Almairac. The warm and sensual scent evokes a masculine aura, as the aromatic base notes of sandalwood and vetiver are combined with the more intimate notes of Vanilla and Tonka Bean bringing out a fresh, clean, delicately sweet, very sensual scent. Joop! Homme is ideal for day wear due to its freshness and lightness.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Orange Blossom, Mandarin Orange, Bergamot and Amalfi Lemon
Middle note: Cinnamon, Heliotrope, Jasmine, Cardamom and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Honey, Tobacco and Vetiver

description:

A scent that is cooling, refreshing, masculine and sensual. The scent is for the man who can let himself go and be wild.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pink Pepper
Middle note: Rum
Base note: White tobacco and Woody note:

product_name: Joop! Jump Eau de Toilette
description:
Joop! Jump by Joop! is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2005. Created by Sophie Labbe. A fragrance of freshness and fun, this is a perfect choice for any man who loves to be stylish and confident. Joop! Jump is for the men who appreciate a scent that is full of personality. Wear this fragrance to feel confident and stylish at all times.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Grapefruit, Rosemary and Caraway
Middle note: Heliotrope and Coriander
Base note: Tonka Bean, Musk and Vetiver

product_name: Joop! Le Bain Eau de Parfum
description:
Joop! Le Bain by Joop! is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1989. Joop! Le Bain is a scent that is fresh, invigorating, and delicately sweet. This distinctive scent is designed to be the perfect every day scent that blends the sharpness of citrus with the sweetness of vanilla and cedarwood.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Aldehydes, Orange Blossom, Bergamot and Lemon
Middle note: Sandalwood, Jasmine, Cedar, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Amber, Musk and Patchouli

product_name: Jovan Musk for Woman Eau de Cologne
description:
Jovan Musk for Woman Eau de Cologne 59ml Spray
Musk for Woman by Jovan is a fresh, floral and aromatic fragrance for women.



Jovan Musk is a very soft floral musk. The notes consist of bergamot, sweet neroli, jasmine and musk at the base.



This is a true classic that has been a best-seller since it was first released in the 1970's. Musk scents have a clean smell which also helps to amplify the scent of your own skin. This is also a great fragrance for layering which works particularly well with spicy fragrances and chypre-scented florals.



Musk for Woman by Jovan was first launched in 1972.

product_name: Juicy Couture Couture Couture Eau de Parfum
description:
Couture Couture by Juicy Couture is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2009. The top notes of African orange flower, Mandarin orange, and grapefruit are warm and inviting. The middle notes of plum, jasmine and honeysuckle are light and floral. The base notes of amber, vanilla and sandalwood are warm and sensual. It is a refined scent that is perfect for romantic evenings. It is a fragrance that is sure to leave a lasting impression on your senses.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: African Orange flower, Mandarin Orange and Grapefruit
Middle note: Plum, Jasmine and Honeysuckle
Base note: Amber, Vanilla and Sandalwood

product_name: Juicy Couture Couture La La Eau de Parfum
description:
Couture La La by Juicy Couture is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2012. Couture La La embodies free spirited and effortlessly glamorous women. This feminine, elegant and sexy fragrance is a perfect choice for the more mature lady. The scent is sensual, soft, fresh and last for longer hours. The fragrance is suitable for both day and night wear.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Green Apple, Mandarin Orange and Red Currant
Middle note: Lily-of-the-Valley, Orange Blossom and Violet Leaf
Base note: Musk

product_name: Juicy Couture Dirty English Eau de Toilette
description:
Dirty English for Men by Juicy Couture is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2008. Designed for the "bad guys"  who lives for the moment, lives fast and crazy. It opens with peppered mandarin, blue cypress, Calabrian bergamot, cumin and cardamom. The heart brings marjoram and black leather accords accompanied with sandalwood, Atlas cedar and vetiver root which create a fatal effect, while the base reveals agarwood, ebony, black moss and amber musk. A sophisticated, sexy, masculine and uplifting scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Peppered Mandarin, Bergamot, Cypress, Cardamom and Cumin
Middle note: Leather, Vetiver, Marjoram, Sandalwood and Cedar
Base note: Ebony, Musk and Black moss

product_name: Juicy Couture I Am Juicy Couture Eau de Parfum
description:
Juicy Couture I Am Juicy Couture Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
I Am Juicy Couture by Juicy Couture is a floral, fruity fragrance for women.



The opening is juicy, with bold raspberry, tangy pomelo and sweet passion fruit. The heart is a show-stopping bouquet of gardenia, heliotrope, Rose de Mai and sweet pea, which blends beautifully with the base of soft musk, warm woods and delightful amber.



Juicy has grown up, from the infamous velour tracksuits with “Juicy” written on the bottom to this new scent, which is classy, bold and sophisticated.



The bottle deserves front row seats on your fragrance shelf with a bevelled glass bottle, a gold and crystal cap and Juicy Couture engraved on the neck. It’s simply stunning.



I Am Juicy Couture by Juicy Couture was launched in 2015.

product_name: Kanebo Cosmetics Sensai Silky Purifying Step 1 Cleansing Gel with Scrub
description:
Kanebo Cosmetics Sensai Silky Purifying Step 1 Cleansing Gel with Scrub 125ml
Sensai Silky Purifying reflects the innocence and pure culture of Japan.



The product range includes:



Step 1 - Cleansers that remove impurities and oil-based makeup, without drying or irritating skin.



Step 2 - Facial washes that remove sebum, water based impurities and dead skin cells and prepare the skin for moisturiser. Suitable for all skin types.



Extra Care - Deeply cleasing products to remove stubborn impurities such as black heads and dead cells.



All the products in this range will cleanse, purify and keep skin hydrated.

Amour is winner of FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Women's Nouveau Niche 2007 and FiFi Award Best Packaging Women's Luxe 2007. Amour is sophisticated, feminine, mystical yet modern and unforgettable. For the woman who is elegant, mysterious, and sensual.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rice and White Tea
Middle note: Frangipani, Cherry Blossom and Heliotrope
Base note: Vanilla, Incense, Musk and Woody note:

product_name: Kenzo Flower Hair & Body Mist
description:
Kenzo Flower Hair & Body Mist 100ml
Flower by Kenzo is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



The elegant and sophisticated scent was created by Kenzo Takada to give poppy flowers, which are in most cases scentless, a unique and one of a kind aroma. The notes are composed of several flowers, such as vibrant Parma violet, rose, hawthorn and jasmine. These floral hints are mixed together with opopanax, fruity black currant and mandarin orange. The scent ends with the addition of vanilla, incense and musk, adding depth to the powdery and balsamic composition.



Kenzo Flower is without a doubt the most popular fragrance from Kenzo to date. In collaboration with Serge Mansau, the tall, clear bottle showcases the iconic, vibrant red poppy. This collection was designed to illustrate the relationship between the urban world and the people. Kenzo’s aim was to show the joy and kindness of humanity in this ever changing world.



Kenzo Flower was launched in 2000.

product_name: Kenzo World Eau de Toilette
description:
Kenzo World by Kenzo is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2016. A fragrance by Francis Kurkdjian. Kenzo World is an intoxicating scent of sparkling fruits and flowers. The spirit-lifting, energy-boosting fragrance will have you feeling refreshed, energetic every time.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Fruits
Middle note: Peony, Floral note:, Egyptian Jasmine
Base note: Ambroxan

product_name: La Perla Divina Gold Eau de Toilette
description:
La Perla Divina Gold Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Divina Gold by La Perla is a sweet and flower fragrance for women.



It is a special edition of the original Divina perfume and consists of caramel and white flower accords, as well as notes of champagne and orange blossom. Divina Gold is more elegant and sensual than the original version Divina, with a heart of exotic flower notes, wild strawberry and amber.



Divina Gold was launched in 2012.

La Perla In Rosa by La Perla was launched 2012.

product_name: Lalique Encre Noire Eau de Toilette
description:
Lalique Encre Noire Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Encre Noire by Lalique is a woody aromatic fragrance for men.



The scent contains a simple but elegant mix of woody notes including vetiver, cypress, cashmere wood and musk. Encre Noire has become very popular amongst perfume enthusiasts due to its high quality and longevity at a great price. This is the first fragrance from the Encre Noire collection and has since its launch been released in several new versions including Encre Noire Sport and Encre Noire Pour Elle.



Encre Noire was launched in 2006.

product_name: Lamborghini Prestigio Gift Set 125ml EDT Spray + 100ml Shower Gel + 100ml Aftershave Balm
description:
Lamborghini Prestigio Gift Set 125ml EDT Spray + 100ml Shower Gel + 100ml Aftershave Balm
Prestigio by Lamborghini is a spicy and oriental fragrance for men.



The Italian man is masculine, stylish and possesses a unique elegance and charm which has been captured in the creation of Prestigio. Fresh notes of lemon, mandarin, pineapple juice and fiery nutmeg greet you at the top while the heart is a confident floral blend of violet and orange blossom on a layer of warm amber and spicy cinnamon. The base is a classic warm mix of cedar, vanilla, musk and Tonka bean.



Prestigio was launched in 2011.

Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 250ml
Lancaster has created a reliable and high-quality sun care collection that you can trust.



Protect yourself from the sun’s harmful UV rays with Lancaster’s superb range, including sun cream, after sun, SPF spray and much more, with a variety of SPF factors for you to choose from.

product_name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
description:
La Vie Est Belle by Lancome is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Launched in 2012. A fragrance by Anne Flipo, Olivier Polge and Dominique Ropion. A deliciously sweet, elegant, sexy and irresistible feminine fragrance. It's an invitation to the woman, who feels the need for beauty as her own personal adventure and a symbol of her freedom. This perfume is sure to make a lasting impression. A top seller for a good reason and a sure head turner.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blackcurrant, Pear
Middle note: Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Iris
Base note: Vanilla, Praline, Patchouli, Tonka Bean

product_name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle Gift Set 30ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion + 50ml Shower Gel
description:
Lancome La Vie Est Belle Gift Set 30ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion + 50ml Shower Gel
La Vie Est Belle is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



The scent was inspired by natural beauty and the French title translates to “life is beautiful”. The idea behind the fragrance is reflected in the scent notes which feature a mix of praline, vanilla, patchouli, black currant, tonka bean, pear, iris, jasmine and orange blossom. Actress Julia Roberts starred in the campaign for the perfume.



La Vie Est Belle was launched in 2012

product_name: Lancôme La Vie Est Belle Intensément Eau de Parfum
description:
Lancôme La Vie Est Belle Intensément Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
La Vie Est Belle Intensément by Lancôme is an oriental floral fragrance for women.



The fragrance opens up with notes of raspberry, bergamot and pink pepper, followed by a heart of jasmine sambac, orange blossom and heliotrope, before drying down on a base of iris, patchouli, benzoin, sandalwood and vanilla.



La Vie Est Belle Intensément by Lancôme was launched in 2020.

product_name: Lancome Miracle Eau de Parfum
description:
Lancome Miracle Eau de Parfum 100ml Spray
Miracle by Lancome is an oriental fragrance for women.



This vibrant composition opens with dewy notes of lychee and freesia accompanied by a bouquet of magnolia and jasmine, fueled by spicy notes of ginger and pepper in the heart. The fragrance then unfolds to reveal a soapy base of amber and musk.



The beautiful Uma Thurman was featured in the adverts for this fragrance. She was shown during the break of dawn, offering her the miracle of a new day to cherish life. This sophisticated and elegant aroma can be worn throughout the day.



Miracle by Lancome was launched in 2000.

product_name: Lancome Tresor Eau de Parfum
description:
Tresor by Lancome is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1990. A fragrance by Sophia Grojsman. Lancome's delightful perfume captures the essence of a woman's extraordinary personality, who is always stylish and refined, yet always fun and youthful. A delicately sweet, elegant, sexy and irresistible fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Peach, Rose, Apricot Blossom, Lilac, Pineapple, Lily-of-the-Valley and Bergamot
Middle note: Rose, Iris, Heliotrope and Jasmine
Base note: Peach, Apricot, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk

product_name: Laura Biagiotti Forever Eau de Parfum
description:
Laura Biagiotti Forever Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Forever by Laura Biagiotti is a chypre floral fragrance for women.



The fragrance opens up with notes of bergamot, pink pepper, black currant, pear and apple, followed by a heart of rose, lily of the valley, violet, praline and tuberose, before drying down on a base of vanilla, musk, tonka bean and benzoin.



Forever by Laura Biagiotti was launched in 2019.

product_name: Leichner Camera Clear Tinted Foundation
description:
Leichner Camera Clear Tinted Foundation 30ml Blend of Chestnut
Camera Clear Tinted Foundation by Leichner is a range of professional stage make-up foundations.



The heavy cream consistence gives a flawless finish. A little goes a long way with this product as it is thick and gives full coverage.



This formula is not recommended for oily skin but will work well for other types. The cream is not suitable to wear over a long period of time as its main purpose is for use in photographic studios, television and theatre.

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Green Lover Gift Set 100ml EDT + 75ml Aftershave Balm + Pouch
description:
Lolita Lempicka Green Lover Gift Set 100ml EDT + 75ml Aftershave Balm + Pouch
Green Lover by Lolita Lempicka is an aromatic fragrance for men.



A fresh and spicy opening introduces Green Lover with notes of green mandarin and pepper. The freshness continues in the heart with a combination of mint, gin and juniper berry notes before it slips into a sweet vanilla and musky base.



The nose behind Green Lover by Lolita Lempicka was Maïa Lernout and this scent was launched in 2019.

product_name: Lolita Lempicka LolitaLand Eau de Parfum
description:
Lolita Lempicka LolitaLand Eau de Parfum 40ml Spray
LolitaLand by Lolita Lempicka is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



This beautiful fragrance is full of fruity accords in the opening for a fresh and sweet top, including notes of Italian mandarin, grapefruit, lemon, lime and orange, as well as a hint of pepper and Bellini. The middle notes include jasmine sambac, white peach, black currant, magnolia, plum and rose for a fruity bouquet heart. It ends on a sweet yet woody base including notes of vanilla, white musk, benzoic, licorice and sandalwood.



LolitaLand by Lolita Lempicka is an incredibly feminine fragrance launched in 2018.

product_name: Madonna Blossom Body Mist
description:
Madonna Blossom Body Mist 100ml Spray
Blossom by Madonna is a spicy and fresh fragrance for women.



The top notes are Freesia, California Gardenia and African Freesia Petals, before melting in to a heart of Jasmine, Damask Rose and Coriander. It finishes off on a base of Vetiver, Patchouli and Vanilla.

product_name: Madonna Divine Body Mist
description:
Madonna Divine Body Mist 100ml Spray
Divine by Madonna is a musky and floral fragrance for women.



The top notes are Bergamot, Strawberry, Dewberry, Honey and Rose, before melting in to a heart of Chocolate, Caramel and Coumarin. It finishes off on a base of Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla and Musk.

product_name: Madonna Truth or Dare Shower Gel
description:
Madonna Truth or Dare Shower Gel 200ml
Truth or Dare by Madonna is a floral fragrance for women.



The scent opens up with a bouquet of neroli, gardenia and tuberose, which melt into a sensual heart of jasmine, benzoin and lily on a base of vanilla, musk and amber.



The feminine composition comes from the idea of creating something classical but modern at the same time. This translated in a powerful scent with an impressive silage and excellent longevity.



The inspiration behind Truth or Dare was the singer’s late mother; Madonna’s oldest memory of her mum was in fact her perfume. The perfume has been released as part of the lifestyle brand Truth or Dare founded by Madonna and her daughter Lourdes in 2010.



Truth or Dare was launched by Madonna in 2012.

product_name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette
description:
Marc Jacobs Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Daisy Dream by Marc Jacobs is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



Daisy Dream includes notes of blackberry, wisteria, litchi, pear, grapefruit and jasmine on a base of coconut, musk and woods. The scent focuses on blue accords, making it a soft and clean fragrance with a naturally fresh feel.



Daisy Dream by Marc Jacobs was launched in 2014 and is part of the popular Daisy series of fragrances.

product_name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau de Toilette
description:
Daisy by Marc Jacobs is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 2007. Created by Alberto Morillas. Daisy is 2x FiFi award winner: Fragrance Of The Year Women's Luxe 2008 and Best Packaging Women's Prestige 2008. Daisy is a playful, floral, feminine scent with a fruity twist. A floral scent with a juicy fruity aroma, it's the perfect way to refresh and energize your senses. This is a fragrance for the woman who wants to be her own person and be noticed for her own personality. A scent that is sophisticated, feminine and sexy.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Violet Leaf, Blood Grapefruit and Strawberry
Middle note: Violet, Gardenia and Jasmine
Base note: Musk, White Woods and Vanilla

product_name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette
description:
Daisy Eau So Fresh by Marc Jacobs is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2011. Daisy was created by Alberto Morillas. A fresh and fabulous scent from the Marc Jacobs Daisy fragrance collection. It's perfect for the spa, the park, or the office. This elegant, distinctive, fresh scent is complemented with a floral heart that is sure to keep you feeling fresh and energized all day long. The enticing top note is finished with a sexy, sophisticated heart.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Green note:, Raspberry, Pear and Grapefruit
Middle note: Violet, Litchi, Apple Blossom, Rose and Jasmine
Base note: Musk, Plum and Virginia Cedar

product_name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Gift Set 75ml EDT + 75ml Body Lotion + 75ml Shower Gel
description:
Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Gift Set 75ml EDT + 75ml Body Lotion + 75ml Shower Gel
Daisy Eau So Fresh by Marc Jacobs is a floral and fruity fragrance for women.



This scent features sweet top notes of grapefruit, raspberry, pear and green accords which blend with sparkly flowery notes of jasmine, rose, violet, litchi and apple blossom on a powdery base of musk, Virginia cedar and plum.



This fragrance is part of the beloved collection "Daisy" by Marc Jacobs and it features a fresh, light and elegant scent, perfect for getting that spring feeling. Whether you are looking for a lightly scented perfume to wear to work or a pleasant scent that makes you feel pretty on a night out, this product won’t let you down!



Daisy Eau So Fresh was launched in 2011.

product_name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Gift Set 100ml EDT + 75ml Body Lotion
description:
Marc Jacobs Daisy Gift Set 100ml EDT + 75ml Body Lotion
Daisy by Marc Jacobs is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



This is a powdery scent that opens up with dazzling notes of blood grapefruit and strawberry, followed by a bouquet of jasmine, gardenia and violet on a comfortable base of musk, white woods and vanilla. Daisy is a clean and innocent scent that will freshen up your day. It comes in the iconic daisy-shaped bottle, which will be a classy addition to your perfume collection!



Daisy's instant freshness makes it a great fragrance for everyday use, as well as to give you an extra boost of energy. Due to its extraordinary success among women of all ages, Daisy has been followed by many other editions, including Daisy Blush and Daisy Kiss.



Daisy was launched by Marc Jacobs in 2007.

product_name: Mäurer & Wirtz Tabac Man Anti-Pespirant Spray
description:
Mäurer & Wirtz Tabac Man Anti-Pespirant Spray 200ml
Tabac Original by Mäurer & Wirtz is a woody and aromatic fragrance for men.



The oak, pepper, lavender and citrus work beautifully together and gives you that barbershop, soapy, masculine scent that never goes out of fashion.



Tabac is one of those old classic barber scents that just seem to get better and better as the years pass. The ideal scent for the mature, sophisticated and confident gentleman.



Tabac Original by Mäurer & Wirtz was launched in 1955.

The oak, pepper, lavender and citrus work beautifully together and gives you that barbershop, soapy, masculine scent that never goes out of fashion.



Tabac is one of those old classic barber scents that just seem to get better and better as the years pass. The ideal scent for the mature, sophisticated and confident gentleman.



Tabac Original by Mäurer & Wirtz was launched in 1955.

Oriental Leather by Memo is a leather fragrance for men and women.



The fragrance opens up with notes of lavender, red chilli pepper and cilantro, followed by a heart of , before drying down on a base of clove, vanilla, benzoin, patchouli and leather.

product_name: Mercedes-Benz Eau de Toilette
description:
Mercedes-Benz Eau de Toilette 120ml Spray
Mercedes-Benz by Mercedes-Benz is a woody spicy fragrance for men.



Mercedes-Benz is an exceptional masculine blend of bergamot and amalfi lemon at the top with a heart of spicy notes of galbanum, nutmeg, violet and pepper while the warm base consists of vetiver, patchouli and Virginia cedar. As unique and stylish as the brand itself, a timeless scent created for the man who loves the finer things in life – from luxury cars to luxurious fragrances.



Mercedes-Benz was launched in 2012.

description:
Missguided Babe Night Eau de Parfum 80ml Spray

The fragrance opens up with notes of pink pepper, lemon, orange, neroli, bergamot, red fruits, followed by a heart of rose, saffron, black pepper, agarwood, jasmine and geranium, before drying down on a base of cashmere wood, tonka bean, cedar, vetiver, amber, musk and patchouli.



Babe Oud by Missguided was launched in 2018.

product_name: Miu Miu Twist Eau de Parfum
description:
Miu Miu Twist Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Twist by Miu Miu is a floral, woody and musk fragrance for women, it comes in two versions, an Eau de Toilette and an Eau de Parfum.



The Pink EDP is a sensual fragrance that opens up with notes of rejuvenating notes of bergamot, red berries and apple which develop with a heart of musk and violet on a deep and woody base of pink amber, cedar and tonka bean.



The EDT comes as a yellow fluid and opens with gorgeous notes of mandarin and orange blossom on a base of pink amber, tonka bean and cedar. It is a slightly lighter version of the EDP, perfect for springtime.



Both the EDP and EDT of Twist were launched by Miu Miu in 2019.

product_name: Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream
description:
Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream 250ml
Moroccanoil offers a revolutionary range of luxury haircare that guarantees healthier hair after just one application.



Founder Carmen Tal decided to create the brand after experiencing a colouring disaster that completely damaged her hair, forcing her to get an emergency treatment. This was based on argan oil, which managed to get her hair to look smooth and shiny again. For this reason she committed herself to the mission of spreading this miracle-working oil across the globe.



As the pioneer of a new oil treatment category, Moroccanoil has quickly gained great success among stylists and celebrities. What makes these hair products so effective is the advanced infusion of antioxidants and nutrients that leave the hair bright and nourished.



Moroccanoil is a great choice if you are looking to add the wonders of argan oil to your everyday routine. Try the hydrating shampoo or conditioner or treat damaged hair with the intense oil treatments and hair mask.

product_name: Moroccanoil Fleur de Rose Shower Milk
description:
Moroccanoil Fleur de Rose Shower Milk 200ml
Moroccanoil offers a revolutionary range of luxury haircare that guarantees healthier hair after just one application.



Founder Carmen Tal decided to create the brand after experiencing a colouring disaster that completely damaged her hair, forcing her to get an emergency treatment. This was based on argan oil, which managed to get her hair to look smooth and shiny again. For this reason she committed herself to the mission of spreading this miracle-working oil across the globe.



As the pioneer of a new oil treatment category, Moroccanoil has quickly gained great success among stylists and celebrities. What makes these hair products so effective is the advanced infusion of antioxidants and nutrients that leave the hair bright and nourished.



Moroccanoil is a great choice if you are looking to add the wonders of argan oil to your everyday routine. Try the hydrating shampoo or conditioner or treat damaged hair with the intense oil treatments and hair mask.

product_name: Moschino Cheap & Chic Eau de Toilette
description:
Moschino Cheap & Chic Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Cheap & Chic by Moschino is a floral fragrance for women.



The first notes that hit you are those of rich musk, followed by citrusy bergamot before the floral heart takes over with violet, peony, water lily, cyclamen and roses. The base is a spicy blend of warm sandalwood, vetiver and tonka bean.



Cheap & Chic is delicate and fresh, yet warm and easy to wear. The cute bottle is designed in the image of the cartoon character Olive Oyl.



Cheap & Chic by Moschino was launched in 1995.

product_name: Moschino Cheap & Chic I Love Love Eau de Toilette
description:
Moschino Cheap & Chic I Love Love Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Cheap & Chic I Love Love is a floral woody musk fragrance for women.



This energetic and fresh Eau de Toilette includes a citrus top note on a floral heart of rose, lily of the valley, bulrush and cinnamon leaves. The perfume dries down into a base of Tanaka wood, musk and cedar. I Love Love is part of Moschino’s amazing Cheap & Chic collection.



Moschino Cheap & Chic I Love Love was introduced in 2004.

product_name: Moschino Fresh Couture Eau de Toilette
description:
Moschino Fresh Couture Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Fresh Couture by Moschino is a refreshing floral and fruity fragrance for women.



As with other releases from the radical fashion house the product is built with a generous portion of humour which is evident in the design. The bottle is shaped as a household cleaner to play with the contrast between luxurious perfume and everyday necessities.



Just like its packaging, the fragrance is clean and fun with crisp top notes of bergamot, mandarin and ylang-ylang settling into lush peony, raspberry and osmanthus. Patchouli, ambrox and woodsy notes form the base.



Following Fresh Couture’s launch in 2015 Moschino has also released the editions Gold Fresh Couture and Pink Fresh Couture with similarly striking designs.

product_name: Moschino Funny Eau de Toilette
description:
Moschino Funny Eau de Toilette 25ml Spray
Funny! by Moschino is a fresh, green fragrance for women.



This uplifting scent begins with juicy notes of bitter orange, red currant and pink pepper, followed by a bouquet of flowers, including jasmine, green tea, violet and peony, whilst the base is warm and comforting with notes of musk, cedar, oakmoss and amber.



Funny is aimed at girls who enjoy life to the fullest. The youthful nature of Funny! was created by perfumer, Antoine Maisondieu and the aroma comes in a cool and playful bottle with a heart-shaped silver cap.



Funny! was launched by Moschino in 2007.

product_name: Nicki Minaj Pink Friday Body Mist
description:
Nicki Minaj Pink Friday Body Mist 235ml Spray
Pink Friday by Nicki Minaj is a sweet and fruity fragrance for women.



This is the very first scent released by the American rapper, named after her debut studio album released in 2010.



The fragrance starts off with star fruit, mandarin and boysenberry. The heart consists of lotus and jasmine petals, whilst the base notes are caramelised pear, vanilla, musk and wood.



Pink Friday was created in collaboration with the Elizabeth Arden company and designed by Lance McGregor. It was nominated for Fifi Award for Fragrance of The Year and Best Packaging in 2013. The lively bottle is shaped after Nicki’s bust with a striking pink tutu and wig.



It was launched in 2012.

product_name: Nina Ricci L'air Du Temps Eau de Toilette
description:
L'Air du Temps by Nina Ricci is a Floral perfume for women. Launched in 1948. A fragrance by Francis Fabron. A beautiful timeless scent, a classic vintage elegance in a pretty bottle. First is melancholic, at the heart is joyful and innocent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Neroli, Brazilian Rosewood, Peach, Bergamot, Carnation, Aldehydes, Rose
Middle note: Rose, Violet, Orris Root, Rosemary, Orchid, Carnation, Cloves, Gardenia, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang,
Base note: Benzoin, Amber, Vetiver, Cedar, Spices, Iris, Oakmoss, Musk, Sandalwood

product_name: Nina Ricci Les Monstres de Nina Ricci Nina Eau de Toilette
description:
Les Monstres de Nina Ricci Nina by Nina Ricci is a Floral Fruity perfume for women. Launched in 2018. Created by Olivier Cresp. A lovely floral, fruity scent. Great for the younger generation. Refreshing top notes of sweet pear, crisp lemon and bergamot lead into the heart of a floral bouquet of peony, jasmine and rose, while the base notes of praline, vanilla and coffee create a warm, sensual feel.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pear, Cassis, Bergamot, Lemon
Middle note: Cotton Candy, Apple, Peony, Rose, Jasmine
Base note: Praline, Coffee, Vanilla and Coumarin

product_name: Nina Ricci Nina Deodorant Spray
description:
Nina Ricci Nina Deodorant Spray 150ml
Nina by Nina Ricci is a sweet citrus scent for women.



The charming fairytale magic of this scent is built on an exquisite blend of lime and Amalfi lemon, which melt into a seductive heart of apple, peony and pralines on a base of musk and Virginia cedar wood. This Nina Ricci perfume is a new fragrance, different from the Nina perfume of the same name created in 1987.



Nina by Nina Ricci was released in 2006.

product_name: Nina Ricci Nina Eau de Toilette
description:
Nina by Nina Ricci is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2006. Created by Olivier Cresp, Jacques Cavallier and Christian Dussoulier. A pleasant, appealing composition, that is delicately sweet and smell like a fresh, crisp winter air with a natural apple scent. Easy to wear, great for all occasions and by all the ages.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note:  Amalfi Lemon, Lime
Middle note: Granny Smith apple, Praline, Peony, Datura
Base note: Apple Tree, Musk, Virginia Cedar

Nina Ricci Nina Rouge Eau de Toilette 80ml Spray
Nina Rouge by Nina Ricci is a fruity and floral fragrance for women.



This lovely fragrance opens up with playful notes of raspberry and citron, followed by a heart of ginger flower and gardenia before drying down on a sugary base of caramel and vanilla.



Rouge is a bright and girly gourmand that is easy to wear and is created by master perfumer Oliver Cresp. This flanker is a slightly sweeter and more floral than the original Nina and is housed in a deep red version of the signature apple shaped bottle.



Nina Rouge was launched by Nina Ricci in 2019.

product_name: Oscar De La Renta Oscar Eau de Toilette
description:
Oscar De La Renta Oscar Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Oscar by Oscar de la Renta is a floral and aromatic fragrance for women.



Oscar contains a rich pyramid of accords including coriander, orange blossom, gardenia and cloves in the top, tuberose, lavender, rosemary and ylang-ylang in the heart, and myrrh, sandalwood, opoponax, amber and coconut in the base.



This flowery blend was the very first scent released by Oscar de la Renta and has been followed by more than 40 fragrances, including a special jubilee edition called "Oscar Celebration" in 2007.



Oscar was launched by Oscar de la Renta in 1977.

product_name: Oscar De La Renta Oscar Eau de Toilette
description:
Oscar De La Renta Oscar Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Oscar by Oscar de la Renta is a floral and aromatic fragrance for women.



Oscar contains a rich pyramid of accords including coriander, orange blossom, gardenia and cloves in the top, tuberose, lavender, rosemary and ylang-ylang in the heart, and myrrh, sandalwood, opoponax, amber and coconut in the base.



This flowery blend was the very first scent released by Oscar de la Renta and has been followed by more than 40 fragrances, including a special jubilee edition called "Oscar Celebration" in 2007.



Oscar was launched by Oscar de la Renta in 1977.

product_name: Oscar de la Renta Oscar for Men Eau de Toilette
description:
Oscar de la Renta Oscar for Men Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Oscar for Men was launched in 1999 by Oscar De La Renta.

The top notes (grapefruit, thyme, nutmeg and pepper) are an invigoratingly tonic, like a rush of mountain breeze - the kind of breeze that ruffles the ferns and firs. The forested heart is made of geranium and spicy carnation, while the subtle base consists of patchouli, cedar and moss.



Oscar for Men is a lean-bodied scent that manages to marry high-spirited sportiness with a hint of nonchalant elegance.

product_name: Oscar de la Renta Pour Lui Eau de Toilette
description:
Oscar de la Renta Pour Lui Eau de Toilette 90ml Spray
Pour Lui by Oscar de la Renta is a masculine dry and woodsy blend that evokes the energy, intensity, and prowess of today's man. It was launched in 1980 by Oscar De La Renta and processes a blend of moss, vetiver, sage, sandalwood and green herbs.



Oscar Pour Lui is for the confident, self-motivated male.

product_name: Paco Rabanne 1 Million Deodorant Spray
description:
Paco Rabanne 1 Million Deodorant Spray 150ml
1 Million by Paco Rabanne is an award-winning woody and spicy fragrance for men.



This strong and long-lasting scent opens with top notes of blood mandarin and peppermint, blending into a seductive heart of cinnamon and Rose Absolute. The warm base contains amber, leather accords, woody notes and Indian patchouli. 1 Million is both luxurious and masculine. The scent is presented in the now iconic gold bullion bottle.



1 Million by Paco Rabanne was launched in 2008.

product_name: Paco Rabanne 1 Million Eau De Toilette
description:
1 Million by Paco Rabanne is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2008. 1 Million was created by  Michel Girard, Christian Dussoulier, Christophe Raynaud and Olivier Pescheux. 1 Million represents luxury, wealth, power and durability. This masculine fragrance is a great way to express your individual elegant style. It has a masculine, woody, spicy scent that gives you that extra confidence boost. An elegant and sophisticated perfume, that exudes a sexy and charming aura. The luxury composition of notes in this fragrance has been carefully selected to create a unique scent. The top notes of Blood Mandarin and Grapefruit are a perfect combination to achieve a fresh and uplifting scent. The middle notes of Cinnamon and Rose are a perfect blend of freshness and delicate sweetness. The Amber and Leather notes are a perfect combination to give you a masculine scent. Very popular among men.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Mandarin, Grapefruit and Mint
Middle note: Cinnamon, Rose and Spicy note:
Base note: Amber, Leather, Woody note: and Indian Patchouli

product_name: Paco Rabanne 1 Million Eau De Toilette
description:
1 Million by Paco Rabanne is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Launched in 2008. 1 Million was created by  Michel Girard, Christian Dussoulier, Christophe Raynaud and Olivier Pescheux. 1 Million represents luxury, wealth, power and durability. This masculine fragrance is a great way to express your individual elegant style. It has a masculine, woody, spicy scent that gives you that extra confidence boost. An elegant and sophisticated perfume, that exudes a sexy and charming aura. The luxury composition of notes in this fragrance has been carefully selected to create a unique scent. The top notes of Blood Mandarin and Grapefruit are a perfect combination to achieve a fresh and uplifting scent. The middle notes of Cinnamon and Rose are a perfect blend of freshness and delicate sweetness. The Amber and Leather notes are a perfect combination to give you a masculine scent. Very popular among men.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Mandarin, Grapefruit and Mint
Middle note: Cinnamon, Rose and Spicy note:
Base note: Amber, Leather, Woody note: and Indian Patchouli

product_name: Paco Rabanne Black XS Eau de Parfum
description:
Black XS for Her Eau de Parfum by Paco Rabanne is a Amber Woody fragrance for women. Launched in 2018. Black XS is a scent of seduction, sensuality, and sexuality all wrapped up in a beautiful fragrance. The top notes of cranberry, pink pepper and tamarind make a bold statement. The heart notes of cacao, rose and black violet add a little sweetness. The base notes of black vanilla husk, massoia wood and sandalwood gives the warmth and softness.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Cranberry, Pink Pepper and Tamarind
Middle note: Cacao, Rose and Black Violet
Base note: Black Vanilla Husk, Massoia Wood and Sandalwood

product_name: Paco Rabanne Invictus All Over Shampoo
description:
Paco Rabanne Invictus All Over Shampoo 150ml
Invictus by Paco Rabanne is a fresh and aquatic fragrance for men.



It contains notes of grapefruit, marine accord, aromatic bay leaf and hedione jasmine on a woody base of guaiac wood, patchouli, oak moss and ambergris. Invictus is inspired by sport, embodied in the legends of the Romans gladiators. It's an energetic fragrance that's perfect for active men. The name is latin, meaning "Invincible.” The bottle is designed in the shape of a trophy.



Invictus by Paco Rabanne was launched in 2013.

product_name: Paco Rabanne Lady Million Deodorant Spray
description:
Paco Rabanne Lady Million Deodorant Spray 150ml
Lady Million by Paco Rabanne is a woody, fresh and floral scent for women.



Lady Million is a wonderfully soft, warm and quite uplifting scent. The opening is fresh with sparkling citrus and hints of raspberry, followed by the white floral heart. Honey, amber and slight notes of patchouli can be found at the base.



One look at the flacon, a golden shaped diamond, and you know you are in for a real treat. Lady Million oozes wealth and luxury; it is a scent for a dazzling, sophisticated and seductive woman.



Treat yourself, or a loved one, to Paco Rabanne Lady Million. The scent alone or as part of one of our many exquisite gift sets is sure to put a big smile on anyone’s face.



Lady Million by Paco Rabanne was launched in 2010.

product_name: Paco Rabanne Lady Million Eau de Parfum
description:
Lady Million by Paco Rabanne is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2010. Lady Million was created by Anne Flipo, Bruno Jovanovic, Beatrice Piquet and Dominique Ropion. Lady Million represents elegance, wealth and luxury. A sensual, powerfully seductive and intoxicating composition. Refreshing top notes, middle notes are fresh and clean adding the sensuality. The base notes are delicately sweet and warm, radiates warmth and comfort.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Raspberry, Neroli and Amalfi Lemon
Middle note: Jasmine, African Orange flower and Gardenia
Base note: White honey, Patchouli and Amber

product_name: Paco Rabanne Olympea Body Lotion
description:
Paco Rabanne Olympea Body Lotion 200ml
Olympea by Paco Rabanne is an oriental and floral fragrance for women.



This beautiful fragrance has a very unique combination of floral and oriental notes, as well as refreshing salt accords. It opens with green mandarin, water jasmine and ginger lily notes, with salted vanilla at the heart and sandalwood, cashmere and ambergris notes at the base.



Paco Rabanne Olympea perfume was launched in 2015 and is available as gift sets as well as individual scents. It is the female counterpart to Rabanne's popular scent Invictus from 2013 and was inspired by the Greek goddess Olympia, to evoke strength and empower women.

product_name: Paco Rabanne Olympea Eau de Parfum
description:
Olympéa by Paco Rabanne is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2015. Olympéa was created by Anne Flipo, Loc Dong and Dominique Ropion. A refreshing fragrance to help to make any woman feel confident and sexy. Inspired by the competition, athletic spirit and victory. A wild, daring fragrance. As you enjoy this tantalizing scent, you will be transported to a world of radiant energy and confidence.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Water Jasmine, Ginger flower and Green Mandarin
Middle note: Salt and Vanilla
Base note: Cashmere Wood, Ambergris and Sandalwood

product_name: Paco Rabanne Paco XS Eau de Toilette
description:
Paco XS by Paco Rabanne is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. XS was launched in 1994. Paco XS was created by Gerard Anthony and Rosendo Mateu. A fresh and invigorating fragrance, which is designed to energize and revitalize the wearer. Its top notes are fresh notes of bergamot, rosemary, mint, lemon and mandarin orange. The middle notes are mint, juniper, brazilian rosewood, sage, bourbon geranium and coriander. The notes of sandalwood, musk, amber, oakmoss, vanilla, cedar and patchouli give this scent its warm, masculine character. It is recommended for casual wear.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bergamot, Rosemary, Mint, Lemon, Tarragon and Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Juniper, Brazilian Rosewood, Sage, Bourbon Geranium and Coriander
Base note: Sandalwood, Musk, Amber, Oakmoss, Vanilla, Cedar and Patchouli

A futuristic, aromatic fragrance with selected luxury ingredients to help you feel confident, energized, elegant and sexy. Money saving refill. Just fill up your previous bottle.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lavender, Lemon Zest, Amalfi Lemon

Base note: Vanilla, Lavender and Vetiver

product_name: Paco Rabanne Pure XS for Her Eau de Parfum
description:
Paco Rabanne Pure XS for Her Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Pure XS for Her by Paco Rabanne is a floral fragrance for women.



This fragrance opens up with stunning notes of ylang ylang and vanilla which are sweetened even more in the heart with gourmand hints of slightly salted sweet popcorn. The scent dries down on a mellow and intriguing base of ambrette seed and sandalwood.



Actress and model Emily Ratajkowski is the face for Pure XS for Her, the advert shows the effects this sensual scent has on men. The intoxicating nature of this perfume is captured in a pink bottle with golden accents that has the same shape as the Black XS bottle. The seductive nature of the scent is symbolised by the snake that is wrapped around the neck.



Pure XS for Her by Paco Rabanne was launched in 2018.

product_name: Paco Rabanne Ultrared Eau de Parfum
description:
Ultrared by Paco Rabanne is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2008. A sensual and mesmerizing scent that will entice and captivate. Ultrared has a lot of sweet and fruity notes which will help women feel better and more confident. This fresh and fruity fragrance has a new twist in the ever exciting world of floral perfumes. The delightful combination of fruit and flowers gives this fresh fragrance an exotic touch. Fresh sparkling notes of Red Currant and Strawberry are combined with the sensual scent of Marshmallow, Licorice, Star Anise and Jasmine. A sensual finish of Cedar is enhanced with a hint of Vanilla.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Red Currant and Strawberry
Middle note: Marshmallow, Licorice, Star Anise and Jasmine
Base note: Vanilla and Cedar

product_name: Paco Rabanne Ultrared Eau de Toilette
description:
Ultrared Men by Paco Rabanne is a Citrus Gourmand fragrance for men. Launched in 2008. A masculine, elegant and unique fragrance that will have you smelling your best all day long. This exquisite perfume is an absolute treat for the senses. The top note is blood orange, which is a zesty and fresh scent. The middle notes are praline and tonka bean, which are sweet and warm. The base notes are vanilla and patchouli, which create a sensual and mysterious feel.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Blood Orange
Middle note: Praline and Tonka Bean
Base note: Vanilla and Patchouli

product_name: Paco Rabanne Ultraviolet Eau de Parfum
description:
Ultraviolet by Paco Rabanne is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 1999. Created by Jacques Cavallier. It is a true fragrance for those looking for a fragrance that will give a sexy and fresh impression. Ultraviolet is a bouquet of fragrant sweet, powdery and woody notes that will bring a soft, warm and sensual scent sensation. An elegant, inviting and comforting scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pepper, Orange Pepper, Pimento, Apricot, Coriander, Fresh Almond and Brazilian Rosewood
Middle note: Violet, Japanese Osmanthus, Rose and Jasmine
Base note: Vanilla, Amber, Patchouli and Cedar

product_name: Paco Rabanne Ultraviolet Man Eau De Toilette
description:
Ultraviolet by Paco Rabanne is a Amber Woody fragrance for men. Launched in 2000. Created by Jacques Cavallier. A unique, classy masculine and modern scent. The sensational fragrance is available in a great and elegant bottle for men that beautifully reflects the quality and dedication of Paco Rabanne. Ultraviolet is magnetically attractive fragrance which seduces with its uniqueness; it is built on contrasts: traditional and bold, fresh and mild, strong and sensual. A great fragrance for any occasion.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mint and Amber
Middle note: Vetiver, Pepper and Spicy note:
Base note: Oakmoss and Vanilla

product_name: Paco Rabanne XS Eau de Toilette
description:
XS by Paco Rabanne is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2018. XS was created by Gerard Anthony and Rosendo Mateu. A daring combination of intensity, freshness, sensuality and transparency. The top notes of XS's fragrance are a fresh burst of crisp mint and lemon, followed by a sensual heart of bergamot, juniper berries, coriander and geranium. The base notes of rosemary, oakmoss and sandalwood give it a masculine finish to keep you smelling fantastic throughout the day.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mint, Bergamot and Lemon
Middle note: Juniper Berries, Coriander and Geranium
Base note: Rosemary, Oakmoss and Sandalwood

product_name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Shampoo
description:
Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Shampoo 75ml
Philip Kingsley haircare products are formulated by the world’s leading trichologists, fully dedicated to create products that make your hair beautiful and healthy, using only the finest and most effective ingredients.



The brand has quickly become a favourite amongst professionals, models and celebrities. It is widely considered one of the world’s leading experts and most technologically advanced in the hair and scalp care.



Responsible for coining the phrase “bad hair day”, Kingsley was also the first brand to focus on the idea of ‘hair textures’ and developed the world’s first “pre-shampoo conditioner”.



With an impressive celebrity following including Cate Blanchett, Victoria Beckham and Sienna Miller, the award-winning product range has received the CoolBrands accolade.

No Limit$ by Philipp Plein is an oriental spicy fragrance for men.



The fragrance opens up with notes of cloves, cinnamon, cardamom, star anise, black pepper, ginger, bergamot and watery notes, followed by a heart of amber, incense, bourbon vanilla and dark chocolate, before drying down on a base of agarwood, leather, patchouli, cedar and woody notes.



No Limit$ by Philipp Plein was launched in 2020.

product_name: Police To Be Eau de Toilette
description:
Police To Be Eau de Toilette 40ml Spray
To Be by Police is a woody spicy fragrance for men. It is one of the most prominent fragrances from this fearless Italian fashion house. To Be instantly stands out from the crowd with its blue skull-shaped glass bottle.



The fragrance is masculine with top notes of grapefruit and provocative black pepper, then transcends into violet leaf before it hits the woody base formed of cedar, amber and patchouli.



To Be was launched by Police in 2011 and has been followed by several editions of the successful fragrance; To Be Rebel, To Be the King and To Be Mr Beat just to mention a few, all captured in the iconic and stylish skull bottle.

product_name: Police To Be The Queen Eau de Parfum
description:
Police To Be The Queen Eau de Parfum 40ml Spray
To Be The Queen by Police is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



The perfume starts off with bursts of pineapple, citruses and petit grain, before entering the heart of sweet peach, hints of red berries, warm violet and sensual patchouli. The finishing notes of To Be The Queen consist of cedar, vanilla and musk.



This is one of the most budget friendly fragrances with long-lasting power around, and if that wasn’t enough it’s also a delicious and easy-to-wear scent.



The design of To Be The Queen is fabulous and quirky - a white skull-shaped flacon with a gold crown and a Police emblem as the mouth. The idea behind the packaging is to represent a strong desire for power in an ironic way. It certainly makes a cool perfume bottle – plus the scent inside is exquisite!



To Be The Queen by Police was launched in 2013.

Prada Luna Rossa Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Luna Rossa by Prada is named after the sailboat and the sailing team "Red Moon" or Luna Rossa, which participates in the American Cup competitions.



The scent is masculine and fresh, with top notes include lavender absolute and bitter orange; middlenotes consist of clary sage and spearmint whilst the base contains notes of ambrette absolute and ambroxan molecule.

product_name: Prada Luna Rossa Sport Eau de Toilette
description:
Prada Luna Rossa Sport Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Luna Rossa Sport by Prada is an oriental and spicy fragrance for men.



Luna Rossa Sport is a new version of the popular Luna Rossa fragrance by Prada. This vibrant scent is inspired by the world of extreme sailing and contains opening notes of ginger and juniper berries, followed by a heart of lavender and a warm base of vanilla and Tonka bean. The modern bottle follows the shape of the original Luna Rossa fragrance, combining two different materials, resulting in a fresh look.



Luna Rossa Sport was launched by Prada in 2015.

product_name: Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum
description:
Fragrance Family: Amber Floral

Key Notes: Fresh Neroli Bud, Sensual Amber Accord, Intense White Musks

About the Fragrance:
Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum, the new feminine signature fragrance, is the essential expression of Prada femininity in all its forms. Created by Nadège Le Garlantezec, Antoine Maisondieu, and Shyamala Maisondieu, the feminine floral fragrance invites you to explore and express the paradoxical multi-dimensions of women—the celebration of being never the same, always yourself.

Fragrance Description:
Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum is a floral ambery fragrance that embraces the paradoxes of iconic ingredients to reveal new scented sensations. With dominating notes of neroli and jasmine, a white flower bouquet is twisted with an avant-garde olfactory signature of Ambrofix™ and Serenolide™ accord. This unique blend creates an intimate and enduring trail, ensuring a vibrant warmth that lasts.

The freshness of the floral notes and the warmth of the amber aromas make Prada Paradox Eau de Parfum the perfect fragrance for the earthy seasons of spring and fall.

Master the art of applying Prada fragrances to enhance your confidence and leave a lasting impression. The warmth of your own body can intensify the scent, so strategically apply it in the creases of your knees and elbows for a strong and long-lasting perfume scent. Remember, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin after applying your eau de toilette. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent.

The Bottle:
Encapsulating the very essence of Prada, the Paradoxe refillable bottle reinvents the brand's most iconic code: its triangle logo. Tilted yet powerfully grounded, the radical shape of the bottle is softened by rounded angles, while the delicate coral pink color of the fragrance contrasts with the deep black cap and Prada coat of arms.

Genuinely committed to progress, Prada Beauty is constantly exploring new opportunities to improve its sustainability and embrace transparency. As a testament to this commitment, the entire Prada Paradoxe range features refillable bottles, significantly reducing packaging material and our environmental footprint.

product_name: Prada Prada Candy Eau de Parfum
description:
Prada Prada Candy Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Prada Candy by Prada is a sweet musky fragrance for women.



This delicious scent contains a unique blend of caramel, white musk, vanilla and benzoin. Wild and colorful, Prada Candy celebrates the joys of life with bright shades of feminine pink and gold.



This is the very first fragrance from Prada's gourmand series Candy, which includes some of their most successful scents. The face of the campaign is the French actress Léa Seydoux, who stars in the Candy short film created and directed by Jean-Paul Goud.



Prada Candy was launched in 2011.

description:
Polo Ultra Blue by Ralph Lauren is a Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2018. A very refreshing, energising and masculine scent with a hint of salt. Excellent perfume for men on the hot summer days. Great as a pre-post gym scent too. This quality juice will help you feel like as if you're strolling about with your own ocean with pounding waves crashing on the rocks.

Top note: Lemon, Lemon Verbena and Basil
Middle note: Mineral note: and Ambertonic
Base note: Musk, Salt and Woody note:.

product_name: Ralph Lauren Ralph Eau de Toilette
description:
Ralph Lauren Ralph Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Ralph by Ralph Lauren is floral, fruity fragrance for women.



Ralph is a fresh energetic optimistic scent, perfect for those days when you just need a little pick me up. Crisp apple notes mixed with soft subtle florals, fresh air and subtle clean white musky notes gives you a great summer scent that reminds you of sea, sunshine and fresh air.



Ralph was launched in 2000.

product_name: Ralph Lauren Romance Eau de Parfum
description:
Ralph Lauren Romance Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Romance by Ralph Laurent is a fruity floral fragrance for women.



Spray Romance on your body or clothes and let the scent develop. A first it may seem a little strong, but give it 5 minutes and you are left with the most delicate, fresh classic scent you could wish for. The sharp top notes of citrus quickly fade into the delicate floral heart before being wrapped in gentle notes of exotic woods and oakmoss.



Romance was created in 1999 by Ralph Laurent.

product_name: Ralph Lauren Safari Eau de Toilette
description:
Safari for Men by Ralph Lauren is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Launched in 1992. A beautiful composition of masculine, fresh, clean and delicately sweet notes. A great daily fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Green note:, Artemisia, Neroli, Lemon, Lavender, Bergamot, Aldehydes and Coriander
Middle note: Tarragon, Carnation, Cinnamon, Jasmine, Rose and Cyclamen
Base note: Sandalwood, Musk, Leather, Oakmoss, Cedar, Patchouli and Amber

Charlie Silver by Revlon is yet another hit from the renowned company. Their scents have all stood the test of time, and as with the other Revlon fragrances, Charlie Silver is still as popular today as it was in the 90’.

The notes are a light fresh blend of apricot, magnolia, peach, lime, pear and lily-of-the-valley.



Charlie Silver by Revlon was launched in 1997.

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Eau de Parfum
description:
Roberto Cavalli Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Roberto Cavalli launched a new fragrance in 2012, simply named Roberto Cavalli Eau de Parfum. It is created for women who want to be noticed and who prefer to wear Cavalli animal print dresses.



The fragrance is an intense oriental - floral and is based on notes of orange blossom, symbolizing Italian femininity, sensuality and extravagance. There are also ambery - oriental nuances of benzoin, pink pepper, tonka and vanilla. The composition is developed by Louise Turner of Givaudan.



Model and actress Elisa Sednaoui is the muse of this fragrance. The bottle is round topped with a tiara – shaped stopper containing the designer's initials. Golden shades and leopard print decorate the bottle design and packaging.

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Eau de Toilette
description:
Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Just Cavalli by Roberto Cavalli is a floral fragrance for women.



The opening is a fanfare of captivating neroli flower and tiare flower, while the base offers depth with notes of Palisander rosewood. Just Cavalli is an incredible sexy scent that’s subtle enough to wear to the office but powerful enough for the bedroom.



This is the second fragrance Roberto Cavalli has developed for the house of Coty, and just like its predecessor, Roberto Cavalli Eau de Parfum, it’s enriched with carnal sensuality that only him can create.



Just Cavalli was launched by Roberto Cavalli in 2013.

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Eau de Toilette

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Man Eau de Toilette
description:
Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Man Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
Just Cavalli by Roberto Cavalli is a woody and spicy fragrance for men.



A scent of youth and freedom introduced by a fresh and aromatic opening of citruses and hints of pimento; this unique note is not only chosen for its delightful scent, but also as it symbolises virility and seduction.



The base consists of vetiver, a sophisticated and sensual note that gives this concoction a slight smoky quality. Final accords of smooth leather also add a rich mix of depth and voluptuousness to this masculine blend.



Just Cavalli by Roberto Cavalli was launched in 2013.

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Man Eau de Toilette

product_name: Roberto Cavalli Nero Assoluto Eau de Parfum
description:
Roberto Cavalli Nero Assoluto Eau de Parfum 75ml Spray
Nero Assoluto by Roberto Cavalli is an oriental woody fragrance for women.



Italian for “Pure Black”, Nero Assoluto is a rich and sultry scent with a bright, sleek opening. Notes of orchid and citrus fruits greet you at the top before giving way to the decadent vanilla in the heart. The base is pure seduction with woody notes and ebony. An underrated beauty of a fragrance - sublime, clean and expensive smelling without the high price tag.



Nero Assoluto was launched by Roberto Cavalli in 2013.

product_name: Rochas Mademoiselle Rochas Eau de Parfum
description:
Rochas Mademoiselle Rochas Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Mademoiselle Rochas by Rochas is floral fruity fragrance for women.



Sparkling notes of tangy red fruits ensures a fruity opening, before you enter the floral explosion of the heart. You’ll find rose petals mixed with violet and the wonderful jasmine which are considered the essence of elegance, romance and femininity. The base is creamy and thick with sandalwood, ambergris and white musk.



Mademoiselle Rochas is presented in a perfect circle, evoking the roundness and softness of femininity while the juice inside is kept pink to reflects the floral and gourmand notes of the fragrance.



Mademoiselle Rochas was launched in 2017.

Rochas Man is a masculine gourmand fragrance with a smooth coffee scent that soon fades into delicious creamy vanilla. You’ll notice raspberry and amber notes lurking in the background for a sweet and sexy aroma. Rochas Man is cool and relaxed, yet a confident aftershave for men.

product_name: Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely Body Mist
description:
Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely Body Mist 236ml Spray
Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker is a fresh spicy fragrance for women.



An icon within the fashion industry, SJP always wanted to create her signature scent. Lovely was the first of her many successful fragrances; a soft powdery aroma with an opening of lavender, citruses and Martini, a blast of patchouli, orchid and pepper, which quickly settles into a beautiful, clean and fresh musky base.



The packaging is just as lovely as the scent, with an egg-shaped pink bottle, a silver ribbon and golden details on the cap.



Lovely was launched by Sarah Jessica Parker in 2005.

product_name: Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely Eau de Parfum
description:
Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 2005. Created by Clement Gavarry and Laurent Le Guernec. FiFi Award 2006 winner Perfume! Lovely is an intimate, powdery, soft fragrance. It will help you feel elegant, sexy and charming.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Mandarin Orange, Palisander Rosewood, Lavender, Martini, Bergamot
Middle note: Patchouli, Narcissus, Orchid
Base note: Woodsy note:, Cedar, White Amber, Musk

Sebastian created the Professional line for professional hairdressers and stylists; he kept possible difficulties that they face in mind. The brand hopes to change the world, one hairdo a time, by giving us moisturising treatments, shampoos, styling products, hairsprays and much more.

product_name: Shiseido Ultimune Eye Power Infusing Eye Concentrate Serum
description:
Shiseido Ultimune Eye Power Infusing Eye Concentrate Serum 15ml
The Ultimune collection strengthens the skin's immune system, directly targeting Langerhans cells.

Shiseido discovered that there is a link between Langerhans cells, nerve fibers and emotions, which have an effect on ageing of the skin.

The Ultimune collection boosts the power of the cells to maintain healthy, youthful skin.

product_name: Sisley Soir De Lune Body Cream
description:
Sisley Soir De Lune Body Cream 150ml
Soir de Lune is an elegant and intense modern scent, perfect in the evening after a day in the sun...



This rich and creamy fragrance opens with sharp fresh notes of lemon, bergamot, orange, mandarin, coriander, nutmeg and pimento. The voluptuous floral heart consist of May rose absolute, mimosa absolute, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and peach. The base will make sure you are sweet smelling for hours to come with it refined composition of moss, musk, patchouli, honey and sandalwood.



Soir De Lune was launched in 2006 by Sisley

product_name: Sunkissed 95 Percent Natural Express 1 Hour Tan Mousse
description:
Sunkissed 95 Percent Natural Express 1 Hour Tan Mousse 200ml
Sunkissed tanning products is a range of affordable self-tanning lotions, sprays and mousses.



If you do not have the time for a luxury spray tan every few weeks, Sunkissed have launched a collection of tanning products that give the same results at home. If you prefer a light glow or a deep bronze, this collection includes a variety of sun kissed shades.



Use their body primer to prepare the skin for application to ensure that your summer glow lasts a long time.



With the self tanners in mind, the products are made for easy and even application with little mess and a quick drying time.

product_name: Taylor of London Panache Body Spray
description:
Taylor of London Panache Body Spray 75ml
Panache by Taylor of London is an aldehydic floral fragrance for women. It contains top notes of orange, lemon, coriander and thyme. The heart combines rose, ylang, jasmine, iris, lily and geranium. Base notes are oakmoss, sandalwood, musk and myrrh.



Panache by Taylor of London was launched in 1976.

Ted Baker M Eau de Toilette 30ml Spray
M by Ted Baker is a woody and aromatic fragrance for men.



M is a fresh and confident scent with a spicy opening of Tonka bean, vetiver and musk. The heart of warm amber and coriander blends with the base of fir resin and guaiac wood making this a truly masculine and unique fragrance.



M by Ted Baker was launched in 2002.

product_name: Ted Baker Skinwear Eau de Toilette
description:
Ted Baker Skinwear Eau de Toilette 100ml Spray
Ted Baker Skinwear for Men is a warming blend of cardamom, Sicilian lemon and coffee notes over a base of cedar wood.



Every note in this unique fragrance appears as freshly squeezed or freshly cut, right from the zesty citrus to the warm notes of wood. A masculine and uplifting fragrance that’s sure to refresh and delight the wearer as well as those surrounding him.



Skinwear by Ted Baker was launched in 1998.

product_name: Thierry Mugler Alien Eau De Toilette
description:
Alien Eau de Toilette by Mugler is a Amber Woody fragrance for women. Launched in 2009. The first impression of this feminine fragrance is a lively burst of sparkling citruses. The heart unfolds with a captivating bouquet composed of Moroccan jasmine and white flowers. This floral, amber blend is complimented by fresh amber and cashmere to evoke an extraordinary combination of sensuality and delicacy.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Citruses, Mandarin Orange
Middle note: Moroccan Jasmine, White Flowers
Base note: White Amber, Cashmere

product_name: Thierry Mugler Alien Eau De Toilette
description:

product_name: Thierry Mugler Alien Gift Set 30ml EDP Refillable + 2 x 50ml Body Lotion
description:
Thierry Mugler Alien Gift Set 30ml EDP Refillable + 2 x 50ml Body Lotion
Alien by Thierry Mugler is a woody-floral fragrance for women.



Unleash your inner goddess with this divine combination of rich and soft notes. The aroma is built on fresh mandarin and citrus zest, which melts into a floral bouquet of Arabian jasmine mixed with white flowers on a sensual and powerful base of exotic Cashmeran wood, enriched by white amber.



The scents of the EDT and the EDP are clearly related, but the Eau de Toilette is considered to be a more playful, lighter and creamier play on the more mysterious and seductive Eau de Parfum.



The iconic bottle is an amethyst-coloured talisman with golden embellishments in the shape of an emerald. The name of the perfume is engraved on the glass in an alien-like font, adding to the mysterious flacon of this fragrance.



Alien by Thierry Mugler was launched in 2005 and is Mugler's fourth perfume collection for women. It has been released in many new editions after the initial release and the Eau de Toilette version was released in 2009.

product_name: Thierry Mugler Angel Eau de Parfum
description:
Angel by Mugler is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Launched in 1992. Created by Yves de Chirin and Olivier Cresp. Angel is FiFi Award Hall Of Fame 2007 winner. A perfect scent for the colder seasons. The fragrance is a deep and bold, sweet scent that is modern, yet sophisticated.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bergamot, Pineapple, Mandarin Orange, Cotton Candy, Coconut, Cassis, Melon, Jasmine
Middle note: Peach, Jasmine, Orchid, Caraway, Nutmeg, Rose, Lily-of-the-Valley, Honey, Red Berries, Blackberry, Plum, Apricot
Base note: Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber, Musk, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Chocolate, Caramel

product_name: Tiffany & Co Eau de Parfum
description:
Tiffany & Co Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Tiffany & Co by Tiffany & Co is a floral fragrance for women.



Tiffany has captured the glamour and luxury of New York City in this signature scent. The perfume opens up with citrusy accords of mandarin, bergamot and lemon, which bloom into the elegant heart dominated by the essence of French iris, black currant, delicate rose and fragrant peach. It then settles into notes of patchouli and subtle musk for a warm and sensual finish.



The floral Eau de Parfum, launched in 2017, is a radiant and modern fragrance created by master perfumer Daniela Andrier; he used the most precious ingredients of Haute perfumery to evoke the feeling of jewellery on bare skin. Even the sophisticated flacon is inspired by the house’s most iconic diamond cuts.

product_name: Tigi Bed Head Colour Goddess Oil Infused Shampoo
description:
Tigi Bed Head Colour Goddess Oil Infused Shampoo 750ml
If you colour your hair, you need the right products to treat and nourish your hair to keep it looking healthy and to prolong the colour. That’s where TIGI Bed Head Colour Goddess comes in!



The shampoo contains vitamin E, pro-vitamin B5, sweet almond oil, coconut oil and keratin, which has been proven to not only nourish the hair but also enhance colour and leave you frizz free.



The conditioner is infused with sweet almond oil, which will add a layer of water repelling agents on your hair, without it feeling heavy. The shea butter is perfect as a natural conditioner and will furthermore help you keep your locks frizz free.



The Colour Goddess Treatment Mask combines Keratin, Pro-Vitamin B5 and oils to moisturise and condition your hair. Use it once a week for that extra bit of TLC to keep your hair vibrant, healthy and nourished.



To make things even better, the shampoo and conditioner have a sweet toffee scent too!

The conditioner is infused with sweet almond oil, which will add a layer of water repelling agents on your hair, without it feeling heavy. The shea butter is perfect as a natural conditioner and will furthermore help you keep your locks frizz free.



The Colour Goddess Treatment Mask combines Keratin, Pro-Vitamin B5 and oils to moisturise and condition your hair. Use it once a week for that extra bit of TLC to keep your hair vibrant, healthy and nourished.



To make things even better, the shampoo and conditioner have a sweet toffee scent too!

product_name: Tigi Bed Head Dumb Blonde Reconstructor Conditioner
description:
Tigi Bed Head Dumb Blonde Reconstructor Conditioner 200ml
Dumb Blonde is a collection of hair care products by Bed Head.



This range of products is specifically for those with natural and chemically treated blonde hair. The products are enriched with pH balancing factors. Fibre helps to restructure damaged proteins in the hair whilst Vitamin E acts as an essential nutrient and antioxidant. For blondes with coloured hair, Hydrolyzed Keratin helps to strengthen the hair.



If you want your blonde hair to stay shiny, vibrant and healthy, the Dumb Blonde collection is the perfect choice.

product_name: Tom Ford Beau de Jour Eau de Parfum
description:
Tom Ford Beau de Jour Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Tom Ford Beau de Jour Eau de Parfum by Tom Ford is an aromatic fougere fragrance for men.



The fragrance opens up with notes of lavender and lavender extract, followed by a heart of rosemary, geranium, mint, oakmoss and basil, before drying down on a base of patchouli and amber.



Tom Ford Beau de Jour Eau de Parfum by Tom Ford was launched in 2020.

product_name: Tom Ford Bitter Peach Eau de Parfum
description:
Tom Ford Bitter Peach Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Bitter Peach by Tom Ford is a amber, vanilla fragrance for women and men.



It contains notes of peach, blood orange, cardamom, heliotrope, rum, cognac, davana, jasmine, indonesian patchouli leaf, sandalwood, vanilla, tonka bean, cashmeran, benzoin, styrax, labdanum and vetiver.



Bitter Peach was launched by Tom Ford in 2020.

product_name: Tom Ford Black Orchid Eau de Parfum
description:
Black Orchid by Tom Ford is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2006. A fragrance by Givaudan. Black Orchid is one of the rarest most beautiful flowers known. They are often associated with love, romance, beauty, and elegance. Wearing Tom Ford's Black Orchid luxurious composition is a sure way to draw attention to ourselves.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Amalfi Lemon, Truffle, Gardenia, Black Currant
Middle note: Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Lotus, Black Orchid, Spices, Gardenia, Fruity note:
Base note: Incense, Amber, Sandalwood, Vetiver, White Musk, Mexican Chocolate, Patchouli, Vanilla, Incense

product_name: Tom Ford F******* Fabulous All Over Body Spray
description:
Tom Ford F******* Fabulous All Over Body Spray 150ml
F****** Fabulous by Tom Ford is an oriental leathery limited edition fragrance in the Private Blend collection for men and women.



This is not just a scent, F****** Fabulous is a statement that is introduced by a spicy blend of clary sage and lavender before leading to a creamy and bitter heart of leather, almond oil, orris and vanilla before it on an earthy base in which the leather is accompanied by cashmeran, amber, tonka bean and wood.



F****** Fabulous byTom Ford was launched during the New York Fashion week in 2017.

product_name: Tom Ford Grey Vetiver Eau de Parfum
description:
Tom Ford Grey Vetiver Eau De Parfum 100ml Spray
Grey Vetiver by Tom Ford is a refreshing, woody and spicy fragrance for men.



Tom Ford’s Grey Vetiver is clean and refined. The vetiver is accented with precious woods, crisp citrusy notes and spice. It starts off with grapefruit, sage and orange blossom followed by pimento, nutmeg and orris root. In the base we find the dominant note of vetiver accompanied by oakmoss, amber and woody notes.



This fragrance celebrates vetiver which is the main component in this blend. Often found in niche fragrances, vetiver is a type of grass which grows in warmer climates. Its scent is earthy and woody, yet refreshing as it is known for its cooling abilities.



Grey Vetiver was launched by Tom Ford in 2009.

product_name: Tom Ford Velvet Orchid Eau de Parfum
description:
Velvet Orchid by Tom Ford is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2014. Created by Shyamala Maisondieu, Antoine Maisondieu Yann Vasnier and Calice Becker. It's an enticing scent that will make you feel confident, elegant and attractive. Opening tops of rum and refreshing notes reveal first, delicate taste of feminine passions, adding a charming, soft, floral heart. Luxurious flowers, which are smooth and gentle are mixed giving for an optimistic impression. The base includes sandalwood, sweet creamy vanilla, which make the finish characteristic, warm and passionate.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Rum, Honey, Mandarin Orange, Bergamot
Middle note: Black Orchid, Orchid, Jasmine, Heliotrope, Hyacinth, Rose Oil, Narcissus, Magnolia, Orange Blossom
Base note: Vanilla, Myrrh, Suede, Sandalwood, Peru Balsam, Labdanum

product_name: Tommy Hilfiger Tommy Girl All Over Body Spray
description:
Tommy Hilfiger Tommy Girl All Over Body Spray 200ml
Tommy Girl by Tommy Hilfiger is a floral fruity fragrance for women.



Accords of black currant, camellia, mandarin orange and apple tree blossom precede a floral burst of rose, honeysuckle, lily, lemon, mint and violet, which dry down with notes of magnolia, jasmine, leather and cedar in the vibrant bouquet of this fantastic scent.



Called a “declaration of independence” by the brand, Tommy Girl is the very first fragrance for women created by Hilfiger. The very successful launch was followed by over 20 limited editions including Tommy Girl Eau de Prep and many summer specials. Discover the popular Eau de Toilette, or indulge with the smoothing body lotion and energizing body wash.



Tommy Girl was launched by Tommy Hilfiger in 1996.
