product_name: Versace Blue Jeans Eau de Toilette
description:
Blue Jeans by Versace is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 1994. Created by Jean-Pierre Bethouart. It is a masculine scent that combines vibrant citrusy top notes with spicy undertones and warm base notes. Blue Jeans is a fresh and elegant men's fragrance that captures the spontaneity and freedom of the Versace man.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Anise, Citruses, Bergamot, Juniper, Brazilian Rosewood and Basil
Middle note: Sage, Lavender, Carnation, Heliotrope, Jasmine, Geranium, Rose, Fir and Lily-of-the-Valley
Base note: Musk, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Iris, Amber, Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli

product_name: Versace Bright Crystal Absolu Eau de Parfum
description:
Bright Crystal Absolu by Versace is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2013. Created by Alberto Morillas. The sophisticated fragrance of Bright Crystal Absolu is enriched with precious energizing, refreshing ingredients. Pomegranate, Yuzu and Water Notes create a playful opening that sizzles with intoxicating appeal. Fresh florals continue the appeal in an intensely feminine expression, where musk and amber mingle for a blissful finish.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pomegranate, Yuzu and Water note:
Middle note: Peony, Raspberry, Lotus and Magnolia
Base note: Musk, Mahogany and Amber

product_name: Versace Bright Crystal Absolu Gift Set 90ml EDP + 100ml Body Lotion + 100ml Shower Gel + Pouch
description:
Versace Bright Crystal Absolu Gift Set 90ml EDP + 100ml Body Lotion + 100ml Shower Gel + Pouch
Bright Crystal Absolu by Versace is a fruity and floral fragrance for women.



Absolu is a more intense and fruity version of the successful original Bright Crystal. People all over the world loved the first version, but they requested a fiercer scent and Versace absolutely delivered.



The new perfume is introduced by juicy hints of pomegranate and yuzu, which are enriched with fresh icy notes followed by a refined floral heart of peony, magnolia and lotus with a sweet touch of raspberry. The fragrance finally unfolds to reveal sensual elements of amber, musk and acajou wood.



Candice Swanepoel is the face of this charming fragrance, featuring in the advert wearing a stunning crystal-covered gown in a dark room, captivated by the radiation of the whimsical pink Versace bottle.



Bright Crystal Absolu was launched by Versace in 2013

product_name: Versace Bright Crystal Body Lotion
description:
Versace Bright Crystal Body Lotion 200ml
Bright Crystal by Versace is a floral fragrance for women.



Aquatic, fresh, citrusy – the scent opens up with a burst of pomegranate, yuzu and water notes. The heart is an explosive bouquet of peony, lotus and magnolia, while the base is musky with notes of amber and mahogany.



Bright Crystal is your perfect everyday scent: feminine, refreshing and safe to wear at work. It also makes an adorable present as part of a gift set with the perfumed body lotion. The fragrance was launched in 2006 and followed by the sweeter flanker Bright Crystal Absolu in 2013.

product_name: Versace Crystal Noir Eau de Toilette
description:
Crystal Noir Eau de Toilette by Versace is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2004. Created by Antoine Lie. Bright and chic, this women's fragrance is a captivating blend of Violet, Black Currant and Black Fig that is followed by Jasmine, Tuberose and Frangipani. Sandalwood, Cashmeran, Heliotrope and Vanilla round out this beautifully balanced scent to create a bold and unforgettable fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Violet, Black Currant and Black fig
Middle note: Jasmine, Tuberose and Frangipani
Base note: Sandalwood, Cashmeran, Heliotrope and Vanilla

product_name: Versace Crystal Noir Gift Set 90ml EDT + 100ml Body Lotion + 100ml Shower Gel + 5ml EDT
description:
Versace Crystal Noir Gift Set 90ml EDT + 100ml Body Lotion + 100ml Shower Gel + 5ml EDT
Versace Crystal Noir is a floral and oriental fragrance for women.



The captivating dark sensual bottle with its distinct black diamond stopper is sure to catch your eye and the liquid inside will not let you down.



The luscious top notes of blackcurrant, black fig and violet are in perfect harmony with the soft floral heart of tuberose, frangipani and jasmine. This would have been an innocent scent had it not been for the sandalwood, cashmere, vanilla and heliotrope which transform this scent into something rich, sumptuous and sensual.



Crystal Noir was launched by Versace in 2004.

product_name: Versace Eros Aftershave Lotion
description:
Versace Eros Aftershave Lotion 100ml Splash
Eros by Versace is a fresh, woody and oriental fragrance for men.



It contains top notes of mint oil, green apple and Italian lemon, a spicy heart of tonka, Venezuelan ambroxan and geranium flowers on an intriguing base of vanilla, cedar, oakmoss and vetiver.



This fragrance was influenced by Greek mythology, which was the source of the name Eros (the god of love) and the inspiration for the tinted turquoise bottle that features the goddess Medusa. Described by Donatella Versace as “the DNA of the house of Versace”, this is a passionate and long-lasting scent that's easy to wear all year long.



Eros was launched by Versace in 2012.

It contains notes of mint, candy apple, lemon, mandarin, ambroxan, clary sage, geranium, vanilla, sandalwood, cedar, patchouli, leather and bitter orange.



Eros Eau de Parfum was launched in 2020.

product_name: Versace Eros Eau de Toilette
description:
Versace Eros Eau de Toilette 50ml Spray
Eros by Versace is a fresh, woody and oriental fragrance for men.



It contains top notes of mint oil, green apple and Italian lemon, a spicy heart of tonka, Venezuelan ambroxan and geranium flowers on an intriguing base of vanilla, cedar, oakmoss and vetiver.



This fragrance was influenced by Greek mythology, which was the source of the name Eros (the god of love) and the inspiration for the tinted turquoise bottle that features the goddess Medusa. Described by Donatella Versace as “the DNA of the house of Versace”, this is a passionate and long-lasting scent that's easy to wear all year long.



Eros was launched by Versace in 2012.

product_name: Versace Eros Pour Femme Eau de Parfum
description:
Versace Eros Pour Femme Eau de Parfum 50ml Spray
Eros pour Femme by Versace is a floral woody and musky fragrance for women. This fragrance contains woody notes, musk, ambroxan, sandalwood, peony, jasmine, jasmine Sambac, lemon blossom, Sicilian lemon, pomegranate and Calibrian bergamot.



Eros pour Femme by Versace launched in Italy in 2014 and was released worldwide in 2015.

product_name: Versace Man Eau Fraiche Bath & Shower Gel
description:
Versace Man Eau Fraiche Bath & Shower Gel 200ml
Versace Eau Fraiche is an aquatic fragrance for men.



While the original Versace Man embodied a Latino vibe, Eau Fraiche gives a Mediterranean feel with a heart of tarragon, sage and pepper. It combines a mild and spicy note with bergamot and the sunny aroma of lemon. Ambergris lends a sweet hint of sea and also makes the fragrance last longer on the skin. Once it dries you will smell the warm and spicy base of royal saffron and musk.



Eau Fraiche was launched in 2006.

product_name: Versace Man Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette
description:
Versace Man Eau Fraiche by Versace is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. Launched in 2006. A fragrance by Olivier Cresp. Versace Man Eau Fraiche is a fresh and enticing fragrance for men, it is a refined blend. Light and bright, this scent is a breezy escape from the everyday. The subtle blend of fresh citrus scents will freshen up any man's wardrobe. The woody notes give the scent a masculine edge that's perfect for any occasion. Precious notes of cedar and musk are a refreshing change from the usual scents.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon, Bergamot, Carambola, Cardamom and Brazilian Rosewood
Middle note: Cedar, Tarragon, Pepper and Sage
Base note: Musk, Woodsy note:, Saffron, Amber and Sycamore

product_name: Versace New Homme Deodorant Spray
description:
Versace New Homme Deodorant Spray 100ml
Versace Pour Homme is inspired by Versace’s Mediterranean roots and Donatella Versace's father.

Versace Pour Homme features top notes of bergamot, neroli, bitter orange leaves and citron of diamante. The middle notes consists of geranium, clary sage, blue hyacinth and cedar wood, and the base notes of oud wood, mineral amber, Tonka beans and musk.

Versace has made this scent a simple and strong.

product_name: Versace Pour Femme Dylan Blue Eau de Parfum
description:
Versace Pour Femme Dylan Blue by Versace is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2017. A fragrance by Calice Becker. Versace Pour Femme Dylen Blue is a feminine fragrance that conveys a luxurious, stylish aura of sensuality and charm. A trendy scent that opens with fresh, crispy fruits followed by the sensual, elegant jasmine and rose, finishing with warm musk and woody notes. The aromatic scent is delicately sweet and addictive.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Granny Smith Apple, Black Currant, Clover, Forget Me Not and Shiso
Middle note: Peach, Rose Hip, Petalia, Rose and Jasmine
Base note: Musk, White Woods, Styrax and Patchouli

product_name: Versace Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
description:
Versace Pour Homme by Versace is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Launched in 2008. A fragrance by Alberto Morillas. A fresh and aromatic fragrance for the modern man, this masculine scent is a must-have for the summer season. The top notes of lemon, bergamot and neroli are uplifting and invigorating while the middle notes of hyacinth, cedar, clary sage and geranium create a calming and relaxing scent sensation. The base notes of tonka bean, musk and amber have a woody and smooth scent.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lemon, Bergamot, Neroli and Rose de Mai
Middle note: Hyacinth, Cedar, Clary Sage and Geranium
Base note: Tonka Bean, Musk and Amber

product_name: Versace Red Jeans Eau de Toilette
description:
Red Jeans by Versace is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 1994. A fragrance by Jean-Pierre Bethouart. A fragrance with character, it is alluring and special. The composition opens with juicy fresh fruity notes, the heart is floral and balmy with a touch of Ylang-ylang, the base is very warm, sensual powdery vanilla trace. This sexy fragrance will leave you feeling youthful and irresistible.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Peach, Apricot, Freesia and Black Currant
Middle note: Rose, Violet, Lily-of-the-Valley, Water Lily and Ylang-Ylang
Base note: Musk, Vanilla and Sandalwood

product_name: Versace The Dreamer Eau de Toilette
description:
Versace The Dreamer Eau de Toilette 100ml Spray
The Dreamer by Versace is a woody oriental fragrance for men.



It contains notes of juniper, lily, iris, tobacco, amber and tarragon.



The Dreamer was launched in 1996 by Versace.

product_name: Versace Versace Shower Gel
description:
Versace Versace Shower Gel 200ml
Versace by Donatella Versace is a floral fragrance for women.



It contains notes of Blackcurrant, Wisteria, Lilac, Lotus, Orchid, Jasmine, Musk, Vetiver and Cedar. The bottle is a spendid design which has the unforgettable "medusa" from the versace tradition.



Versace was launched in 2007.

product_name: Versace Versense Bath & Shower Gel
description:
Versace Versense Bath & Shower Gel 200ml
Versense by Versace

Its composition opens with fruit of the Mediterranean: bergamot and green mandarin. They will take us to a heart ruled by sea lily, rare flower with rare aromas, strengthened with jasmine petals and bitter-spicy accords of cardamom. Base notes leave a cover of woody accords of sandalwood, cedar, olive wood and sensual musk.

Versense by Versace was launched in 2009.

product_name: Versace Versense Eau de Toilette
description:
Versense by Versace is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women. Launched in 2009. A beautiful and rare floral bouquet with freshness, elegance and energy. Evoking feeling of freedom, balance of inner energy, self esteem and vitality. Opens with optimistic, fresh, luminous accords with a touch of irresistible fig, they will take us to the elegant, rare floral aromas and to the sensual woody, musky base.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Bergamot, Citruses, Green Mandarin, Fig and Pear
Middle note: Cardamom, Lily, Jasmine and Narcissus
Base note: Virginia Cedar, Olive Tree, Musk and Sandalwood

product_name: Versace Yellow Diamond Eau de Toilette
description:
Yellow Diamond by Versace is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2011. A delicious and powerful scent, a silky blend of sensual notes is a must-have for any woman's fragrance collection. The top notes open with a fresh burst of citrus scent, followed by a heart of Freesia and Mimosa, and a base of Musk, Guaiac Wood and Amber. This captivating scent is sure to help you feeling sexy and confident.

Top note: Amalfi Lemon, Pear, Bergamot and Neroli

Base note: Musk, Guaiac Wood and Amber

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Bonbon Eau de Parfum
description:
Bonbon by Viktor & Rolf is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Launched in 2014. A fragrance by Cecile Matton and Serge Majoullier. Inspired by the moments of self-indulgence, pleasure and relaxation. If you like smelling a delicious sweet toffee, this is the fragrance for you. A perfect cold weather perfume.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Peach, Mandarin Orange, Orange
Middle note: Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Caramel
Base note: Guaiac Wood, Cedar, Amber, Sandalwood

product_name: Viktor & Rolf FlowerBomb Christmas Edition Gift Set 50ml EDP + 10ml EDP
description:
Viktor & Rolf FlowerBomb Christmas Edition Gift Set 50ml EDP + 10ml EDP
Flowerbomb by Viktor & Rolf is a oriental floral fragrance for women.



The scent explodes with sweet tea, fresh lime and florals like jasmine, centifolia rose, freesia and Cattleya orchid on a lingering base of musk and patchouli. Viktor & Rolf released the scent in 2005 to wide acclaim and since then it has been released in several special editions and gift sets as well as a male counterpart; SpiceBomb.



Flowerbomb by Viktor & Rolf was launched in 2005.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Dew Eau de Parfum
description:
Flowerbomb Dew by Viktor & Rolf is a Floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2020. A beautiful soft flower perfume with a hint of sweetness. Perfect for every day wear, to the office or just to cuddle up on the sofa. Flowerbomb Dew is a delicate feminine powdery freshness, an intimate, innocent fragrance.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Dew Drop, Bergamot, Pear, Ambrette
Middle note: Iris and Rose
Base note: White Musk, Cashmeran, Heliotrope

description:

FiFi Award Best National Advertising Campaign 2006 Winner perfume. A captivating, stunning scent. If you love compliments, this is a fragrance for you. Perfect for a night out or any special occasion.

Base note: Patchouli, Musk and Vanilla

product_name: Worth Je Reviens Body Spray
description:
Worth Je Reviens Body Spray 75ml
Je Reviens by Worth is a floral and woody fragrance for women.



Je Reviens is a true vintage scent that has stood the test of time. Decades ago this was the scent worn by every fine lady in the big city, and today it is as popular as it was back in the 1930’s.



Je Reviens opens with fresh notes of aldehydes, orange blossom, jasmine, ylang-ylang, bergamot and lemon. The heart is a beautiful blend of narcissus, lilac, orris root, hyacinth, cloves, ylang-ylang and rose, which melt into the base of sandalwood, tonka bean, amber, musk, violet, oakmoss, vetiver and incense.



Je Reviens by Worth was launched in 1932.

description:

product_name: Yardley English Lavender Body Spray
description:
Yardley English Lavender Body Spray 75ml
English Lavender by Yardley is a floral fragrance for women.



Picture the English country side on a warm summer day in early June. It’s filled with a rich, aromatic purple blanket of lavender, the bees are buzzing the sun is shining and everything is good in the world. English Lavender captures this feel good factory and has managed to bottle it for us.

Notes of bergamot and clary sage is blended perfectly with lavender, eucalyptus, geranium, jasmine, chamomile and violet, while the base is a mix of deep, warm notes of vanilla, wood and patchouli.



English Lavender was launched in 2015.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium Eau de Parfum
description:
Black Opium by Yves Saint Laurent is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Launched in 2014. Black Opium was created by Olivier Cresp, Honorine Blanc, Nathalie Lorson and Marie Salamagne. A fresh and sexy scent that captures the essence of a woman's sensual side. A blend of sensual and seductive notes that can be worn for any occasion. The notes of pear, pink pepper and orange blossom is the top note that is fresh and uplifting. The middle notes of coffee, jasmine, bitter almond and licorice is the scent of sensuality and seduction.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Pear, Pink Pepper and Orange Blossom
Middle note: Coffee, Jasmine, Bitter Almond and Licorice
Base note: Vanilla, Patchouli, Cedar and Cashmere Wood

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium Gift Set 30ml EDP + 2ml Mascara
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium Gift Set 30ml EDP + 2ml Mascara
Black Opium by Yves Saint Laurent is an oriental vanilla fragrance for women.



Ohhhhh, the name and the delicious bottle – it’s pure power; sultry, dark, seductive and sexy. An indulgent fragrance that says, yes, do give in to your desire... whatever they may be....



Black Opium is all about excess – have it all with this dark, naughty sexy nectar. A smoky dark coffee opening soon gives way to the vanilla and pear heart that ends with a base of dark and earthy musk and cedar. Most definitely a thumbs up as a rock'n'roll interpretation of the classic Opium.



Black Opium was launched in 2014.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Parfum
description:
Libre by Yves Saint Laurent is a Amber Fougere fragrance for women. Launched in 2019. Libre was created by Carlos Benaim and Anne Flipo. This sensual perfume is designed to help you feel more feminine and confident. With its seductive wisp of lavender, its cedar wood and its ambergris notes, this fragrance is a sexy and sophisticated. The top notes are delicate and aromatic, the middle notes are sweet and feminine. The base notes evoke the sensual side of this perfume, making it a perfect fragrance for evening wear. It's the perfect perfume for a woman who has a seductive sense of style and confidence. A luxurious very popular perfume.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Lavender, Mandarin Orange, Black Currant and Petitgrain
Middle note: Lavender, Orange Blossom and Jasmine
Base note: Madagascar Vanilla, Musk, Cedar and Ambergris

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Eau de Parfum
description:
Mon Paris by Yves Saint Laurent is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women. Launched in 2016. Mon Paris was created by Olivier Cresp, Harry Fremont and Dora Baghriche. Mon Paris is Paris inspired, the scent of love. Mon Paris is a true reflection of what a woman should be: sensitive, free, elegant, sensual and seductive. A sense of freedom and sensual passion. The composition has a refreshing fruity start, intoxicating floral heart and a delicately sweet, dark chypre base.

Fragrance Notes:
Top note: Strawberry, Raspberry, Pear, Orange, Tangerine, Calabrian bergamot and Calone
Middle note: Peony, Jasmine Sambac, Chinese Jasmine, Datura and Orange Blossom
Base note: Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Patchouli, White Musk, Vanilla, Ambroxan, Moss and Cedar

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Gift Set 50ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Gift Set 50ml EDP + 50ml Body Lotion
Mon Paris by Yves Saint Laurent is a fruity and floral fragrance for women.



A must-have if you are hunting for a fine, radiant and romantic scent. Mon Paris is “the new expression of love today”, inspired by the streets of the French capital. The Eau de Parfum features a fruity start of strawberry, pear, raspberry and citruses; this introduces a bouquet of datura and white flowers, which melt down on patchouli and musk.



A lighter and more airy composition can be enjoyed in the EDT, distinguished by accords of blackberry in the top. The sparkly collector editions and luxurious gift sets also make lovely presents for the festive season!



Mon Paris was launched by Yves Saint Laurent in 2016.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Opium Eau de Parfum
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Opium Eau de Parfum 30ml Spray
Opium by Yves Saint Laurent is an oriental and woody fragrance for women.



This fascinating scent contains a unique blend of patchouli, bergamot, myrrh, vanilla, jasmine, incense, carnation, cloves and citruses. Audacious and long-lasting, Opium was inspired by the deep and spicy accords of imperial China.



Due to its intense composition and unusual name, Opium caused controversy at the time of release. However, it gained extraordinary success over the last few decades, remaining a best-seller today and making any woman who wears it stand out in a crowd.



Opium was initially released in 1977 and re-launched with a new design in 2009.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Parfum
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Parfum 200ml Spray
Y Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is an aromatic fougere fragrance for men.



The fragrance opens up with notes of bergamot, ginger and apple, followed by a heart of sage, juniper berries and geranium, before drying down on a base of vetiver, cedar, amberwood, olibanum and tonka bean.



Y Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent was launched in 2018.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Toilette
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Toilette 60ml Spray
Y for Men by Yves Saint Laurent is a woody and aromatic fragrance for men.



The composition of the Eau de Toilette starts with clean notes of white aldehydes, ginger and bergamot that develop with geranium, violet leaf and sage in the heart supported by a masculine base of fir balsam, incense, ambergris, musk and cedar. The Eau de Parfum shares these notes enriched with apple in the opening, juniper berries in the heart and olibanum in the base.



Both versions come in a minimalistic linear bottle with a metal accent that merely seems to feature the brands name when you see the front of the bottle, but if you turn it it turns out to be the base of the letter Y.

Y was created to give the generation that was born in the 80s and 90s a confident and versatile fragrance unlike any other.



The EDT version of Y for Men was launched in 2017, followed by an EDP in 2018.

This is Him by Zadig & Voltaire is an oriental woody fragrance for men.



Vanilla and incense mixed with black pepper and grapefruit, in just the right proportions, make this fragrance a real showstopper. It's enigmatic, but inviting; perfect for a night out or a trip down to the pub. Be warned though – this will get you many compliments.



This is Him by Zadig & Voltaire was launched in 2016.

product_name: Zippo Fire Phoenix Eau de Toilette
description:
Zippo Fire Phoenix Eau de Toilette 75ml Spray
Fire Phoenix by Zippo is a fragrance for men.



It contains notes of apple blossom, bergamot, basil, blood orange, lavender, rosemary, sage, fig leaves, juniper, sandalwood, cedar, tonka bean, cashmere wood and musk.

product_name: Zippo Helios Eau De Toilette
description:
Zippo Helios Eau De Toilette 75ml Spray
Helios by Zippo Fragrances is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for men. Top notes are Fig Leaf, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Lavender, Apple and Watermelon; base notes are Musk, Moss and Cedar.



Helios was launched in 2018.

product_name: Zirh Classic Eau de Toilette
description:
Zirh Classic Eau de Toilette 125ml Spray
Classic by Zirh is a fresh fregrance for men.



It contains notes of lime, mandarin orange, nutmeg, ginger and oakmoss.
